name: YOOX NET-A-PORTER GROUP
description: YOOX NET-A-PORTER Group is an Italian online fashion retailer created on 5 October 2015 after the merger between Yoox GROUP and THE NET-A-PORTER GROUP.
review_title: AVOID THIS COMPANY AT ALL COST!!
review_text: I received a Gucci trainers as a birthday gift and after wearing it only two times it became all scratched and misformed. I have informed them immediately and they argued that the item was used therefore nothing can be done, as if a €600 trainers is a disposable thing! After weeks of many emails and calls I was promised to get a refund back once I return the item. After several more weeks that they received it back I was informed that they cannot issue refund and it will be sent back to me. Finally I managed to get my refund back after exhausting months. Their customer service and after sales service is the worst I’ve ever encountered. Would never buy again from this company and would suggest to anyone to do the same!

review_text: Horrible experience with the customer service AGAIN! I am not able to pay by credit card when ordering through YOOX app, contacted customer service. I got only directions from different agents what to do and promise they will get back to me. I did everything they've asked me to, but nothing has changed. Asked for feedback from them, and only got reply after my second email, with ofcourse another useless advice. So, they did absolutely nothing to resolve the issue. The most that irritated me was ignoring my email. How disrespectful...

name: YOOX NET-A-PORTER GROUP
description: YOOX NET-A-PORTER Group is an Italian online fashion retailer created on 5 October 2015 after the merger between Yoox GROUP and THE NET-A-PORTER GROUP.
review_text: 1.	March 17th, 2020 -Ordered from Outnet (Net-a-Porter owned) and received a completely different shirt Order (0903ZB7SW2001H). Told the blouse I ordered never was actually in stock. Weeks to refund shipping and item. Had to contact multiple times. 2.	Dec 2020- Wanted to purchase gift card for friend for Mr. Porter (Net-a-Porter owned). Doesn’t offer gift card so ordered small item in gift box to place money inside so instead (order 2112ZHQ2T2021J) Called to make sure I could get gift box and paid for same day delivery so it would arrive for Christmas. Didn’t arrive and when arrived the next day came without gift box. Had to contact multiple times for shipping refund and was told several times a gift box would be sent and it wasn’t.  3.	Sept 2021-ordered a pair of expensive leather trousers from Outnet (order number 0209Z612I2101H) I couldn’t log into the website to return the item so put the label on the box and returned to DHL shop which aren’t convenient. I then received an email on October 1st indicating the item was being sent back to me. I emailed stating I didn't want the item as I returned it and had no reply to two separate emails. Eventually, I was told the item was coming and to refuse delivery. I was out of the country and it was an expensive item that required a signature but it was still delivered. The same pair of trousers were redelivered. I had to wait at home for 3 hours to have the item collected again. When someone finally contacted me I was told this happens all the time- ie a returned item is exchanged as it is default for Net-a-Porter and subsidiaries. 4.	Oct 2021- ordered bodysuit (order 2110Z3CI02121M)- paid for next day shipping with a window for delivery. Didn’t arrive. Called multiple times and was told it was coming the next day- would receive a text stating this was occurring so I waited at home multiple days to await the item during the specified times. It never arrived. After multiple times, called again and was told the item had never actually been in stock and the order was a “ghost” order and was never going to be delivered. Eventually placed a new order and it arrived. Kept being promised call backs from manager within a specified time frame and didn’t occur. Additionally, asked for the redelivery to be either in the AM or PM so I didn’t have to wait all day. Said this couldn’t be done despite the service being offered and this was the service I originally paid for. 5.	March 2021- (Order 2303ZP32Z2221M)- ordered a size 4 dress. It was too small. The dress was sold out except for this size. I followed the return process online and selected too small as the reason for the exchange. I’ve since been told if you select reason for return as too small it automatically changes to an exchange. I’m not sure how customers would catch this having clicked return to begin with. Over a week later received size 14 in the post-no email indicating it was coming. Had no idea why. Emailed CS and told it was my fault for requesting an exchange. I explained I had not but if I had a size 14 wouldn’t be an exchange for a 4. I had been checking the website daily as I was hoping to get an 8 and the other sizes were sold out. There is no option to be emailed when your desired size comes back into stock like other websites have. I had placed an ordered for an 8 in between returning the 4 and getting the 14 so I’m unsure why the dress wasn’t exchanged for an 8. I asked multiple times to raise a complaint as my experience on multiple occasions was poor. Was told it was not possible to raise a complaint and have the issue investigated. Instead, you simply get emails back stating “sorry for the inconvenience and your feedback will be passed on.” Took numerous emails to get an apology for having the item sent back to me. Until then was told it was my fault for initiating the exchanged. At this point didn’t want to get the size 8 due to poor service. Tried to return online only to have the return button greyed out and unable to return. Have returned with the label instead and told CS but won’t be surprised if it comes back in a few weeks time.Based on the other reviews this seems like pretty standard CS for Net-a-Porter. I’m shocked as it is a premium platform.----------------------Update- had a call from CS. They were very nice and obviously not the reason for the failings above. Only one refund had been given for the size 14 (despite arriving back with the 8) so while on the phone she pushed it through which was great. However, received an email this morning stating a refund of £0 for a £350 dress. At this point this seems fraudulent. I've emailed to find out what happened but what if I hadn't noticed. Was offered 15% off my next purchase. I already had a 15% off coupon so this hasn't made up in any way for my experience.--Update- refund for one dress but not for other. 1 Month to chase again!!!!

name: YOOX NET-A-PORTER GROUP
description: YOOX NET-A-PORTER Group is an Italian online fashion retailer created on 5 October 2015 after the merger between Yoox GROUP and THE NET-A-PORTER GROUP.
review_title: If I could give zero stars…I would
review_text: If I could give zero stars…I would. Literally the WORST customer service I’ve ever encountered. I placed an order for a wallet/pen set and a Fear of God long sleeve. It was a birthday gift. I placed the order Monday night, expecting to receive by Friday at the latest. The tracking kept pushing the arrival back and I was getting antsy because I needed it before I left. Realizing it wouldn’t get there in time, I asked customer service what to do and they eventually told me they can change the address so that it goes to the gift receiver directly. I was told they reached out to UPS and the address was changed and the customer service rep hung up on me immediately after that. I assumed she did what she said and thought nothing of it. Two or three days later the tracking said it was out for delivery in a completely different state. I got concerned and called Mr Porter. They told me to call UPS. UPS said that no one ever called them regarding my packages and the address was NEVER changed. At this point they changed it for me themselves and I received my package 5 days late. The package came in completely broken boxes that were barely holding up. When I opened the items, one was not even in a Mr Porter box the way they usually come with nice packaging. It was literally just a Mont Blanc box tossed into the shipping box. So tasteless and embarrassing to send someone as a gift…esp when you expect nice presentation. The other item came in a Mr Porter box but the box was completely ripped at each corner. Completely busted box. How does this happen?!? Zero quality control.Considering this was a gift…I was so frustrated and embarrassed. I had to go get tissue paper and a nice bag to place the items into because the presentation was SO poor and just tasteless.

name: YOOX NET-A-PORTER GROUP
description: YOOX NET-A-PORTER Group is an Italian online fashion retailer created on 5 October 2015 after the merger between Yoox GROUP and THE NET-A-PORTER GROUP.
review_title: This company has gone straight down the…
review_text: This company has gone straight down the drain, clearly under new leadership, or they've cut costs somewhere. Had been a customer for 13 years, but as soon as I receive my refund, I shall not be shopping here again!Avoid using them especially if you need to send an item back. The return instructions are incorrect so your item will be sent back to you by UPS. Finally if you try to obtain another return label it is next to impossible. Three weeks on and I'm still waiting despite countless calls.The operate like a scam, total garbage.

name: YOOX NET-A-PORTER GROUP
description: YOOX NET-A-PORTER Group is an Italian online fashion retailer created on 5 October 2015 after the merger between Yoox GROUP and THE NET-A-PORTER GROUP.
review_title: Wrong size and awfully return process.
review_text: Awfully! I've ordered the dress size 12 UK but I've got size 42 IT, that means size 10 UK. The dress was too small. Now I'm trying to return and I had Returns Proforma Invoice for 90 GBP less. It's ridiculous! I don't want to pay for staff's mistake about size. I'm trying to contact UPS for the pick-up but don't understand how to do this without clearly instructions from YOOX.

review_text: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE. I tried to send a coat back and they resend it back to me TWICE!!!! they have no intention to refund me...DONT USE THIS COMPANY!!!!

name: YOOX NET-A-PORTER GROUP
description: YOOX NET-A-PORTER Group is an Italian online fashion retailer created on 5 October 2015 after the merger between Yoox GROUP and THE NET-A-PORTER GROUP.
review_text: I am very surprised of the bad recent reviews that am currently reading. I have recently had to deal with the Customer Care Service and it was excellent as it has always been for the last 20 years. The quality of the products I have purchased is excellent and always as described. New Brexit regulations are awful and their impact can be seen on delivery times and products' price, but this is not YOOX responsability.

name: YOOX NET-A-PORTER GROUP
description: YOOX NET-A-PORTER Group is an Italian online fashion retailer created on 5 October 2015 after the merger between Yoox GROUP and THE NET-A-PORTER GROUP.
review_title: If I could give ZERO stars I would
review_text: If I could give ZERO stars I would! AVOID this company! I ordered Christmas gifts to arrive in advance before Christmas only to get notifications and an email to say it’s been delivered at 13:00 and left at my front door whilst I was at work. I call them they tell me it’s going to take 8 days for an investigation. I call them on the 10th day to be told that they are waiting to hear from they courier and this should be on the 22nd of December and that they will call me. Surprise surprise they didn’t call so I called them on the 24th only to be told that it’s still being investigated and it should be sorted as soon as possible. It’s been nearly a month now! What is there to investigate! I didn’t receive my items! My nephews won’t receive their Christmas presents and I’m nearly £100 down! Quick to take your money but won’t give it back! Shocking company!

review_title: Awesome coach with lots of useful…
review_text: Awesome coach with lots of useful practical knowledge. Lessons are structured to really get practice for those shots you have trouble in a way that is helpful for competitive gameplay. As an experienced player - I feel John's level of instruction is just right, nailing the key points without a lot of extra chatter which gives the student time to focus and digest. Yet when he gives pointers, it is spot on, referencing specific shots during practice as examples to help work through the issues. Would highly recommend to 3.5 + players looking to take their game to the next level

review_text: Dell is fantastic! Takes the time up front to learn your current skills and strengths, then quickly tailors a plan to your game. And, just a great guy to talk to, keeping the game fun!

name: PlayYourCourt
description: We make tennis easier by connecting you with local coaches and players at times and locations that are convenient for you.
review_text: Have had a great first couple sessions with Kirk so far and excited to continue. Very personable and easy going. I’ve been playing tennis off and on for years and would consider myself intermediate+, but have never had any formal training until now, so sessions have been mostly hitting sessions with the occasional water break where Kirk will break down my form and tell me what to try differently when we get back to hitting, which is exactly what I was looking for in a lesson. I also casually mentioned my serve needed work and within 10 minutes I had better form and consistency and enough to continue working on in my own time. I’m new to Charleston, so he introduced me to a few other players he coches at similar skill level so we can hit together between lessons. Overall highly recommend for intermediate/advanced players trying to fine tune their game.

name: PlayYourCourt
description: We make tennis easier by connecting you with local coaches and players at times and locations that are convenient for you.
review_text: I really enjoyed my lessons with Inzi! I told her exactly what I was hoping to get out of the lessons from the start and she tailored the lessons to fit what I needed, which I really appreciated. She is really good about making her instructions\tips simple to understand and not overcomplicated, which I believe helped me pick up on things and improve expeditiously. She is also good about picking up on when my technique was actually incorrect versus when I was just tired and needed a break, which helped me stay focused and keep up my form. I highly recommend her if you are looking for a tennis coach.

name: PlayYourCourt
description: We make tennis easier by connecting you with local coaches and players at times and locations that are convenient for you.
review_text: Coach Brian is excellent! He has really good teaching strategies and tennis tips. I haven’t played tennis for almost 2 years. He helps me quickly back to my original level and perfects my way of playing tennis.

name: PlayYourCourt
description: We make tennis easier by connecting you with local coaches and players at times and locations that are convenient for you.
review_text: Harris was fantastic! I booked six lessons with a specific strategy to strengthen my backhand, along with a few other shots. Harris completely catered to my needs and taught me the proper technique from beginning to end. I feel that I am a much stronger tennis player after just a month with Harris! Great hitting partner too - highly recommend!!

review_title: Some improvement needed but otherwise good
review_text: Conquest Graphics was very helpful at the beginning of my project! However, once ordered, the project had stalled b/c they were waiting on artwork... and I would have never known had I not thought to check in on the status. Thank goodness I checked b/c they have no process of notifying you if your project stalls... it's up to you to stay on top of the order. This is something that should be improved on their end. Otherwise, though, everyone was friendly, helpful, and responsive. The chat feature is a HUGE plus!

name: T4E : Training for Engagement
description: Train more. Spend Less. T4E, a brand of UMAREX, provides law enforcement departments and military with less-than-lethal training equipment that has an authentic weight, feel and action to provide the most realistic training experience with the least cost possible. Training with T4E platforms means more frequent training which results in better quality training and better reaction to real-life scenarios.T4E® is marketed in North America by Umarex USA, Inc. The brands and models offered as T4E platforms are either owned or officially licensed.

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_title: After travelling to Somserset to our…
review_text: After travelling to Somserset to our holiday accommodation Shaun cooked an amazing meal for us, which was cooked to perfection and lived upto all we had heard and had been expecting. Fantastic food served by lovely Christine. Totally amazing and we will definitely be seeing them again soon

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_title: A M A Z I N G.....and more
review_text: A M A Z I N G.....and more. Thank you Shaun for the most amazing dinner at Nickys in Poole last Thursday.  Everything was just perfect and we all LOVED it.We will definitely look forward to seeing you again.

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_title: We had Shaun come and do breakfast for…
review_text: We had Shaun come and do breakfast for 24 ladies while away on a hen weekend! The breakfast was just perfect, lots of selection and all served hot. Would highly recommend!

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_text: I hired Shaun for a dinner party for a 50th Birthday in Shoreham with 15 guests. The food was amazing and all the guest loved their meal! The food was professionally served and introduced to the party. Shaun was organised, on time and just got on with preparing and serving dinner without any fuss. His lovely assistant kept the wine flowing and cleaned up all the dishes and cook ware which was a wonderful added bonus! I highly recommend Shaun for your events for his lovely and calm personality, his organisation and delicious food and wine.

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_title: Delicious food and outstanding value for money…
review_text: Shaun turned up on time and delivered the most amazing Sunday lunch for 15. This included canapes, roast beef and Yorkshires, a vegetarian meal, and a fish meal.  It was 3 courses and gluten free.  The food was top quality and delicious.  Highly recommend and will definitely use Shaun again.  outstanding value for money.

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_text: Delicious food, vast menu choices and such a friendly experience by Shaun. He just let himself into the house and cooked a delicious meal for 17 of us. Lots of food left for the next day so portions are big. Can’t wait for our next dinner with Shaun.

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_text: We received a wonderful service from Shaun, the food was fresh, beautifully presented and very generous in size. Everything tasted delicious, from the starters, mains to dessert. You can tell a lot of love went into preparing those dishes! So thank you very much Shaun, we would definitely use him again for future work events!

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_title: This was our first experience with…
review_text: This was our first experience with Shaun who proved to be very professional and competent in delivering a great six course meal for our guests.Everything went exceptionally well and timed perfectly, which allowed us to relax and enjoy the experience together with our friends who were very impressed with the standard of his cuisine.We would not hesitate to recommend him.Stav and Dem

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_title: What a fantastic afternoon tea I’ve had…
review_text: What a fantastic afternoon tea I’ve had today, on this Mother’s Day. The food was wonderful. The sandwiches had a good amount of filling and the coronation chicken was very tasty. The cakes were lovely and the little chocolate balls, had a lovely burst of liquor, yummy. The scones were very nice and with clotted cream and jam, yum yum. I order the same for my daughter in law and she’s very impressed too. Will definitely order again. Thank you very much shaun.

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_text: Shaun created a tasting menu to go with our Riesling tasting evening. Every dish was well thought out, interesting and matched perfectly to the wines. He put in so much time and effort and kept us up to date. Absolutely amazing. 100% recommend to everyone.

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_title: Fantastic three course meal cooked by…
review_text: Fantastic three course meal cooked by Shaun for husbands birthday , thoroughly enjoyed by all and wine perfectly paired with each course .Can highly recommend for any occasion, very relaxing and Shaun and Christine cleared all crockery and glasses , thank you so much for a hassle free enjoyable Sunday .

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_text: Shaun catered for our hen do and was absolutely brilliant. He was very accommodating with menu choices and the food was delicious! He also did the cleaning & tidying up after which was a lovely bonus! Would thoroughly recommend if you are looking for in-house catering.

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_title: I have had Shaun come to my house a few…
review_text: I have had Shaun come to my house a few times now. Each time has been great! Our 8 course tasting menu this time has been the best yet! Everything tasted amazing, I could not recommend to anyone enough!!. From choosing what is on the menu to the delivery, professional and delicious.

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_text: Shaun created a delicious meal for my 30th birthday with 20 of my friends. We had a 3 course meal at a private residence. The food was delicious and well timed and the service was great. Shaun catered to a variety of dietary requirements and catered the menu to our theme.

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_text: Shaun catered two separate sit down meals for 25 & 27 people to celebrate my husband’s 60th birthday.From my initial enquiries Shaun was very helpful and patient with all my questions. He listened to what kind of an evening we wanted and the kind of food we like to eat, from this we put together a bespoke six course menu for both evenings.On both occasions Shaun arrived promptly and well prepared with all the dishes. From this moment on we just relaxed and enjoyed the evening. The food was delicious and very well presented. All our guests loved the food.All in all, Shaun and his team are very professional, curtious and friendly. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them.Thank you very much Shaun.

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_text: Shaun was highly professional, made the organisation really easy, very quick to respond to any queries ! Food was amazing! His team left the kitchen in an impeccable state ! Loved the evening ! Would highly recommend!

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_text: Simply amazing, 10 out of 10 not just for the food but for the service that these guys provide. It truly is a first class customer orientated service. Nothing was too much trouble and Shaun's cooking skills are to die for. He even catered for a couple of what I would call 'fussy' eaters without any hassle. Thank you Shaun and I will definitely be booking again and would highly recommend..

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_text: Shaun cooked a private dinner for 6 of us yesterday night and it was fantastic. Shaun was responsive all the way up to it and he and Christine were masked up, using gloves etc. throughout so we knew they took our  mutual health and safety seriously. A great meal with great food and Shaun was very happy to talk us through what he was cooking.A great alternative to going out for dinner!

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_text: Shaun and co, wonderful experience. Food was amazing and the service provided 5*. Thank you again for making a wonderful festive afternoon. Will be rebooking come new year

name: Dinnerwithshaun
description: Private chef service
review_text: Shaun catered for our VIP reception at our charity Christmas Concert. Prior to the event Shaun discussed the canapés and nothing was too much trouble. He arrived and quickly got on with preparing and before we knew it the canapés were ready for our 100 guests. I’ve never know canapés disappear so quickly off the platters and not a crumb was left. Our celebrity guests said ‘they were delicious’. I would highly recommend Shaun and we will definitely be booking him again.

name: Snackathon Foods
review_title: Super delicious ..and my body is always…
review_text: Super delicious ..and my body is always so happy in a healthy way, after eating some this treat. Thank you for creating such a high quality nutritious tasty snack !

name: Snackathon Foods
review_title: It seemed like it took longer to…
review_text: It seemed like it took longer to arrive. Unfortunately it was a day late then what it stated and I had left for vacation with my grandkids and that was the whole reason I ordered the 16pk. :( The shipping address is my sister business which closes at 4:30pm and should have shown on the delivery. So unfortunately my grandkids have not tried them yet. Maybe in a few months when I see them again.Sharen

review_text: Great food, good price and fast delivery.

name: Snackathon Foods
review_text: Fast fulfillment and shipping. All items arrived intact. This is the second time I ordered with them and I'm sure I'll order again. They have good prices on many things and carry some items that are seen at Costco so this is good too if you don't have a membership there.Many of my favorites were sold out, but I still found many other things to try.

name: Snackathon Foods
review_title: This is my second order and I’m delighted!
review_text: This is my second order from snakekathon foods and I have to say I’m quite pleased once more. The products arrived promptly in an excellent condition.

review_text: My wife really wanted some Kirkland Praline Pecans and Costco was out. Snackathon saved the day with quick turnaround

name: Snackathon Foods
review_text: Great products and prices, with very fast shipping!

name: Snackathon Foods
review_text: You accepted my order, then the next day you cancelled it without any reason.

name: Snackathon Foods
review_text: SHIPPING WAS A LITTLE SLOW BUT I UNDERSTAND DUE TO A WORKFORCE SHORTAGE!  I JUST DON’T UNDERSTAND THAT. HOWEVER THE PRODUCT FINALLY ARRIVED AND IT WAS GREAT!!

name: Snackathon Foods
review_text: Great service, best price around for a quality product. I will purchase again. Thank you!

name: Snackathon Foods
review_text: Easy to order and wide selection of quality snacks! Great and fair prices and quick shipping.

name: Snackathon Foods
review_text: These are sinfully good. Have to limit myself to a serving, or it would be very easy to eat the whole bag!Shipment came when I was told it would.

name: Snackathon Foods
review_text: Fast shipping , fresh product(cinnamon glazed pecans) thank you. Will definitely purchase again from you⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: Snackathon Foods
review_text: The best cashews ever!! Waiting on my new order !!

name: Snackathon Foods
review_title: I really like your product and…
review_text: I really like your product and services! Happy with the product and price! Awesome value!

name: Snackathon Foods
review_title: Good source of hard to find snacks and candy
review_text: They're more expensive than Costco, but then isn't everyone?  Also less expensive than sellers on Amazon.  Reasonable shipping speed.

name: Snackathon Foods
review_title: Good product for a fair price
review_text: Good product for a fair price. No complaints. Will order again and again.

name: Community Phone
description: At Community Phone, we offer simple, reliable landline phone service for homes and businesses. Our phone service does not require internet, and works during power outages. It’s powered by our landline base, a device that connects your landline phone to cell towers in your area. Simply plug the device into an outlet, plug your phone into the base, and enjoy unlimited local and long distance calls in the US.We also give you full control over how you use your phone. Transfer your landline number onto a cell phone, or forward calls from a landline and get rid of your existing service completely. Have calls ring on multiple phones at the same time, or route calls to different phones based on a custom dial menu. Send voicemail recordings to your inbox. All with helpful, accessible customer support.

review_text: My phone goes out quite often and I do not realize it has until I have missed important calls. No ring tone and I cannot make or receive phone calls. Rebooting the phone doesn't always fix the problem either.

review_text: Basic functionality (quality of voice connection) of phone service is excellent!There are a few quirks to the system that could be improved:1. During power outage battery backup kicks in, which is good. However when power comes back on phone does not automatically revert to ac power. The modem must be reset. As an elderly user that resettingvprocess is confusing for me.2. Voice mail cannot be deactivated. As an elderly user I cannot remember how to access voice mail, too confusing for me. I do understand how to use my answering machine, but because voice mail is always on my answering machine has to be set to pick up calls before voice mail which rarely allows me enough time to answer phone before answering machine kicks in.I assume for most users these issues are not a problem, but think it should be something Community Phone could easily fix to make life a little easier for us old folks.

review_text: Simple to set up. This landline connection is interfaced with and Dependent on cell towers for transmission of signal. This is an indication of the obsolescence of hard wired equipment available for secure and more dependable phone service. The old technology was and still is greatly appreciated, but has largely been replaced by cell phone and cell tower repeaters to relay the communications (antenna) streams. The changeover to internet providers for regular phone service, commercial, industrial, and small businesses are not excluded. This COMMUNITY PHONE is Not a party line, which certainly would be considered a totally UNSECURED LINE for personal and/or private communications. This Community Phone requires a 120VAC outlet to power this unit continuously. When power is lost, you can expect service to continue. This service will switch automatically to BATTERY BACKUP! Battery life has not been reported in the setup instructions and list of components in the package when shipped to the customers. I lost power and the phone worked just fine. Note: You must purchase a landline handset for service upon installation. The regular phone jacks for landlines still are the connection ports for signal incoming and the handset to make or receive phone calls. Still assessing service quality while speaking. So far clear and line-noise free. Good job by Community Phone up to this point.

name: Community Phone
description: At Community Phone, we offer simple, reliable landline phone service for homes and businesses. Our phone service does not require internet, and works during power outages. It’s powered by our landline base, a device that connects your landline phone to cell towers in your area. Simply plug the device into an outlet, plug your phone into the base, and enjoy unlimited local and long distance calls in the US.We also give you full control over how you use your phone. Transfer your landline number onto a cell phone, or forward calls from a landline and get rid of your existing service completely. Have calls ring on multiple phones at the same time, or route calls to different phones based on a custom dial menu. Send voicemail recordings to your inbox. All with helpful, accessible customer support.
review_title: Been trying to reach you via phone
review_text: Been trying to reach you via phone.  No customer service person available. Last year sign up for your phone service.  You may me pay $60.00 to bring my old phone number with me.  No other phone service in the past ever did that.  You guys are part of AT&T.  Which is corp.  Not a big fan of corporate America.  When I said that to the customer service rep.  She said no that T-Mobil is also connected with Community Phone.  Still corporation.  You email me and told me you bill my credit card for $317 dollar and change.  Which I told the customer service agent.  Mostly likely won't renew.  You guys sent me another email saying if I did a annual renewal I would get one month free a 10% saving.  Didn't get it.  You guys are such a ripoff.  That is what corporate America is all about.  You need to educated your customer service people.  Very disappointed in your service.  Plus, during this past year I have had calls just drop during conversation with family.  You people are terrible company.  Thank You Barbara Minton

review_text: Great company from salesman to tradesmen and the office staff.Had the house done last year and then the roof this year .

name: Lti Transformations
description: Scotland's specialist in roof, wall and UPVC refurbishment.
review_text: We had Lti carry out work on our property twice during the past year, treating and coating both the walls and roof and they certainly are living up to their name in that they have ‘Transformed’ our house.Very pleased with the results as looks like a new property again!The Tradesmen are professional arriving when they say they will (weather dependent for job), have a friendly manner and good communication throughout the process, working hard and efficiently and tidying up afterwards.

name: Lti Transformations
description: Scotland's specialist in roof, wall and UPVC refurbishment.
review_title: The team that did the work were…Robert's Team
review_text: The team that did the work were excellent.I was impressed with the care they showed removing hanging basket brackets, plant wall supports and manyplanters filled with plants, before they could start the wash. Washing the house and roof takes time, and the dirt that comes off is staggering, but the paths and fences were all covered to collect the resulting dirt and then removed. Due to the weather the painting was delayed until a break of fair weather was forecast.During this time calls were made and staff did not return calls when they said they would, this is my only complaint about anything, as it drives me mad.I contacted Marco and all was sorted out. Robert and his team took 2 days to complete walls and roof, windows, doors etc were all covered before they sprayed. on completion all was cleared up and removed and planters put where I requested.The team were very professional and pleasant to deal with throughout, I highly recommend them.Chloe in the office was also very helpful, polite and friendly.

name: Lti Transformations
description: Scotland's specialist in roof, wall and UPVC refurbishment.
review_text: Very pleased and satisfied with the work done to our property, Gordon was very particular and done the job very satisfactory. Also found him to be a pleasant and safe worker, very happy to get on with the job in hand. I honestly can’t praise him enough. A conscious worker.

name: Lti Transformations
description: Scotland's specialist in roof, wall and UPVC refurbishment.
review_title: We had misgivings with lack of…
review_text: We had misgivings with lack of communication albeit the weather was changeable. After a couple of calls to LTI we eventually got a date for completion. Robert and his team put in a great shift on a Saturday and we are very pleased with the results.

name: Lti Transformations
description: Scotland's specialist in roof, wall and UPVC refurbishment.
review_title: Absolutely delighted with finish to my…
review_text: Absolutely delighted with finish to my wall refurbishment. The whole team from LTI have been extremely helpful from the office staff, to the guys who bio washed the walls, then the guys who applied the coating. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. I was so impressed at how tidy these guys work - even neighbours commented on this. Very well done LTI. You certainly have my recommendation.

review_text: Hi When I got my quote from Lti I was a bit unsure as to how things would go especially paying 1/3 up front but I can truly say I was pleasantly surprised how efficiently the work was done  The guys were very friendly and polite they worked hard for Two full shifts so we are very satisfied with our new roof Thanks again

review_text: I ordered my daughters Nike high top on the 28/5/22They were to be delivered by UPS before 13/6/22. Still not arrived. No comms from UPS. I have spent over seven hours on the phone to UPS. Contacted Laced. NO REPLY!!!!! No one wants to know. Laced should be contacting UPS not me!!!! Poor customer service. Please contact me Laced.Funny how poor reviews are rarely replied to by Laced on here. I have no shoes and am £145 out of pocket. I shall be opening a case with my Bank if this is not resolved by next week and contacting Trades descriptions. I paid extra for delivery. Just feel really let down by Laced and UPS. Two peas in a pod. UPS have 89% 1 star reviews on Trust Pilot out of 18,000 left. Need I say any more……

name: ARK Group
description: Whatever you need to fix or install on your property, one call to our friendly family-run office is all it needs. No job is too big, or too small. We fix leaks, install and service boilers, electrical landlords testing and get the power back on. All with a smile, of course
review_text: I have had the pleasure to work alongside ARK now for over 5 years and i could not recommend a more professional and helpful service.  Always keeping you updated on works or progress making my job so much easier with our tenants and landlords.  Looking forward to working with ARK for many more years to come.

name: ARK Group
description: Whatever you need to fix or install on your property, one call to our friendly family-run office is all it needs. No job is too big, or too small. We fix leaks, install and service boilers, electrical landlords testing and get the power back on. All with a smile, of course
review_text: We used Ark Group to instal a home charging point for an electric vehicle. From first contact to completion of the installation, the people from Ark were first class. Everyone we had contact with was professional, competent and thorough.  The electricians who carried out the initial survey and the installation itself were excellent. They explained everything that needed to happen and kept us informed on progress throughout. The installation was not entirely straight forward, having to accommodate a lengthy cotoneaster bush, but this was completed successfully and to a high standard. I was also impressed with the quality and efficiency of the business processes Ark deployed, from the issue of the original quotation to handling the subsequent grant claim. I would definitely use Ark again for similar work in the future.

review_title: If you're a new customer, forget it, ARK doesn't want you
review_text: Used their website to request a Quote - heard nothing.  After several days had passed I phoned and was told that no website message had been received and that I should email.  Did so - I got a Delivery Receipt but heard nothing.  After a few more days had passed I phoned again to be told that no email had been received.  Office Administrator Emma offered to email me so I could reply to her.  Did so - Emma replied promptly that they weren't accepting any business from new customers.  This is not a company that deserves to succeed in business.  Take your custom elsewhere.

name: ARK Group
description: Whatever you need to fix or install on your property, one call to our friendly family-run office is all it needs. No job is too big, or too small. We fix leaks, install and service boilers, electrical landlords testing and get the power back on. All with a smile, of course
review_text: My review follows the same lines as the previous reviewer involving a recent EICR on my 5 year old flat. I too received an unsatisfactory report together with an expensive quote in order to obtain a satisfactory report. After an exchange of emails in which they conceded that certain items could be removed from the quote as they had not, in fact, been found to be unsafe and because I had the audacity to suggest they should waive their inspection fee as mistakes in their reporting had unfortunately been made (a reasonable request), the response from their manager became quite aggressive. I received the following comment from their manager, and I quote:"Please feel free to leave a review, it will stop private individuals using us which take up far too much of our precious time.Kind regards, James"I had a further report carried out by a different company and had a very different result.You have been warned!Just two points following your response, no emails have been deleted. I simply wrote a new email to try and simplify the salient points. Unfortunately this seems to have confused you. Secondly, the only time I didn't respond directly to you was following your last email, the text of which is quoted above. It didn't warrant a reply. The rest of your generic email sent to anyone who has dared to question you just confirms your attitude.

name: ARK Group
description: Whatever you need to fix or install on your property, one call to our friendly family-run office is all it needs. No job is too big, or too small. We fix leaks, install and service boilers, electrical landlords testing and get the power back on. All with a smile, of course
review_title: EICR check carried out through Romans
review_text: ARK was asked to carry an EICR check on my rented property by Roman's estate agent, as they are their approved contractor. The visit on 02.07.20 highlighted a change in the consumer unit and rated this C1/C2 which is in a potentially dangerous condition (522.6.202; 522.6.203) (You can only have one rating and not 2) at a cost of £480.00. Replacing the smoke alarms and a damaged double socket were correct at the time. They are members of NICEIC but use the NAPIT guidelines to code items that should be a C3 to a C1/C2 rating, revenue generation or what. I had to quickly go through the guidelines for NICEIC and get a reputable contractor in, as the flat is 12 years old and only required a modification was a RCD to improve the C3 rating.Thanks for your standard response and yes I am a responsible landlord, which is why I got the EICR check carried out by an honest electrician. The government guidelines allows unscrupulous companies to manipulate the guidelines, to suit themselves and am sure that landlords are also being scammed into doing a lot more work than is required.

review_text: This company was called in by my agent when my tenant had no hot water in the property. According to the tenant plumber arrived and seemed to not have an idea what the problem was. Eventually he replaced the thermostat on the immersion heater, two days later no hot water again, the contractor returned and this time replaced the heating element. Problem now solved after two visits and the excuse being that by replacing the element the thermostat failed. Unbelievable, and the cost of this £504 ! Never again.

name: pillowtalk.com.au
review_text: I bought  4 dining chairs from you and insured I could return them for a full refund. Upon  returning them,  I,discovered your assistant according to your store policy refused to refund MY money to my card because my card had been replaced it was not the same NUMBERS. It did not matter to your assistant that it was going into the same bank.   She told me it was the Law!  she was lying!!!  STOP TELLING YOUR STAFF TO LIEIt is just another archaic  store policy. She did try to hand me a gift voucher for $400 for Shop  after her lies and attitude and  my experience  - I will never shop there again.   To actuually expect people to have the same card and it Never be replaced is ridiculous - pay refunds  in cash like other big retailers.  Pillow talk obviously dont value my hard earned money.

name: pillowtalk.com.au
review_text: I recently purchased some candle holders from this company as in Melbourne we were in lockdown and no shops were open thats fine however they didnt suit as they were way too big than the actual size that I thought would go in this area so not sure whether i measured wrong or the product wasnt right thats fine I sent it back cost me $64.00 dollars to post back what a joke it wasnt even worth sending back however i reached out to this company and asked if there was an better way to send back to minimise costs to the customers as its hard for us to get out and shop and I got some generated response that is their policy and that's that no will offer you some kind of credit to shop with us or a discount something its dissapointing that a lot of these internet companies don't really care half the time all you get is an auto email response absolutely dissapointed, and now we are so glad we are out of lockdown cause definetely wont shop here I would rather walk in to a shop and get the service that we deserve

review_text: I'm hoping it's an isolated problem at the Crill Ave store. The service went first and now the food quality is catching up. Cashier didn't know how to give change back and we had to ask for ketchup and mustard. Then every table in the dining room was filthy. Later that day we both we're sick to our stomach.

I explained that I was on my own and didn’t want to have to take a drink in to the toilet. She refused to allow me to use the staircase and inferred that customers can’t be trusted to use the bathrooms first, they must place their order first even if they need to use the toilet!

Its like a more real chicken compared to mcdonalds. (its still not real chicken but its more than mcdonalds) I really recommend this place

review_title: Cost is great. Quality not so much. (best over order to throw away those which are not suitable for use)
review_text: cost and initial speed are great, However, there is no quality checking at the end of the line. Printed some business cards. Initially, random marks appeared all over the cards. After raising the issue on Saturday had to wait till Monday for someone to review then an additional 4 working days for new cards. When received. These also had some other issues: With embossed imprints of the guillotine clamp. If you're ordering from this company make sure you over-order to account for the bunch that you may as well toss in the bin...In reply to your reply... it should have been at least picked up at the time of printing or when packing before dispatch a quick look at the design vs what you're shipping to make sure it looks right..  why send out damaged product and waste everyone's time. Was hoping to use your services direct to customer.  But that would be a disaster with no one there to quality check.. perhaps a re evaluation of your end of line quality checking is required to avoid these issues in the future.. and rebuild trust in quality which should come first. No point getting something quick that is not fit for purpose. Do it properly!

review_title: A gem in the world of online print services
review_text: I have been a customer and fan of Tradeprint for over 6 years now, they have printed hundreds of jobs for me and my previous company and rarely ever put a foot wrong. If there ever was an issue it was dealt with in a quick and professional manner and I have never been left unsatisfied in any way. The quality of the service is second to none, I have been in the design and print industry for more than 30 years and can speak from experience.The online service is easy to use and the range of products is substantial, the prices are highly competitive and often the best available. The turnaround time is excellent and the finished product is always very good.Long may they continue.

review_title: Overall the print quality and price was good, delivery not so great
review_text: Print quality and price was good.   I was given useful help with submitting the design detail.   I was a bit disappointed with the time taken to print, despite being told 2days over the phone the printing took approximately 10 days to complete.  I also expected to be able to collect the printing but Tradeprint insisted on sending it by courier which caused further delay, cost to Tradeprint and negative environmental impact.  There were two packages, one of which was sent to the correct address, the other to a different address which meant I had to have it transferred myself.  Overall the printing service was good but I would be more careful to clarify the details next time.

Still waiting for an update from Tradeprint.

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_text: We recently purchased and moved into  a detached house at the Weavers , Winsford. We are delighted with our purchase.Our whole experience from start to finish has been excellent.Wendy and Ben on the sales team are professional, friendly and helpful, always available to answer any questions.We had a problem with the boundaries that were quickly and efficiently resolved by Simon Contracts Manager and Ian Site Manager.Sara in customer care was always available to answer any questions.Any minor problems with the property ie snagging list have been dealt with or are in hand.We would highly recommend Linden Homes at The Weavers, Winsford.Ray & Sue

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_title: The worst workmanship and customer service ever!
review_text: Completed in September 2020, shower started running through the ceiling. Took months to get sorted. Happened again. I've now got actual mushrooms spouting from the soaked skirting boards. The shower tray is on a slope. Apparently there's nothing wrong with it though. Plus the hellish smell coming from the bathroom. Not lindens problem apparently. I even bothering with their complaints procedure anymore, I'm going straight to a solicitor.

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_text: My daughter and her husband bought a linden homes house just over two years ago. They have had numerous problems including having to have a whole wall replastered because the finish was shocking. Now they have water coming through the ceiling of the downstairs toilet and have been told the house is out of warranty so it's not their problem. Don't ever but a Lindens property.

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_title: Although I have not proceeded with a…
review_text: Although I have not proceeded with a reservation,  I would like to highlight the extraordinary customer service given by Ben Malone at the Weavers site in Winsford. Always polite , friendly and helpful. Accommodating with video calls    as unable to visit in person. Nothing was too much trouble or a bother. Much appreciated his patience, understanding and professionalism. Thank you Ben.

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_text: Poor service. We moved to our new build in July 2018 after just giving birth and 3 years later, our kitchen is still not completed. We have constantly asked the team when this is being completed and we have people come out to finish the kitchen, but they turn up with the wrong materials and say it is a 2-3 man job that will take majority of the day - rather than a quick job they were made to believe.Longacre Basingstoke cannot hold a site manager and the staff rotation is awful. No wonder there has been no consistency with our experience. Fed up, and just want a finished kitchen.

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_title: Great experience at Walton Peaks, Chesterfield.
review_text: What a great experience I have had with Linden Homes! From when I first reserved in February 2022 at Walton Peaks, Chesterfield, to moving in on 1st April (the house was already built and nearly finished) the whole thing has been a great, smooth and pleasant journey. David in the Sales Office was constantly in touch with me before I moved in, and has been ever since, just to check that everything is okay. This really does make the world of difference. Yes, there have been a few snags (same as any new house) but nearly all these were rectified in the first month. Nothing is too much trouble and I would highly recommend them. The quality of the workmanship is great (had a new build before and although a much higher value house with higher quality kitchen etc, the workmanship there was very poor and shoddy - so consequently, I knew what to look for in terms of poor workmanship and finishing - AND I'm rather picky!!!) Well done guys, you've certainly got everything right!

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_text: Reserved a house with Linden, based on the show home and photos provided. Following this, we were then pressured to sign off the reservation form and align a solicitor and get a mortgage offer in place (even though the house isn’t due for 7 months). Following this, we met the builder, in which it showed half the house was tile hanging, which isn’t what we wanted to purchase. We were then offered an alternate option, which we asked them to progress with, only to be told they couldn’t offer it (a week later, they put it on the market at a higher price). We lost out on £500 solicitor fees, as although we asked them to show us the exact house they did not. Extras pricing was also excessive, clearly more intent on a small profit than any sort of customer satisfaction.

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_title: Where do I start absolute terrible…
review_text: Where do I start absolute terrible builder....5 months on from moving into the property and we are still having snagging works done.Poor workmanship has gone into this property from start to finish.Never would i buy a new build from this builder.

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_text: Love our new home, great experience From start to finish. Site manager excellent.

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_text: Really good experience, site manager stays in constant touch to make sure everything is going well. lots of little items cleared and repaired with little to no fuss. Highly recommended

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_text: Worse company on earth. Utterly useless. Don’t spend your money with them.

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_text: Honesty avoid this folks . Very substandard material. Everything falling apart. When you contact them , they respond like you are crap. Visited my friends new houses, you then realise Linden home design is a joke. What a difference. I will be definitely selling this house. Thank God house prices goes up irrespective of design .

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_title: I had an extremely good experience
review_text: I had an extremely good experience. Everything I’d imagined become reality when I bought the house at Linden homes Redcar. From day one the sales adviser Ben and Jack were fantastic. It was a pleasure to deal with them. They show a level of care for the customers. As I was a first-time buyer Ben guided me and kept informing me, so everything went through very smoothly and easily. They talked to me through everything about anything going on here.  When I moved here the site managers Kevin and Carl asked if I need anything and if everything is ok, and if I asked them about anything they sorted it out. Although it’s still under construction, they are doing well and keeping it clean. I like the yellow and red houses and the road around them is very nicely paved. My house is a good size and has a good size garden. It’s conveniently designed with a parking space for two cars. I love the whole site and my neighbor. I can’t believe that I live in such a beautiful house. I would recommend moving here for both the standard of the home and value for money.Gosia

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_title: Had a wonderful experience with Linden…
review_text: Had a wonderful experience with Linden Homes. The sales team and after care team were second to none and I can't fault the process at all

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_text: As if you took away a garden built for the passing of four boys who sadly got there lives took from them!You can’t build over a memorial garden!No wonder the mother is upset. Disgusting behaviour!

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_title: Some of the worst after care service…
review_text: Some of the worst after care service I've ever known for any product or service, let alone one which represents the biggest investment I'm ever likely to make. Very badly informed staff from start to finish. Blatant lies regarding obvious problems with the property. Constant avoidance tactics in rectifying problems. Untidy and unprofessional contractors sent to fix problems. Obviously its the property and price point that will decide wether or not you buy with Linden but literally every stage of the purchase and after care has been a litany of problems.

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_text: Never buy a house from these lying unscrupulous scumbagsWe have 140 snagging problems on our home, we have been fighting for 4 1/2 years to get them sorted. The warranty is not worth the paper it is written on. Nhbc say linden are liable, linden says nhbc have to fix it, no one fixes it!!Our porch is hanging off, the electric is wired wrong, there is no  rain water goods under the garage, the earth wire was not attached to the gas and electric meters, if you turn the electric off for upstairs the electric partly goes off downstairs and not upstairs at all. The flue for the boiler is at an angle so rain water runs into the boiler, the extractor fan pipes were non existent in the loft causing a fire hazzard, the windows are fitted incorrectly   and were supposed to be grey but turned up onsite white so they sprayed them, now they are peeling and look like a Friesian cow. Toilets aren’t level, door handles aren’t level, light switches aren't level or they are damaged, i could go on but whats the point, they are able to build substandard houses and get away with it,because  it says on their blurb that they dont have to build quality, i wish we has never brought this house, its been too stressful to call home.

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_text: We have had so many issues that we would never buy off Linden again.There were so many snagging issues and things that weren't put right. The workmanship in genral was shoddy, trowel marks on walls, cupboards not straight, cupboards dinted or scratched, door frames made with MDF so super soft, dinted easily and can't be sanded down and easily repaint. All the interia doors are hollow and cheap. Oven and hob very cheap, the oven leaks water onto the floor, the fan above the hob just circulates the air and isn't a extractor fan. The hob was completely scratched after a few weeks as there weren't any pads to protect it.I have had workmen back to redo jobs which have made a worse job than the original.The drainage is also a nightmare and our downstairs toilet and ensuite shower are continually blocked so much so we can no longer use the downstairs toilet. The pipe for this runs all the way under the house at pretty much a level angle and the flush isn't powerful enough to shift anything down it.The site manager was cocky and arrogant when I wrote an average survey they gave me as jobs hadn't been completed and told me people who ticked 'wouldn't by again' boxes didn't get any work done. As soon as the showhome office closed all support ceased and emails from us or any of the neighbouring houses were ignored.It is worth noting that my husbands previous new build, with a different provider, didn't have a single problem. We love the house layout and plot but it stops there.

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_title: I have just had the most pathetic and…
review_text: I have just had the most pathetic and discourteous treatment by the sales and guy at Hanstead Park sales office and I only went in to make a sales enquiry as a genuine buyer - now I wouldn’t touch them . I went in without an appointment which is ‘against policy’ but he squeezed me in . Everything sold off plan this year apart from a few houses and the one I was interested in the show home was off limits until the oven had been replaced ??!! Ok fair enough , I had to beg to have a look through the window and the young guy concerned had no sense of making me feel comfortable, totally unhelpful arrogant and in the ‘computer days no’ mold. So I went back 10 mins later with my family and he outright refused to let my wife look through the window - ‘not I can’t let you do it again’??!! What arrogance and a control freak . ‘I have a teams meeting now and can’t allow it’ how that can affect my wife looking through a window was beyond me ? I was so outraged that it got a little more heated as he made no effort to smooth things and have no explanation other than ‘company policy & health and safety which was rubbish. These guys are inexperienced and have no idea how to deal with customers. This is the service and attitude you can expect from these muppets - see all other reviews . Good riddance

name: Linden Homes
description: Linden Homes has a wide selection of new houses and apartments for sale across the UK. Find your new home today!
review_title: New home - sold with hole in roof- Harrington Park, Exeter
review_text: Don't do it. I am disgusted at the customer service and finish quality. My colleague bought his first home at Harrington Park, Exeter. There is a hole in the roof, fibre hanging off the property, a dent in the door and paint on the handle. Someone called Lauren at Linden is not taking him seriously with the biggest purchase he will ever make in his life. Disgusted. Linden just want his money, not his happiness. A job badly done And you cut down all the mature trees on the edge of the quarry site♻️

name: Swimears
review_text: These are the best swim earplugs I have ever worn.  I've tried many others and these are by far the best.  They keep water out of your ears very well, are well made and I really like the elastic cord that goes around your neck so that you can easily take them out while on the pool deck and not have to worry about having a place to put them.  A nice feature is that the insides of my ears stay warmer than with other earplugs that I've worn when the water temperature is on the cooler side.

review_text: I've been using Sentinel every time I fly from LBA for last few years. They are head and shoulders above any other parking company I've used in the past. My last holiday was reduced by a week due to Ryanair cancelling my return flight. I got in touch with Sentinel via Google chat and let them know I will be back early, they responded that they have noted and will be waiting for me when I'm back. I knew that Sentinel owed me a little for returning early but I thought I won't even bother as I was already exhausted after arguing with Ryanair about money they owed me for not providing seats that I paid for. I was pleasantly surprised when I picked up my car key and was told that they owe me for remaining days, I just had to ring them following day to confirm bank details and refund was there next day.

name: Legendfinancial
description: Legend Financial
review_text: I used JC Legend to reclaim stamp duty which was over its 3 year lapse period having sold a property. I was doubtful that the full amount would be recoverable. I met with JC and was given full confidence that a proportion or the full amount could be recoverable, subject to some considerable ground work which he undertook on my behalf. JC was so confident he even suggested a no win no fee contract which I was delighted with. A very fair percentage was agreed before hand and considering the amount of work involved, I was happy to proceed. To my dismay and within 1 month of filing my application, I was called by JC who delivered the good news that the full amount had been recovered and will credit my account within 2 days. I really couldn’t believe it when I saw the full amount back in my account and just had to call JC sharing my happiness.All in all, JC is a legend, a softly spoken gentleman, punctual and to his word. Utterly professional. Couldn’t recommend him highly enough.Regards,Avy

review_text: This company is so cool! My dad and I were helping my 95-year-old grandfather order a new wheelchair last week. He lives in New York and the store he usually goes to has been closed because of COVID-19. We tried ordering from them over the phone, but the person who answered said his model was back ordered and couldn't recommend a good substitute. We were so frustrated, but I eventually found Tomorrow Health online, so we gave it a try and LOVED it! The insurance calculator makes it so easy, they had his model in stock, and they were super responsive over the phone. The best part is that the wheelchair arrived two days later and my grandfather said he received the nicest check-in call from Tomorrow Health :)

name: Car Chem
review_text: Ordered 2 mystery boxes so can try their products got 2 boxes the same. Company posted on Facebook stating only 30 boxes out of 5k this way, yet nearly 2 dozen complaints about it. Reckon alotore than 30. Also sent 2 dirt bike products for a mystery car biz. Sent them a DM and never responded.Very poor show, not as advertised as said all boxes different.Crap customer service.In fairness tried the waterless lotus initially thought okay but after a few days think not.Will try it again and see what rest of products are like.Boxes are good value for money I agree with that but customer service is rubbish. Got no faith in the company.Posted on FB following complaints to saying will not reply to individuals bit if you contact them directly they would respond.Nothing, narda, no reply.I'd atleast expect a replyThey should take the feedback as constructive Criticism and not hide.The principal fore re duplicates is false advertising. Don't state all boxes different when clearly they ain't tThere were several off us who ordered 2 boxes and got the exact same products.Had they not stated this would have only purchased one box.Feel let down

review_text: Great products, the mystery box promotion was amazing value. Not sure why people are giving negative reviews about the delivery times, mixed up tracking numbers etc, you can clearly see from the order info that was Royal Mails issue being short staffed during a pandemic.

review_text: Great products and amazing customer serviceFirst time I have used car chem products and just finished using them on my car. They work really well and smell amazing. I ordered two kits and unfortunately one kit had leaked in transit. Had a reply to my e mail in no time and sorted straight away. Thank you!

name: Car Chem
review_text: Hello dear friendsI am very impressed and disappointed when I see so many positive recommendations from this company. I want to tell you what I thought was really a very good company, yes, it left me disappointed because I placed an order.  The first time I bought and until today I did not receive the order I ordered on 13.09 .2020.  I ordered Interior Clean for the 20L car, which some friends have told me is a good company and a high quality product and it will be better to work with this product.  I paid a delivery fee which I ordered within 48 hours and to no avail.  It hurts me more that I have to disappoint my clients and cancel all the things and services I offer for a few days and, of course, lose a penny that these days is very hard to earn. I tried to call the company directly.  I was told that it would be clarified and the order would be sent as soon as possible.  After a few days, he was still in the company on Friday morning between 9 and 10 o'clock.  by the number of deliveries by mail, but unfortunately I did not receive anything.
