name: Ultimate Ears
description: In August 2008, Ultimate Ears was acquired by Logitech, and operates as a subsidiary.
review_title: good speaker until it stops working but horrible customer service
review_text: horrible customer service. sent them my amazon invoice, a photo of the ticket number they gave me and my name on a paper with my face in it, the serial number etc again and agaim cuz they told me they cant open the files, then i sent them a screenshot of everything and they said it had to be original files, we had the conversation of me sending it again and again just for them deny my request to replace or get fixed a speaker that has valid warrants and told me "they dont need to explain why". after me asking again they ended up saying it needed to be a video, i took a video of me showing them the photo of me holding the ticket number, the invoice, the serial number, my face again, just for them to tell me theyre denying it again. it is so sad cuz when the speaker was working the quality was so amazing but i need to know i can get help on a product that has warranty instead of them saying "we're denying it and i dont need to tell you why" after weeks of emailing back and forth for them to keep requesting new things everytime

name: Ultimate Ears
description: In August 2008, Ultimate Ears was acquired by Logitech, and operates as a subsidiary.
review_title: It's right what they say ... terrible customer service
review_text: It's right what they say: terrible customer service!!!!My Boom 2 speakers suddenly stopped working. At first they answered my e-mails. They asked me to provide them with a lot of details, like serial #'s, etc. So I did. It took me some time to fill out everything. Since then they just ignore my e-mails. I asked them if they needed more information, no response, I initiated a new issue, no reply. I answered their e-mails, no reply.I bought two Boom 2 speakers and I am not able to use them, so I will have to switch brands. If you ever thought of buying an Ultimate Ears product, I have only one advice: don't!

name: Ultimate Ears
description: In August 2008, Ultimate Ears was acquired by Logitech, and operates as a subsidiary.
review_title: Amazing Sound Until It Stopped Working & Poor Customer Service
review_text: Got 2 Boom 2 speakers. I could not beleive the amazing sound quality and the build seemed ecellent. Expensive but reall good. Sadly though I cant give 5 stars. Although amazing speakers, they always had connection issues. Now one has stopped charging and wont give out sound. Only 4 months old. Contacted Ultimate Ears under the warranty and they fobbed me off with repair a company in India even though I am in the UK.Terible customer service.

name: Ultimate Ears
description: In August 2008, Ultimate Ears was acquired by Logitech, and operates as a subsidiary.
review_title: Lots to do, hi costs, no results
review_text: I have a need for good and effective hear protection for motorcycling. Ordered plugs with filters - £85 + £5(postage). Then I learnt I have to go and make ear impressions - £25. Then I had to post impressions to the company - £7.60. Then and only then Ultimate Ears said: "Please allow a maximum of 20 working days for our standard service." I complained - they requested even more money: "we do have express services available at an additional cost. 5 day @ £25.00 & 48 hours @ £45.00"At the moment I'm stuck with total of £122.6 spent  with nothing for at least a month. I'm not happy with the service. Still I don't know how effective is all of that effort against the money?Update: Received email confirmation about plugs being posted to me after 8 calendar days from the day they received the impressions. They used 48 hrs Royal Mail service. Awaiting delivery now. I have received plugs after 10 calendar days from the day they received the impressions. They fit well - in the room. Facts: Ultimate Ear kept me well infirmed (by email) on every step: appointment booked, what to do next, confirmation of impressions receipt, plugs dispatch.Update after practical test on motorbike and performance comparison: Today I have taken Ultimate Ears plugs for a ride first time. Initial impression was so-so. However, after about 15 minutes wearing helmet my ears started hurting. Nevertheless I continued riding slower, faster, listening to navigation instructions, having phone calls. After 1:15 hrs I had enough. I could not bear pressure and hurting filling any more in both ears. I stopped and replaced plugs with Bollsen Moto+, German plugs I used till now. I was hugely surprised. It felt much better, comfy, sound clear when riding high speeds wearing German plugs. Unfortunately wearing Ultimate Ears plugs for 1:15 hrs was painful, sound un-comfy (high sound pressure felt). As a result I have finished the planned ride (another 1:15 hrs) wearing German plugs with relief. Due to the last update I have no choice but fairly (based on my experience) drop the rate to single star.

name: Ultimate Ears
description: In August 2008, Ultimate Ears was acquired by Logitech, and operates as a subsidiary.
review_title: Quality sound with a sleek design
review_text: Quality sound with a sleek design. Owned the mega boom for over 3 years and still going strong with heavy use. Looks, feels and sounds class…it’s up there with the best. I will definitely invest in another product from Ultimate ears when the time comes!

name: Ultimate Ears
description: In August 2008, Ultimate Ears was acquired by Logitech, and operates as a subsidiary.
review_text: Absolutely shocking service!! Purchased the Hyperboom about 9 months ago, stopped working all of a sudden. Contacted customer service to report it as under warranty. They replied days later with various ways of how to fix it. Explained to them we couldn't carry out what they had suggested as it wouldn't turn on. They then said they would replace it. This took weeks! We were then given a date, it didn't show up, then another date, no show agsin, then another date, still didn't turn up. We were then told by Ups that they thry the speaker was stolen by the courier/driver. We then reported this to Ultimate Ears who said we couldn't have a replacement till this had been investigated.  This is NOT our problem. Emails back and forth have been days in between to get a reply. No help at all. This is a terrible service considering how expensive this speak is. Its been roughly 3 months since our speaker broke and we still have no speaker. Shocking!!!

name: Ultimate Ears
description: In August 2008, Ultimate Ears was acquired by Logitech, and operates as a subsidiary.
review_text: With a 100% satisfaction return policy, this company does not deliver.  The UE Fits product was ordered and after numerous back and forth chats with tech decided to return product since it was not satisfactory and did not live up the "promise" that UE claimed.  I returned them promptly.  I received a "confirmation of the returns and refund" but since I paid using the AFFIRM payments, they claim to have reimbursed AFFIRM.  Since there were AFFIRM payments by me still pending, my credit card continued to be charged a month after return the headphones.  Affirm says they never received the refund from Ulitmate Ears.  Ultimate Ears continues two months later to keep saying that I need to contact Affirm.  Which I have, many times.  And no luck. What gives?  I've never had such a horrible refund process for anything.

name: Ultimate Ears
description: In August 2008, Ultimate Ears was acquired by Logitech, and operates as a subsidiary.
review_text: Very unhappy with the fit of this product. My ears are too small, I guess? Customer service is prompt yet completely unhelpful.

name: Ultimate Ears
description: In August 2008, Ultimate Ears was acquired by Logitech, and operates as a subsidiary.
review_text: I have had a number of custom moulds over the years for headphones or noise protection, using Snugs and ACS.This product was cheaper so I thought I would give them a try, but I will only deal with ACS or Snugs now in future.First issue was ear mould place I was sent to advising I had been quoted the wrong price and this continued to happen to customers after they had provide feedback. Awkward.My product then took 5 weeks to arrive and the mould for the canal was far too long. They advised this was how they made them, but almost impossible to get full into ear and very uncomfortable.They were the sent back but just really poor workmanship compared to the other versions I have received. Also very small holes for any music to come through compared to other products.Add to that really poor customer service where they don't respond to emails and a general lack of communication or empathy when I sent these back in, not happy at all really.I was also promised a refund on mail costs, but this hasn't happened.

name: Ultimate Ears
description: In August 2008, Ultimate Ears was acquired by Logitech, and operates as a subsidiary.
review_title: I purchased UE fits earbuds as a…
review_text: I purchased UE fits earbuds as a Christmas gift for my son. When he opened up the earbud case, one of the earbud tips looked crushed, while the other one looked like it had a hairline crack ( not easily seen on a picture). I used the live chat option, sent the representative pictures as requested and was told that they didn’t look damaged. Representative went on to say that the tips look like this during the custom fitting process. I might believe this if my son had actually started the fitting process, but he didn’t once he realized that the tips looked damaged, which I relayed back to the representative. We were told to start the molding process and reach back out with further questions. Earbuds are non returnable once they are custom molded! Not helpful, considering the price I paid. They could have, at the very least, offered to send out replacement tips. I won’t be ordering from this company again after I purchase replacement tips!

name: Ultimate Ears
description: In August 2008, Ultimate Ears was acquired by Logitech, and operates as a subsidiary.
review_text: Was buying the Logitech Ultimate Ear Wonderboom 2 and was chocked to experience that every time I am going to start and turn off the speaker must hear unnecessary very loud launching sound which can not be turned off from the user.I was contacting this company and they told me that there is no solution to turn off this sound from their side.Funny thing that other products from this company can be set through an app but this speaker cannot be managed with app.My question an such a big-name company why you cannot offer the possibility to turn off such annoying sound.Do your designer engineers do test such product in quite places or night pairing in mind that some people might sleeping in the surrounding where such speaker are tending to be used.It is hard for me to give a low star valuation hence the speaker have a good quality but if customer are not satisfied wit all function then it is a bitty that is why i am giving 2 stars only .1 question about the price policy of this company different colours might have variation from 10 to 50 euros is this normal?I am happy that I was able to return the speaker back and I cannot recommend buying it unless you are living in very loud surrounding and you do not care about extra noise factor in your surroundings.

Its had pretty much daily use on a building site and I've dropped from 3 meters onto hard ground twice and all's still good (I'm sure this isn't recommended though). I hope their later products are as good as this is what good design looks like!

review_title: I Live By UE Boom Speakers
review_text: My daughter purchased me at UE Boom 2 years ago, which prompted me to purchase a Megaboom.  Several years later I purchased a UE Boom 3 and Megaboom 3.  A few months ago I purchased another UE Boom 3 and Megaboom 3 which totaled 6 UE speakers.This past Father's Day my kids bought me a Hyperboom.  That speaker blew away my other speakers hands down.  I thoroughly endorse this product after years of using it.  I am not always crazy about their app, especially since they Logitech for some unknow reason refuses to develop an app for computers.  But I can't say enough about my UE Boom experience.

name: Ultimate Ears
description: In August 2008, Ultimate Ears was acquired by Logitech, and operates as a subsidiary.
review_text: UE Megaboom 3 is a disappointment. In spite of the marketing on Ultimate Ears Website with terms such as "Way more boom" and "Thundering bass" and trying various equalizer settings on the Official App, the "Megaboom 3" Speaker objectively has less bass response (particularly lower end bass) and subjectively poorer sound quality (in terms of clarity and definition) than my old Ultimate Ears Boombox purchased in 2013.Given the disparity between the marketing claims, the online reviews -vs- my own experience. I can't help thinking that some of the glowing video reviews over the internet about the Megaboom 3 have possibly been paid for as part of possible astroturfing campaign. We will probably never know.The speaker has been returned to the retailer for a full refund. In the process, another customer over heard the conversation between me and the store rep only to affirm that he too was disappointed at the lack of bass and which he likewise returned as well (with another retailer).Unfortunately, due to the gravity of the situation, I'm in no position to consider nor recommend any UE branded products going forward and it has adversely affected my trust and regard toward the parent brand, Logitech.

review_text: I am a longtime MetroFax customer. I use faxes infrequently, but at times it can be essential. The online fax service is easy to use and stores all of my previous faxes. I also get email alerts that a fax has either been received or sent. Although the rates to increase from time to time, MetroFax is easy to work with and will work with you to maintain a rate that works for you. I have been very pleased with this service. Their customer service is great also. Although I prefer to speak with a human being, they only now offer chat support. No worries! My recent chat with Lyra went smoothly and I still felt that same level of personal support that I would have had we been speaking on the phone. She answered all of my questions without that "scripted" response that so often happens when chatting. Give MetroFax a try. You won't be disappointed!

review_title: My order got sent to the wrong address
review_text: My order got sent to the wrong address. They tried to blame me saying I entered the wrong address when that was not the case. They then said I had to go and collect my order myself or pay for a new one. Disgusting service and a disappointed 4 year old

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_text: For Christmas 2022 I ordered my son the big yellow crane. Fantastic item - he adores it. Recently, probably due to over excited toddler use, one of the turning wheels came lose which meant he couldn't wind the winch back up. I emailed Mulbery Bush asking if I could buy a replacement part. The following week we got a surprise parcel in the mail. Let me tell you, Mulberry Bush went above and beyond with the replacement item. Little boy absolutely over the moon! Top company! Highly recommend!!

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_title: I ordered a puzzle from Mulbery Bush…
review_text: I ordered a puzzle from Mulbery Bush and was disappointed when it did not come. On further investigation we discovered I had put the wrong address on it and hadn’t read the confirmation order which showed the incorrect address I had put.Thanks to Mulberry Bush for their patience whilst we discovered what had happened. Top tip don’t order late at night.

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_title: Possibly the worst shopping decision I…
review_text: Possibly the worst shopping decision I ever made. My elderly mum showed me the catalogue and we choose things for my girls for Christmas. It seemed so cute I sent ideas to my mother in law. EVERYTHING MY CHILDREN GOT WAS TOTAL RUBBISH AND BROKE/DIDNT WORK. TOTAL RIP OFF. Childrens bows and arrows.. didn’t fire even 5cm let alone a meter!! Just flopped down.The Cats and dogs umbrella broke on first opening the plastic was so flimsy!The pogo sticks have such stiff springs that they don’t bounce at all! Or even move!The children hair highlights did nothing not a jot of colour on their hair!The volcano didn’t erupt! It was rubbishThe sea scope is totally useless you can’t see anything. We called and complained about the bows ( the other gifts hadn’t been played with opened by then) and they said if we send them back they will refund my mother in law. She received nothing.( see below)Hundreds of wasted pounds and disappointed children. Do not buy from this scam company!!! I feel sick at the total waste of human time, and landfill rubbish!!!******And in reply to your answer below about not selling this stuff, that’s total rubbish!!!! I have photo shots from you website!  If trust pilot would let me post them I would. You may have changed you catalogue since Christmas which is handy eh! And sorry yes, my mother in law did find the refund on her account so that’s a small positive. Please take time to try and use the stuff you sell it!

description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_text: Great friendly service! Ordered on the phone and they dispatched straight away for next day delivery.

description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_text: We were so pleased with the 'Zoo Building Blocks' that we looked again at Mulberry Bush Toys for our great niece's Christmas present & fell in love with Oldfield Farm & opted for the bundle which seemed excellent value. Received it today, without unpacking it, it all looks to be every bit as good as we'd hoped & we're sure it will be a hit on Christmas morning.

description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_title: Excellent experience I have to share...
review_text: This is my 2nd purchase from Mulberry Bush. When I recently encountered an issue with my items not being delivered (by Royal Mail), Andrea was on hand to help, to make sure I received my order in time for Christmas. All 3 wooden toys all arrived the next day. Amazing outstanding customer service by Mulberry Bush Ltd. I will definitely be shopping here again. My Granddaughter absolutely loved her new wooden toys, such good quality. Thank you so much!

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_text: Lovely items, delivered quickly. Placed my first order this Christmas and will likely use again.

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_text: With our TNT parcel full of grandkids Christmas presents lost in transit, one call to Mulberry Bush made our Christmas.  They turned around a full list of toys, packaged and sent to arrive the next day....just before Santa.Our number one go to shop in the future.  ThanksHappy grandparents

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_text: Absolutely ludicrous postage charges. They offer free delivery but only over the £75 mark which is very high! They say they offer returns but these are not free and no returns labels are provided; these have to be printed out by you so impossible if you don’t have a printer. You also have to foot the bill for postage yourself and if your return brings you back under 75 they take £4 postage off your refund!!!!! I’ve sent back a £19 toy and only ended up getting back £11 (they refunded £15 having reclaimed their original ‘free’ postage and it cost me £4 to return) not to mention the inconvenience of actually organising the return. Very poor way to treat customers who are spending a lot of money.

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_title: This was my first order with this…
review_text: This was my first order with this company and most certainly will not be the last. Very quick and efficient. I ordered a Poppy Rag Doll and it arrived very quickly and very well packed. I will definitly shop again as there is such a good choice of toys for varying ages. Thank you.

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_text: I recently bought Le Grand Garage with Vehicle Bundle for my 2 year old grandson .( I'd previously ordered a toy garage from another company and was very disappointed, parts missing, less solid and poorer quality, - it was subsequently returned).Having spoken with very helpful Paul at Mulberry Bush about this wooden garage, I ordered it. Delivery was prompt, the items were beautifully wrapped/protected and construction instructions very clear.( took me a couple of hours).The garage is absolutely beautiful, a really superior product and definitely worth the money paid.  The component parts are sturdy & strong and the detail of it, and the vehicles are delightful.The joy on my grandson's face as he opened his present was priceless. He has spent many hours playing with his garage and at the moment is getting particular joy out of filling the cars with petrol!I expect this garage will be a favourite toy for a long time to come. I know the importance of making the right decision when spending this amount of money and as such, I have no hesitation in recommending this garage (and vehicles) to other customers.

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_text: Wonderful Sunday lunch. The staff went out of their way to look after our large group of 10 in the upstairs dining room. One of the best pub roasts I have had, with great service.

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_title: Excellent company and I return to use them again
review_text: I purchased the Cherry Tree Hall wooden dolls house for my 3 year old grand-daughter for Christmas with accessories from this company and cannot rate them highly enough.  The website was easy to use, delivery excellent and prompt and the house and accessories were well packed for shipment.  The bundle package offered by the Mulberry was excellent as it worked out cheaper than buying the accessories required for the house separately.The wooden toys from Le Toy Van range are excellent and well made and are played with daily as they are loved by my grand-daughter (I will write a separate review on the companies profile).  This was one excellent Christmas present (expensive but worth it)!  Would highly recommend this company, their delivery and customer service.  I will be returning again for future purchases.

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_text: Thank you for your reply to my review. There are a couple of points with which I take issue. The "dexterity" which you note is a requirement to use the toy is beyond the ability of the children and therefore they will not learn from it. I found it impossible to balance half of the figures included. As for the question of refund or exchange: in my phone call asking to return the item, I asked for a credit note so that I could purchase goods of equal value. There seemed little point in a replacement with the same failings; I was told the options were exchange or refund, and so I had no real choice. May I suggest a "No Quibble" returns policy should include a third option, alternative replacement(s), post free in both directions (ie in returning the item which fails to meet requirements, and for alternative selections to the same value). On my budget, I cannot afford to purchase educational items if this involves a loss every time an item does not meet the requirements.

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_text: The speed of delivery and quality of the item received was first class. I will definitely be using the site again, and will be recommending to my family and friends. A brilliant find on the Google search engine.!

name: Mulberry Bush Ltd
description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.
review_text: I recently came across Mulberry Bush Ltd having received one of their catalogues in the post. I loved the great range of thoughtfully selected toys and decided to place an order for a couple of items for my Granddaughter's birthday. I was pleasantly surprised at the great customer service I received. The phone was answered promptly and the lady who took my order was very polite, friendly and efficient. My parcel arrived in the timescale I was quoted. The parcel was well packed and the items I ordered were of a very good quality at a competitive price. Thank you Mulberry Bush I will be ordering again.

description: Traditional Toys and Games, Wooden Toys, Childrens gifts and Children's games, girls and boys toys, Mulberry Bush, online Toy Shop.

This gives everyone the opportunity to trade without doubt and earn money while they are learning.Our Live Trading Room is open every day and allows people to develop a community of traders, learn how to trade better, and take every trade that the moderators take. It makes it easy for beginner and advanced traders to be profitable in the world of binary options. There are no gimmicks, just quality trading and training.
review_text: I'm in at least 6 paid groups for Binary, I just found these guys 3 weeks ago and I can confirm they are something else and by far the best, they don't waste time or bragging about Lambo's or selling you dreams, they are very legit, They come in the charts ready you don't waste a minute, everyday between 9am-9:30am EST they trade live and you can trade with them easily without wasting a minute, they make at least 6-8 winning trades in a row, even if you never traded in your life you can make money copying the trades they do live in front of your eyes, I witnessed sometimes they did 13 wins in 30min just before US market opens. I never seen them lose money during a session yet, I think the guy David is a genius or something, this is not natural how he predicts the market behavior within seconds. Anyways I just wanted to share my honest experience using their platform to show my gratitude towards these guys and maybe it can help someone, since they are still new they don't have lot of people yet so I'm taking advantage of it by asking all the questions I had about this industry for the past 2 years during the live Q&As they often do after a trading session, they are very knowledgeable and transparent and share with you reality as is which often not the case with many in this forex world. They also have 2 tiers of memberships, I'm only using the basic one for now as I'm already getting more than I can dream of, in other groups if you get 2 wins within 60 min session you would be happy. Also they are still running a very low rate probably to get people to sign up, I respectfully don't want to say the rate to don't upset people in the future that will be reading my comment as I'm sure these guys will be getting popular soon and memberships will be at least as expensive as for the other groups which is the norm. I'm beyond happy for this opportunity, finally I found groups that aligns exactly with what I was looking for since I started my part time trading journey! Blessing!Regards, Am

name: NICOTINE UK
review_title: These guys have lost my nicotine packages TWICE…
review_text: These guys have lost my packages TWICE now and refused to refund or re-ship.A long time back I ordered from them, Royal Mail lost the package, they refused to replace it, so I disputed with Paypal and got the money back. I decided to give them a second chance and order again, they got it through to me this time (although it took some time). So I decided to give them a third chance, placing a larger order in March 2022. I waited and waited, packages were taking months because of all this COVID nonsense. By June I emailed them several times asking for a shipping tracking number, a re-shipment, or a refund AND they ignored me completelyThey get two stars because their Nicotine is actually quite good. If you lived in the UK maybe they'll actually get your nicotine through to you BUT don't expect ANY level of customer service from them. Once they have your money they are totally unconcerned with helping you.

I will NEVER buy a rug from this company again because not only was I obligated to pay way too much $$ for the return, but the rep was very cold about it. name: The Rapacke Law Group
description: The Rapacke Law Group is a fixed-fee, full service intellectual property law firm specializing in patents, trademarks, and IP litigation.
review_text: I am very disappointed. I paid for my patent certificate on January 10th. Even though I paid $600 for this last stage of the patent process, Jessica will not take responsibility for at least double checking  with me regarding my mailing address before mailing out my original certificate. She sent it to a wrong address. I have been waiting for over 3 months and who knows when I will ever get my certified copy of my design patent. Of course, there was an initial handsome sum to submit an application for the patent itself. I have lost confidence in this firm.

review_text: Very happy with Rapacke! So glad we went with them. Great people, very helpful, quick turnaround, and great pricing model. I love when companies align their pricing with the incentive structure of their customers. And Rapacke did it right. I would give more than 5 stars if I could.

name: The Rapacke Law Group
description: The Rapacke Law Group is a fixed-fee, full service intellectual property law firm specializing in patents, trademarks, and IP litigation.
review_title: Never use this Law Group all they want is your money
review_text: What I will do here is tell you my experience and I like you to judge for yourself if you should use the Rapacke, Law Group . I have over 7 patents, my attorney retired so I needed a new patent attorney. I paid for a prior art patent search with The Rapacke Law Group. They came back with three publications but no patents, but the publication had references from the USPTO examiner so I asked for those and what do I get. They asked me to pay an additional $1000 for the examiner's references. I paid them to "perform a prior art search and prepare a prior art search report which includes a detailed explanation of the most relevant prior art that may affect thepatent-ability of your invention and various embodiments." I would say those references could affect the patent-ability of my product. You can decide if you want to use this Law Group. With 7 patents never had this happen. Then they tell me I have a 90% chance of getting a patent. Asked for additional money to file the patent without giving me the references.. I would never use them, you decide.Update, I found a new patent attorney, did a prior art search and they found five prior art for my patent idea Why didn’t Rapacke Group find them?. From those prior art findings I could never have gotten a patent. All Rapacke, Law Group wanted was my money. Stay far away from these guys.

review_text: Holy cow. I have NEVER experienced customer service like I did with Hand Me the Bag. Not only did my bag show up a whole day early, it was so beautifully wrapped and you can tell lots of care went into making sure it was protected during shipping. And when I had a problem customer service responded with in MINUTES and took care of me. I am flabbergasted. I shopped here a little skeptical but I couldn’t find the bag I liked on any other websites for a decent price and I am genuinely caught so off guard by how amazing my experience was that I’m gonna do Christmas shopping, birthday shopping, just because shopping, all of it on Hand Me The Bag.

name: PTC Phone Repairs
review_text: horrible one at orion "repaired" my iphone XS max only for me to get it back with a faulty power button and 6 weeks later the screen went black on me and wont turn on dont bring your phone here

name: PTC Phone Repairs
review_title: AVOID THIS COMPANY-the repair and customer care is abominable
review_text: My son, aged 13 , repaired his phone (new front)  only for it to last just over 4 weeks. He paid $160 total for the front and a sticker back. The phone died. I drove a 4 hour round trip to the Cairns Central booth, only to be told that it was likely the motherboard and nothing could be done. On my way home, I decided to stop at the local store ( I hadn't known it was there when I first got the repair done, or I would've used their services, they are highly professional, CIRCUIT TREE, MAREEBA.) They fixed the issue with the new screen. We called from the store and they informed Jay, who had sent me away from Central only to be told they will not honour a repair or a refund. Upon contacting head office, they refused also as I had got a third party to view it!So that said, I would avoid this company as they are clearly not doing the right thing by customers because anyone with good customer service skills would offer my child his refund. $160 is a lot for a 13 year to save up and this is clearly a hard lesson to learn, from a company that cares little for their customers.

name: PTC Phone Repairs
review_title: PTC Phone repair is a dubious and…
review_text: PTC Phone repair is a dubious and fraudulent phone repair agency. The charge for repairs they can't do and hide the clause for no warranty on repairs among several lines in their Terms & Conditions whch they make you to sign without telling you. Avoid the them. Worst experience was at their Ipswich branch

review_text: Fantastic service from start to finish From SMC, all done over the phone with a part ex so all I needed to do was drive down, swap cars and away I go. No fuss or stress and Jamie was great and extremely helpful. 10/10 will use again for all future car purchases

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_text: New Vehicle Warranty UnacceptableI have been a loyal and repeat customer of SMC Ford for several years.I am the driver of a brand-new Ford Fiesta Vignale 2021, apparently this is the top range for the Fiesta's and therefore you would not expect parts of the car to physically fall off.But that is exactly what happened with my car since April 22 been having issues with the driver door not closing properly and eventually the door protector unit physically fell out of the car and broke.Contacted SMC Ford Uxbridge and brought my car in to have this issue repaired was told would not be covered by the warranty as it was, and I quote "Snapped off".I protested that this was unacceptable eventually was told I will only be charged for the part at £36 at this point I have no choice as I needed the car returned and fully functional.On picking the car the next day and checking the door, found that the door protector hinge was hanging off, reported this and the car was returned to the workshop to rectify the situation.Over the last few days, the same component continuously comes of and needs to be physically replaced by myself.On Thursday 05 MAY 22, I received a feedback call from SMC Ford Uxbridge. I explained I was not satisfied and believe this should have been covered by the Warranty and that the part keeps coming off.Was told this would be reported to Manager and they would get back to me. As of yet have received no response from SMC Ford Uxbridge and therefore will be pursuing this case via the Local Trading Standards.I am very disappointed particularly with the get out tactic used to avoid honouring warranty in particular when parts fall off a car which is less than 12 months old.

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_text: We agreed a deal in September 2021. The delivery date kept being put back and we were eventually called to say car was available mid February. All this is fair enough given the current situation and we had no problem with this. But the agreed Finance deal was not honoured. They doubled the deposit and upped the monthly repayment by 15%. This is completely unacceptable behaviour. So we were left in a terrible situation. But have now sourced a Corsa. I have been a life long Ford buyer, after this experience I will never buy another Ford. Shameful from Ford.

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_text: first class service from smc crayford . went there this morning for a recall job , staff were very polite , efficient  ,prompt and professional ,went to pick my car up later and was surprised to find my car had been washed and valeted too ... 5star service

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_title: After buying my car from c Ford which I…
review_text: After buying my car from c Ford which I must say was a trouble free purchase and at tgat time was very pleased with the service , after it first year it went in for an mot came out no adviser's 2 months later went in for a service was told rear breaks both pads and discs were down to the Ford recommended minimum level and need replacing at a cost of £500 , well as knowing what I'm looking at I looked and could see there was plenty of meat on both the discs and pads , 1 year later and 8000 miles later my car went into an independent garage today for its yearly service I asked them to check the rear pads and discs , the pads were still 6% over the minimum Ford advisory and the discs were still 8% over so if that's a year on and with at least another 7k on them before they need changing why was I told a year ago they needed changing , glad I'm clued up on what I'm looking at and in the know your car sales are top class but your service department is 2nd class I'd never bring my car back to you for a service

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...

review_text: I've been in the logistics industry for 25 years and have never come across a dealership as useless as SMC Ford at Northfleet. We only used them while our Transits were under warrantee and am so glad we can use a professional workshop now. You are better off taking your vehicle to a zoo and getting it repaired!!!

description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_text: buy ford focus from smc uxbridge, first weak stop on road, luckily get start after 5 mins reach to garage they said its ok, coming next weak go for outing with family and suddenly brake paddle stops working on running road , some how i manage to stop car with handbrakes without any accident and wait there whole night for recovery. know car from 2 weaks in garage and nor get repaired. we spoil all our children hollidays without car totally disappointing service.

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_text: Dropped my car off at 8am, no communication from them at all, noone answering the phones. Popped in to the branch to find out the had done the wrong service on my vehicle (minor instead of major service).Was told the would do the major now sat here at 6pm and still no vehicle. Staff on the service department haven't got a clue, service manager couldn't give a dam about what's happened.

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_title: Thought buying from a professional well…
review_text: Thought buying from a professional well known dealership would be my best option, but I was wrong. Within less than 6 months of purchasing my vehicles It developed issues. From the front sensor ,to the air conditioning not working, to the boot not opening. I was unable to use my boot for almost a month. They also request that I pay for diagnostics and for the insurance for the courtesy car. I won’t recommend anyone to go to Ford services department uxbridge. The main sales department tried to resolve my issue but Dan in services department refused to help.  They treat you like nothing and as if you are stupid.

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_text: We bought a car less than 1 year ago from the Uxbridge branch from Alex Nottage. The car now had the second repair done - on our bill- that was not covered by the warranty and was not caused by any fault of ourselves. The first time we had the battery replaced because of a dying cell. Not our fault and evidently a faulty battery but we had to pay for it. 3 month on we are paying to replace a broken headlamp. We have had no accident or incidents with the car in the less than 1 year we owned it. We were clearly sold a faulty car. They also had to replace the alternator as it was not charging the battery any more, clearly after one year that should not happen and was clearly already a problem when we bought the car.They are scamming you out of your money!!!Alex Nottage is screening his calls to avoid talking to us. We also were told that we now have a crack in the windscreen and a nail in a tyre, things that we did not have before we handed our car over to be repaired. THEY DAMAGED THE CAR EVEN FURTHER AND PRETENDED IT WAS LIKE THAT WHEN THEY GOT IT. We had an MOT done only 1 day before towing the car to the Ford Dealership in Uxbridge and none of these issues were recorded by them. This is absolutely disgusting!You hand them your car to fix it and they make sure you get it back with even more faults.AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!!!!!!

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_title: SMC Ford Cowley Road are Exceptional
review_text: Had a major issue with my car. Was not safe to drive. I turned to SMC Ford on Cowley Road. They got me on the road quickly. Excellent, polite service. Kept informed all the way through. They also did me a favour. Will definitely return, when needed. Some companies and individuals know customer service. Combine the two and you have a winning combination.

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_text: I’ve lost more money dealing with this ford store then I ever thought possible.Had nothing but problems with a factory new ranger. Worse truck I’ve ever had.Just kept getting passed between staff who knew nothing about the situation or who just didn’t care. I only got information once I complained.It’s been over 3 months since I started the rejection process. Still waiting. I’ve got several emails where they claimed to of completed steps moving forward. Complete lies!I’ve been polite all the way through to staff. No one is returning calls or answering emails. Lack of customer care unbelievable.

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...

review_text: So after taking delivery of a new ranger back in September it broke down 3 weeks later.. was recovered to fords Gravesend for repair and after pushing for it was finally put in a replacement ranger. I’ve owned it 3 weeks and they have now had it two with no solution yet as to what’s wrong.Continually having to call them as they never call back when they say they do.

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_text: After booking my car in for a service 2 weeks in advance and requesting a courtesey car as needed to work and arranged meetings with clients - on the day of the service got a call at 8:30 saying the courtesy car wasn't available as i was already on the way in to the dealer i'd have hoped they could of sorted something out before i got there - arrived and no loan car and was told "we'll we did tell you" yes at 8:30 that morning when i'd already arranged my day!!! Well said the service guy we can rebook you but i'd just travalled 18 miles from Bracknell and no i'm tied up for a few weeks and the car needs to be serviced! Got a lift from the dealer to the local train station and the ford driver stopped outside the station in live traffic and told me to get out, i told him to move up to the drop off location as i wasn't getting out in a dangerous position - picked up the car later that day got a brief apology no discount or componsation - good work ford you've convinced me that ford is not the car i like anymore due to the service and will now sell it to get something else - very poor indeed.

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...

review_text: Many thanks to Daniel Kemp and the SMC team.  Daniel was quick to respond to my queries and easy to deal with.  I am really pleased with my new Focus ST-Line purchase and the fast turnaround. Regards Warren

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_text: I had my car turned in for service and MOT, and I was very surprised when they called me with a long list of parts that needed to be replaced to pass the MOT, for a total of nearly £900 (car in very good condition with 20k miles). I asked a couple of times for a breakdown of part costs and they promised send me the breakdown via email. Obviously they did not send me the breakdown and after a couple of hours they called me to say "your car is ready for pick up!". So I asked the cost breakdown again "I'd like to understand what I am paying for" and I was been told that I would have received the breakdown with my receipt after I paid the bill.After I payed and my car was returned I noticed that many parts have been replaced including screen wipers that I just bought brand new a few months back (and a good brand too). Seriously guys, that's not very professional!

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_text: Service staff made up a big long story about how they couldn’t decipher the fault codes on my Mondeo and how the problem was much more complex than it first seemed. Unfortunately for them the dash cam revealed they hadn’t touched the car since I dropped it off. Be aware of the service staff here, they clearly cannot be trusted.

name: SMC Ford
description: Visit SMC Group in Kent, Berkshire & London, established car dealer and servicing specialist. Explore our website to browse through our stock and discover our full range of offers. Get in touch today to discover the benefits we provide and book a t...
review_text: Awful experience with SMC Slough.Bought a brand new Ford Ranger and had it for two weeks. It's since been in with Ford for over 2 months and no contact!After repeated calls to SMC Ford we still have not had any update on what is happening or if we're even getting it back.This is the worst experience we have ever had with any manufacturer. Unless Ford do something to assist and rectify the situation they have permanently lost our custom.

name: Mycookiedough
description: As a brand, our core mission is to spread happiness with our Cookie Dough, and do it in a way that is ethically good and sustainable to the world around us. While we want to change the world one step at a time we also want to change your day and put a smile on your face which we believe is something extremely special in itself. Angie, our founder and Queen of all things Dough, often says that our bottom-line is measured in how many people we can make smile, and that’s something everyone working here takes very seriously!
review_title: BIY pack is worth every penny!!!
review_text: Was not disappointed with the BIY cookies. Even put spare in the freezer and family enjoyed that too.Delivery was quick and cookies were superb! Would definitely buy a BIY pack again!

review_text: I ordered these for my daughters birthday and was very excited when they arrived. However we were all very disappointed. They tasted raw and stale. They were not soft and gooey at all. We gently warmed some as instructed and there was no improvement. Froze the remaining and gave to a friend who had the same opinion. Very expensive and won’t be buying again or recommending.

name: Property Secrets
description: Property Investment Advice, News, Deals, Support and Opportunities in the UK and Overseas.
review_title: Bad financial advice led to lose of property deposit
review_text: An agent who currently works here strongly recommended a financial investment and promised it was 100% safe and secure, and he knew lots of people invested in it and was very pushy to sell it. Unfortunately I took his advice and lost all my money that was to be used towards a house deposit. He moved to this company around the time I lost all my money (previously worked at Bondtilli).  Avoid, or at least be very careful, what advice you take. Financial advisors are only interested in the commission they make from selling you financial products. They have no interest helping you, or taking account of individual circumstances. Once there is a problem, they suddenly vanish. They take their commission and you are left with less money than before you met them.

name: NRMA Insurance
review_text: if I could do - MINUS 5 - that would be my experience with NRMA - their bullet proof outsourced customer service is just hopeless, I have 7 phone numbers that I was given to reach out to our assessor to settle the claim  - DO NOT FUNCTION - tens of hours spent waiting on the phone - voice messages left to both assessor and his manager to call me back - ZERO response rate, customer service staff on the front line keep on reading their Teletext saying "We have left the message to the assessor - he will call you back as soon as possible" - 3 times over the course of 2 weeks - NOTHING WORKS - Basically I think I have hit the brick wall and the only way to complain to Ombudsman but i honestly can't understand how this business functioning at all

name: NRMA Insurance
review_title: I had a car insurance with NRMA
review_text: I had a car insurance with NRMA. Recently I moved interstate. While my car was in transit, I cancelled the comprehensive car insurance (but still have the CTP with NRMA) because I didn't know when the car would arrive as it may take 1-3 months due to covid. It took 40 days (30 days in transit + almost 2 weeks at the custom for clearance) to arrive. So when the car arrived, I renewed my comprehensive car insurance with NRMA. However, the insurance price was higher than before. I called NRMA and they said that I lost all of my loyalty discounts which I accumulated over the years and am now starting the insurance as a new customer. I thought the no-claim bonus and loyalty discounts would be on my profile and even I renew the car insurance, they would still apply. Not very happy with them. I spoke to NRMA as well as SGIO (which NRMA subcontracted to in Western Australia), but both said I had to purchase the insurance from scratch. They couldn't do anything about it.

name: NRMA Insurance
review_title: Not the cheapest but the most…
review_text: Not the cheapest but the most dependable.

name: NRMA Insurance
review_text: Speaking with Ella on Thursday, to review policies for two family cars was a first class experience.  For almost an hour Ella worked hard to provide the best options for both vehicles, saved us money and gave us the confidence to know that NRMA provides top class service to their customers.  Thank you Ella.  Thank you NRMA.

name: NRMA Insurance
review_text: Excellent customer service

name: NRMA Insurance
review_text: Shame Shame Shame. We were existing customers moving interstate. Called sent to Contact Centre in South Africa (why not onshore in Australia?) Agent Kiri was the most unhelpful, unmotivated so called agent I have ever had the misfortune to have to deal with. She had poor communication skills and a total lack of empathy. After 30mins of time wasting, I asked to speak to a supervisor, but was advised this was not possible and we would have to call back later as they don't do call-backs. As a recently retired Contact Centre Manager in Australia I was embarrassed at the service provided. Do yourself a favour get a company with onshore agents, who will be able to communicate with you and leave you with a recourse of escalation if required.

name: NRMA Insurance
review_text: I’m not sure I’ll waste my time explaining this catastrophe.  Incompetent is an understatement, they shouldn’t legally be able to operate a company so poorly. I’m taking this to 60 minutes. Not at fault claim with 3rd party details and they still manage to mess it up multiple times including ‘it’s to difficult just have to be patient’ 6 weeks I’ve been waiting… ‘I know but I just work for the company, it is what it is’ patients is wearing thin.

name: NRMA Insurance
review_title: We renewed our caravan insurance  a…
review_text: We renewed our caravan insurance for a new used van due to a written off last van. Having 60 years membership with NRMA we trust them to look after us if we should have any incidents in the future.

name: NRMA Insurance
review_title: I'm really disapppointed that I decided…
review_text: I'm really disapppointed that I decided to change our insurance (home & contents to NRMA. After the floods (yes, we were flooded) we contacted them and they were quick to send a restoration bloke to assess the damage. We then had an electrician also sent in March. Thereafter, nothing happened. We contacted them on numerous occasions and then had another chap come  (27th May) but this one was also from a restoration company. he checked and said that the carpet people would be along and they would install fans to dry everything. Carpet Court came and measured up but said they had nothing to do with the drying, that the previous firm had to do that. Since them, our communication with NRMA has broken down. They now claim that our claim is closed as all the work has been completed. My husband and i will be taking this up with the ACCC and we will also be changing our insurer.

name: NRMA Insurance
review_text: I have comprehensive plus for my car and after the accident I found them very helpful and professional, namely their consultation line.

name: NRMA Insurance
review_title: NRMA Landlord insurance CHECK YOUR COVER!!
review_text: NRMA Landlord insurance. Doesn't cover most incidents in the home. Check before paying your premium.  Shower leakage rotting the floor? Not covered.  Seepage of water into the basement/underfloor area? NOT covered. Tree falls on a neighbour's house? Not covered.Customer service is poor. Long waits on the phone. Staff not at all helpful or understanding.

name: NRMA Insurance
review_text: I visited our local office- Tumut branch- to cancel one policy and take out another on a new car. Jenny was wonderful. It was all super easy, and I feel that we got a great deal. She really took the time to assess our needs, and provide us with a policy to suit them. I would highly recommend them.

name: NRMA Insurance
review_title: Lowest cost on comprehensive insurance, excellent customer service.
review_text: Thank you NRMA team, Elaine and Oscar for helping me get the best deal when I cancelled the policy for my  old car I sold and  buy a new policy for my new car. You provided me excellent service, beyond expectations! You were patient, professional, friendly & ready to help, knowledgeable and you cared for my needs. I felt like a valued customer! Thank you!

The only slight negative we experienced was the leadtime from the manufacturers in the Far East and the shipping times involved. However the wait was well worth it once we saw the quality of the shutters and knowing the prices we paid. I fitted the shutters myself and it was a very simple and straightforward process and went without a single problem. Very pleased we chose Shutterplus.

review_text: Having moved into a home with damaged shutters, I was convinced I'd need to replace them.  Got a little man in, £1,215.00 to replace them.  * gasp *    How much!  I did some research via my buddy Google.  With a bit of digging and learning as I went, I found shutterplus.co.uk and I am so glad...  I cannot begin to describe how helpful they are, especially SW, she is amazing!  Not to mention patient, knowledgeable and very good at explaining stuff.  With this lovely lady's help, I was able to fix them for a paltry £50!  Super happy and impressed.  And you know what they say, happy wife, happy life.  Mine's ecstatic with the refreshed shutters.  10 out of 10 all day.  I just noticed, TrustPilot think I'm in the US, I'm not, Norfolk, UK.

name: Proboosting
review_text: Toxic booster and admins.Bought a duo-boost from gold-plat. Won 2, lost 2 no worries. After that i get a msg if booster could play on my acc to get more rr per win. i went to sleep and let him play 1-2 games so our boost would go faster. The next morning i wake up, my account is BANNED from competitive for 3 days! because of toxicity. This guy flamed so hard, he got me banned from the game, thats insane and he should be fired! I asked for a refund or contact with support they said i needed to add "Connan" added him 48 hours ago, still not added back. I would defenitely not reccomend this service (Customer support like Mark) or boosters to anyone!

review_text: Hello Welcome to 2021, idk what change with proboosting they use to be good but now they seems to be really  Bad like they have the best support but all the booster are bad they act like you the one who have to deal when they have time to do your order like you are the worker not them they take order start whenever they want ,  for example my case i order the booster took it then told me he going to start it waited 24hours he never started, requested someone else did apply waited other 5-8hours + to get someone else,  i ask to pay priority  which is only 2$ who cares... still did and they still take more than 2hours so yep proboosting is really trash  now dont waste your money with them !.

Very helpful and friendly, not to mention a very skilled player.The job got done in about 24h, the only limitation being my availability to play all the necessary games.

name: Proboosting
review_text: I've worked for almost half a year in proboosting, delivered one of the best customer experiences for the website (definitely the best for the games I boosted, just check the site) and, for no reason, with no feedback, conversations or whatever, they kicked me out without payment for the orders I had still in payment process. The live support is indeed horrible, management is non-existent and, finally, the bid system is one of the most unethical things I've ever seen in boosting services, being only a way for the terrible staff to earn more. Hopefully there are plenty of other places for us boosters to work, so if you plan on working for proboosting, please reconsider!!

Overall I do think the dogs.ie site is well ran and well policed by Paul and his very helpful staff. The response from staff and Paul is fast and efficient. I do think the cost of placing an advert is very expensive, so if the cost could be brought down or if more time was added to the advert I would be very happy. Very pleased with dogs.ie.

description: Online poker with the #1 free poker game, PlayWSOP. Play free poker online 24/7 with the official World Series of Poker game! Texas holdem, omaha, poker tournaments, and more poker games! PlayWSOP is the only place where players can win a World Series ...
review_title: I have been playing on this site for over 15 years - Nothing good to say
review_text: I have been playing on this site for over 15 years, almost every day. Their odds are so out of whack, it's stupid. I have been cataloging, on a daily basis, and have found several obvious crooked dealings. I noticed that , when 2 pair win the hand, the winner got their 2 pair on the first 2 cards of the flop 80% of the time. Also, when a pair shows up on the board, a full house wins 75% of the time. But my number 1 gripe comes with the extremely high number of Full houses that I see during a 2-3 hour period. I see more Straight flushes and quads than I've seen in my entire 80 year life, playing real cards at real tables. I notice an inordinate number of wins under strange circumstances by the player in the the 1 o'clock position. Also, note the high number of times you land on the grey "lowest" amounts on the spinning wheel, when trying to increase your chips when logging in. There are only 6 "GREY(low)" amounts out of about 12 total slots, but when you spin, it will land on the "GREY" 80% of the time. The odds just are just  CROOKED!

review_title: NO MAX CHIP STACK LIMIT at lower levels.... Play for a laugh & to annoy some of the…
review_text: Play for a laugh & to annoy some of the irate others... then ok...... There SHOULD be a MAXimum amount of chip stack to allow playing at each table-level... otherwise clowns with gigantic $$$ paid-for stacks just bet you out of the game by betting big sums on daft hands continually. This is particularly true at the table levels of "A" Ace, and below.... BUT, unless you spend big piles of real $$$ cash you will find your little "bonus" chip pile of a few hundred million... eaten away by absurd river beat cards & bingo-clown bets... especially for the hours after you have got a moderate bonus of a few hundred million.This has nothing to do with random cards occasionally hitting you - can happen ... especially with big bingo-betters playing down in the lower levels to steal from the poor.

review_text: Brought a job lot of clothes - including some Penguin boxer shorts. Ordered medium size. When arrived they were wrapped loose in a clear plastic bag - pretty sure not their original packaging. Looked to try a size and realised these were way to small - maybe a medium in Asia? Paid £3 for no quibble 28 day return. Yesterday the boxers were delivered back to me with screwed up letter telling me, as per their T&Cs they do not accept these items for return. So, more fool me for not checking their T&Cs in detail on this item. It is a shame though that the product is sized incorrectly, it is a shame they are poor quality and it is a shame, that when selecting the item to return on their website it did not flag then that they do not accept returns. Is also a shame that their no quibble statement is not true and that I lost an extra £3 on the order by paying to send them back. Biggest shame of all though is that the rest of the order was okay - but I have to now score 1 star for shady practice on items like these. I will write off cost as a bad experience and not use them again. Please feel free to get in touch if you would like some free 'Small' sized penguin boxer shorts....

review_text: Absolutely appalling Customer Service! I placed an order, paid for unlimited next day delivery & paid in full. 5 days later no goods received. Contacted customer service to be told the parcel has been lost & an investigation needed to be done to find it. I asked for a refund or full replacement order but was advised M & M will not refund/replace until an investigation is completed. They said this takes some time. The courier did NOT receive the parcel to deliver! I asked for a managers details to address a full complaint to but now they are just avoiding my emails! I now do not have the order for a birthday present or the money to buy something else! BUYERS BEWARE your money is taken and goods not received! I wish I had checked the bad reviews on Trustpilot before giving them my money!

review_title: Buying is ok but when they send a wrong…
review_text: Buying is ok but when they send a wrong item to you , then you have to pay postage to send it back , then they say it takes 14 days in transit for them to receive the item . After the 14 days they then give it to the return department to see if it has arrived , then if it has which they won’t confirm if they have received it it takes another 3/5 days to see if they are going to pay a refund, now they want proof of return postage which is done on there web site at a cost of £2.99 on Hermes How do they think it takes 14 days to return an item ???? When it states 2day delivery back to them Have now contacted my credit card company for them to get a refund They have no phone lines working as they are still working from home another excuse for Covid Disgusting company when they have to return money quick to take it stear clear of this company

description: MandM Direct er en af Europas førerende online tilbudsforhandlere med de allerstørste brands inden for mode, sport og outdoor med besparelser på op til 75 % af udsalgsprisen. review_title: Wouldn't let me cancel the order after 24 minutes told it had already been picked packed and on the lorry
review_text: I placed an order which was in error. I intended to pay the £181 order with clearpay, over a period of 4 instalments. As I couldn't afford to pay the full amount in one payment. But the order was placed taking out the whole amount and not just the deposit-first payment.After placing the order I realised they'd taken the full amount of £181 and not £46 per instalment.I cancelled the order 24 minutes after I placed the order. To be told by customer services that within 24 minutes they had picked and packed and loaded the order onto the lorry. What a load of rubbish.I've tried constantly over the last couple of days to arrange for my refund to be returned to my bank.But the answer given by mandm direct was to recieve the order and refuse delivery, then the order will go back to them then after an additional 3-5 days they will refund the money... So I'm going to have to wait a minimum of 2-3 weeks before the refund in my bank account is available....I can't afford to do this.. I needed my refund now.. Not in 3 weeks time..There shouldn't be any problem whatsoever.I told them after 24 minutes I wanted to cancel the whole order.I told customer services I've been left in a position where mandm direct took my food shopping and electric money out of my bank. I can't survive without that money..it's the difference being able to eat and keep warm... I also told them I had a disability and are classed as a vulnerable adult...I've sent a dozen emails... To no availe.....They're quick enough to take your money..I feel I've been treat unfairly..I'm still waiting to hear from a manager...Absolutely disgracefull....I don't know what I can do now...CUSTOMER SERVICESThey're certainly are not helping there customers..I hope people read this review before they use the MANDM DIRECT... CUSTOMER SERVICES JUST RUBBISH..

review_title: Awful service, faulty item sent 3 times in a row!
review_text: Awful service, avoid at all costs! Spent almost £80 on clothing. Most of which was low quality. But one of item arrived faulty and was literally falling apart. I was eventually sent a replacement, which turned up with the exact same fault! The third jumper that turned up was also faulty but with a different fault! The first jumper I went out of my way to return, I live no where near the PO or have a printer... And because I did not return the second jumper, they BLOCKED my account?? I called them today and they were rude and very abrupt on the phone even though its me that ended up out of pocket... I was simply told, that If I did not pay for the item I did not return, the account will remain blocked? I was sent a faulty item 3 times and returned one of them, I don't see why I should go out of my way several times because of their poor quality control...

review_text: Staff would not allow me to use the restroom after an 8 hour flight. Pilot took 30 minutes to land the plane while staff would not allow me to use restroom. We were just waiting for the gate and they had no sympathy while I tried to use the restroom. I was on the verge of tears.

review_title: Everything was clear and easy to go…
review_text: Everything was clear and easy to go through.

name: Airfrance
review_title: Parts of this site are good
review_text: Parts of this site are good. The site is clear and well laid out. Progression through the site is predictable. However the site falls down in a couple of areas.1. The ability to see where Air France flies so that a customer can plan an itinerary would be great. If this was on the site, I couldn't find it.2. The site doesn't give a month view of prices for a given route. The best you can do is choose a date and the site will then give you prices for that week. The site is also slow in showing those prices once a date has been chosen.3. Requesting special meals is confusing especially if your itinerary has several flights.4. The site needs a live chat feature. Getting through to the 1-800 number at the bottom of the page to speak to a live agent is impossible. After going through several steps, I was constantly informed that due to heavy call volume, the wait time to speak to an agent was over 45 minutes and the call was then dropped. I gave up after several attempts. If you have a complex booking where members of a party have different itineraries but want to fly together on specific legs of that itinerary, it is difficult to coordinate tickets online so that everyone is able to get on the same flight. Luckily, I was able to achieve this online but chatting or speaking to a live agent would have been really helpful and would have made the booking process so much quicker and easier. Had I not been able to achieve this online or speak to an agent, I would have had to cancel the whole booking. In summary, the site is good in parts, but for a national carrier, it should be better.

review_text: Booking a flight from Seattle to Tbilisi, Republic of Georgia onlineIt was easy to navigate the site, and all the functions, such as adding leg room and extra luggage worked well. Not only AirFrance had the best route and connections, the shortest flight, and reasonable fare with a no-fee change, AirFrance had one of the best online sites.

name: Airfrance
review_title: My reservation was cancelled without explanation
review_text: I made a reservation, my credit card was charged, I got my booking code, S8G6BO, and my reservation was confirmed.The next day, I couldn't find my reservation on the Air France site.  The service telephone number kept disconnecting me because of "Call Volume."  Through a chat, I was informed that my reservation was cancelled, with no explanation.I had to make a new reservation, but my fare was no longer available, and I had to pay $300 more!  I couldn't get the days I wanted, either.  This is the first time this has happened to me with Air France.  I expect, at the very least, an apology.  An Airline concerned with its reputation would reimburse me the difference in ticket price.
