description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_text: A wonderful game drive experience organized by FullofAfrica Team. The hospitality, curated personalized gift hampers and arranging thoughtful necessities for the safari made it seamlessly comfortable. It was a homely experience while interacting with the team.Highlights were lunch in the bushes of mara, leopard on the tree with its prey and a lion beside the safari vehicle and a cheetah with a hunt of an impala. Frank was an experienced tour guide in the wildlife and ensured we could get beautiful sightings. Marie helped us a lot in the planning and execution of the trip and was there at all times.Mayur from FullofAfrica has given us guidance and assured us to reach out to him for any help required.Overall it was a fantastic vacation.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_text: First of all FULL OF AFRICA are a professional guys and are passionate about there duty. Thanks to MAYUR, MARIE and our guide Surat. I my wife and my 8 year old son have visited kenya for an 8 days tour. We just spent money only for shopping. All the other things were included in the package. We had an wonderful tour as we sighted almost all the Wild animals. My kid enjoyed a lot.We had a small glitch of payment at one of the stores and we realized it only when we reached india. I called Mayur and informed him and they took the responsibility of finding it out and solved the problem. They could have left it because our tour was done but they have gone a step ahead and helped us. Thank you FULL OF AFRICA for a memorable tour.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_text: We had the most remarkable family tour with full of Africa . Not only everything was perfect , but we felt , in every instance that our tour operators Mayur and tour guide Jamaal truly cared about us. This trip with Full of Africa became the most eye opening, adventurous and stunning in the middle of African wildlife.We had the most brilliant holiday . Thank you so much full of Africa team , we have not stopped recommending it😄

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_title: the best experience arranged by Mayur…
review_text: the best experience arranged by Mayur and James.  I would recommend full of Africa to all my friends and family for their visit to Africa

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_text: The hotels were amazing, I loved Samburu Simba lodge..The food was great plus hospitality.Naivasha simba Lodge leaves alot of room for improvement especially in client service.Mara was good but Samburu takes the lead.The tour guide was professional and interactive and knowledgeable.Was abit disappointed with Samburu game drive because of many cattles.Thank you.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_text: My experience with FullofAfrica was warm from the pick up point to the various destinations. Mohamed Noor our tour guide was very friendly and engaging. He supported us throughout the safari and was quite knowledgeable. We enjoyed our game drive. I will definitely recommend my friends to try FullofAfrica.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_text: My wife, two children (7 and 9), and I all spent just over a week in Kenya with Full of Africa. Simply put, we had the best holiday we've ever had. Their attention to detail went a considerable way to making it so. From helping us plan the trip before we left, to communicating with us immediately upon arrival and picking us up from the airport, they were brilliant.Our driver for the trip, Ben, was exceptional. Such a knowledgeable and engaging man who acted on all requests and ideas. He was brilliant with our children too.The accommodations booked for us by Full of Africa were great - especially the Maasai Mara lodgings.All in all, an outstanding experience I would recommend to anyone.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_title: One of the best travel experience ..
review_text: Our Safari experience has been great full of excitement and adventures. Thanks that I found Fullof Africa who helped and provided us the best itinerary end to end package from the day we arrived in Kenya until the very last day depart back to Dubai.Very professional and truly take care of their guests and make sure provided the best of our trip has to offer from hotel, lodges , safari  activities and the best tour guide ever James.We enjoyed a lot and this trip was one of the best travel experience we had so far.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_title: As close you can get to nature
review_text: After travelling most of the countries in the world, the feeling of physically being closest to the nature was the recent trip to Tanzania, into the region of Tarangire, Serengeti, Ngorongoro and Lake Manyara.Without Full of Africa, this trip of 2 weeks would have not been so beautiful, organised and stress free. Excellent staff, drivers and food.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_text: Visiting Kenya was an awesome experience, and I am thankful to Full Of Africa for make it as good as possible.In our tight schedule they managed to fit all activities, and thankful to our awesome guides we achieved our goals. We will definitely go back in the next few years.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_title: We had booked our trip with Full of Africa
review_text: We had booked our trip with Full of Africa for 4 nights and 5 days, for the month of September 21, we were given a wonderful trip Advise by Mr Mayur accordingly we booked for 3 people, unfortunately due to Covid 19 we couldn’t make it and we thought we can go sometime in November 21, but unfortunately the flights and country was shut we could make it. Now we requested Full of Africa to refund our payment, Mr Mayur has immediately initiated this . However, we are planning to travel once the flights and country opens up , we shall definitely book with Mr Mayur, as he is a genuine person and where one can trust him. My review will definitely help other travellers  who want to visit Kenya and explore  wild life experience.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_title: One of the Best African Safari tourism
review_text: I would Highly recommend anyone who are looking out for a great African safari Experience, as I can say through my Experience of Dealing with the Company right from booking a customised package to even guiding us on all the process that would require us to go through for the trip.I would also like to Specially Mention about Mr. Mayur, who is a part of FullofAfrica Tourism, he is the right person who would guide you throughout the process and goes out of the way to ensure that you have best of the experience.

description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_title: Full of Africa team did a wonderful…
review_text: Full of Africa team did a wonderful job, to make our trip a memorable one. The owner Mayur is extremely professional and went above and beyond to help make this trip a comfortable and fun trip. We would recommend this company to another friend or family.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_text: My trip to Kenya have had been one of the best value trips and I could not have asked for more! The whole trip was comfortable and hassle free. A special thanks to Mayur who helped me with planning the trip. He was very accommodating and was continuously in touch with me to make sure that I was comfortable throughout the trip.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_text: FULL OF AFRICA made every day in Kenya magical.  They made our stay in the Masai mara exceed all our expectations.  Without a doubt, you can see the love they have for their work.  I always felt at home and our guide Ben was part of our family.  Just as the he told us, the beginning of many times that we will return.  Asante Sana FULL OF AFRICA.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_title: A life- time experience thanks to Full Of Africa
review_text: From A to Z, the Full of Africa Team made this trip for me and my familiy a life- time experience. Vehicle- proper off road equiped, tour guide soo nice and experienced, the route well planned, people in all places we visited welcoming and nice. You cant ask for more! Only minor complain on food in one of hotels we were staying was addressed and I am sure this will be sorted out in the future. Thank you Full of Africa Team for the best trip in my life.

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_title: We had a great time lovey place
review_text: We had a great time lovey place, one of our best holidays,From Amboseli sleeping in the wild,meeting the Masai people  they’re very friendly & welcoming , Lake Naivasha, horse riding was the best,Masai Mara the game drive is fun and full of adventures,and then to Mombasa after the long days on safari to then end up on a beautiful beach in Mombasa was worth it❤️Amazing❤️❤️From foods,accommodations,the whole package is great!!FullofAfrica did not  let as down especially to our tourguide James Muchini who always given us the best photo opportunity.❤️

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_text: The safari experience was beyond amazing! Our tour guide James was very punctual and approachable. He was keen to show us around and shared a wealth of knowledge! The premium accommodations exceeded our expectations!

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_title: You’ll be crazy not to book with Full of Africa
review_text: I don’t even know if I can fully explain my experience without a video. Lol! It was absolutely amazing and I plan on planning a trip with full of Africa every year. I’ve been a few places in my but this was by far the best from beginning to end. Mayur was very professional, caring and attentive to all of my needs, wants and desires. I dreamed of this trip since I was a little girl and because of Full of Africa I was able to live it. I bothered Mayur day and night 😩😩. He never showed he was annoyed abs I’m sure I was annoying lol. He answered every question I had and eased my mind. I told him what I wanted and he gave me everything and more. We spent a day and a half in Nairobi where I got my hair washed, colored and braided for only $75. We think took a scenic road trip to Narok county where we spent a few night at Mara Eden 🥰. I felt like pure royalty as the staff catered to my every need. It was so serene and peaceful. The river was right in the front of our tent filled with hippos. At night you can hear the hippos walking around right outside of ur tent. Mara Eden was more than i imaged it would be; the food was so fresh and delicious 😋. We had the best tour guide ever. When u go it’s a   Must that Ben is tour guide. That guy is so knowledgeable man. He knows everything and spots everything miles and miles away. Because Of Ben we were able to see animals that people don’t spot often; a leopard, a pair of matting lions, a cheetah and saval cat. On the day of my actual birthday I watched the sunrise from a hot air balloon over the Maasai Mara and landed to a amazing breakfast in the middle of the wilderness. It was breathtaking. After dinner Ben took us out to watch the sunset and popped a bottle of champagne. We also visited the Maasai village where I was just in aww 🥰. We then took a flight which was gifted to me by Mayur for my birthday Mombasa and spent a few days on a beach resort. I’m from Miami but recently moved to Atlanta where there is no beach so I was ecstatic and felt like I was home. My room had a balcony so I was able to wake up, walk right on to the beach and watch the sunrise. We flew in and out of Nairobi so we had to go back to Nairobi to get back to the states. Mayur suggested taking the train for scenic purposes. Our last day before heading to the airport we visited abs elephant orphanage, the giraffe center me where we feed the giraffes right behind the famous giraffe manor and finished odd with a visits to a childrens orphanage.  If your are planning a trip to Kenya full of Africa is definitely the company you want to book with. It was well worth the money. If you ask me, it should cost more. Lol. We had our own personal transportation beak and call. They were punctual and very patient with us late Americans 🤣. I’m African-American btw so this trip gave me even more proud. It was an outstanding, overwhelmed, full experience. Kenya and it’s people are truly heaven sent. There are no people in the world like them. Everyone was so warm welcoming and pleasant. If you are planning a trip to Kenya full of Africa is definitely they way to go. You won’t regret it!

name: FullofAfrica
description: Full of Africa is a one-stop adventure company providing all African safari tours and excursions
review_text: The most versatile itinerary ever! Loved every minute of the journey and our guide James has been so patient, lenient and fun. Def recommend !

name: Terence Lett the Jeweller
description: Situated in Oxfordshire, on the edge of the Cotswolds, is the picturesque market town of Witney.Located along the high street, Terence Lett Jewellers is a thriving family-run business that has been providing a personal service to discerning customers for over 30 years while improving and expanding to where it is today.In our workshops we produce a large range of our own beautiful diamond jewellery using precious gemstones selected by Terence himself. We have a wide range of designs from many of the industry-leading jewellery brands and gift items for each and every occasion. Our watch portfolio covers some of the world’s most iconic and innovative watch brands, world famous through their renowned quality and dedication to the art of watchmaking.Terence and his team are always on hand to offer advice on all types of jewellery and watches with their vast expertise and knowledge; we have a modern outlook on our established and trusted brand, which will see us continue to provide exceptional service to our valued customers, old and new, for many years to come.Join us in-store for a coffee and browse the latest and greatest that our extensive brands list have to offer.
review_text: Wonderful service! With a big thank you to Dominic! The watch is wonderful & your service from start to finish was 5*!!! Thank you! Sophie x

name: Terence Lett the Jeweller
description: Situated in Oxfordshire, on the edge of the Cotswolds, is the picturesque market town of Witney.Located along the high street, Terence Lett Jewellers is a thriving family-run business that has been providing a personal service to discerning customers for over 30 years while improving and expanding to where it is today.In our workshops we produce a large range of our own beautiful diamond jewellery using precious gemstones selected by Terence himself. We have a wide range of designs from many of the industry-leading jewellery brands and gift items for each and every occasion. Our watch portfolio covers some of the world’s most iconic and innovative watch brands, world famous through their renowned quality and dedication to the art of watchmaking.Terence and his team are always on hand to offer advice on all types of jewellery and watches with their vast expertise and knowledge; we have a modern outlook on our established and trusted brand, which will see us continue to provide exceptional service to our valued customers, old and new, for many years to come.Join us in-store for a coffee and browse the latest and greatest that our extensive brands list have to offer.

Terence Lett providing an excellent customer experience.I would recommend them to everyone

review_title: I cannot reccommend Terence Lett enough.
review_text: A huge thank you to Dominic for his amazing service, I was looking to purchase an Omega Seamaster and Dominic had exactly the model I wanted in stock, service was exemplary, I was unable to visit the shop so all of the transaction was over the phone or online however Dominic still managed to make the experience personal, the watch was delivered via Royal Mail by 10.00 am the following day in perfect condition, after giving Dominic my wrist measurement the watch was even sized correctly, I cannot recommend Dominic and the team at Terence Lett enough!My next watch will definitely be coming from Terence Lett.Many Thanks Dominic

review_text: An exceptional, friendly, family-run business that represents excellent value for money and will surely provide a service second to none.Nothing was too much trouble, they even offered to extend the discount that I had negotiated, outside of company policy, should I wish to order a similar item that wasn't in stock.  They were significantly cheaper than the best deal I could arrange with the brand directly, but even if they weren't I would use them again next time.Dominic deserves a special mention for arranging the purchase and ensuring I received such value for money. Not only was I treated brilliantly, but whilst I was there, a lady of more advanced years who was quite deaf received the manager's complete and undivided attention and was dealt with with calm respect and dignity despite the obvious communication problems.Absolutely first class, thank you.

Expatriados, nómades digitales, estudiantes, empresas remotas, bienvenidos al mejor portal de cotización de seguros del mundo.
review_text: I had an excellent experience!

name: WeRoad
description: We organise group tours on the road to more than 100 destinations around the world. We leave all year round, in similar groups of age and travel mood.WeRoad was born to connect people, cultures and stories through that magical activity that we call 'travelling'. So we group people together and send them to live incredible adventures around the globe.Our business is profoundly human: it’s built on relationships and interactions - not only while we're travelling. We plan many events throughout the year to meet and engage our community and enable our WeRoaders and Travel Coordinators to share their stories with one another.Every day we get to see the impact our work has and we’re reminded that we earn a living making connections and changing lives. Not many companies can say that. This is our “why” - the reason we come to work every day - and we consider it a privilege.We take people all over the world in order to make them experience different things, 'cause we believe that there's so much more if we just find the courage to take that leap. During our tours, we encounter many different cultures that enrich us and change the way we look at things.All people, with their background, have a story to tell: that's the last 'step' of our vision - listening to all those stories, coming from the people that we meet during our travels. Every story gives us something and we consider it a little treasure, far more precious than any souvenir we can bring home with us.Get your backpack ready, we’ll bring new friendsJoin WeRoad’s community of travellers!
review_text: Amazing trip to Peru with many activities and landscapes: sandboarding in the desert, ocean and lake views, mountain hikes and local family accommodation!The group was great and Lara was an amazing coordinator!

review_title: I had an amazing trip to Sri Lanka
review_text: I had an amazing trip to Sri Lanka . Not only the trip was well organised and there was 0 issues during the whole 14 days but we also made friendships for life . I recommend WeRoad trips to anybody who is tired of waiting for other people to travel with them and wants to experience something amazing . You won’t regret it . The Travel Coordinators are great too . You can really see that travelling Is their passion in life and you feel in safe hands .

review_title: The best way to do group travel!
review_text: There were so many amazing things about the Yucatan trip to Mexico - we packed so much in, even the most adventurous were satisfied.  The group dynamic was just right - the travel moods and age groups mean that everyone is already on the same page about the tour.  The tour leader brought it all together and facilitated an incredible experience.  Can't wait to book my next one!

review_title: Amazing Costa Rica trip with WeRoad
review_text: On the Costa Rica  trip we explored the diverse and beautiful country, we went from the Caribbean to the Pacific, from beaches to volcanoes, and saw incredible wildlife along the way.Many fun activities, including as zip lines, hiking, and swimming in bioluminescent, were available along the way, adding to the whole trip experience. We had a fantastic travel co-ordinator, Rueben, who guided us through the programme.

review_text: I have had an amazing experience with WeRoad. From first making contact and inquiring about trips and tours, to finding the right one for me, the assistance was genuine and enthusiastic. When I did pick a tour, the communication from our trip leader was excellent. Any questions, worries or issues could be brought up and dealt with quickly and effectively. The WhatsApp group is a fantastic idea too as it helped me to feel confident with who I was going with as we had already been talking for a few weeks before we even met. While on tour our trip leader was so open and so much fun, she really helped to make it a thoroughly memorable experience. I will definitely be recommending these trips!

review_text: It's been a few days since we returned from our trip to Peru and I still haven't lost my happy face.I have discovered an incredible country, people, culture and gastronomy, with contrasting landscapes and different adventures every day: The beaches and the lively atmosphere of Lima, the desert and the sandboard moment, volcanoes with snow and colourful mountains at 5.000m of altitude, making our own chocolate, and of course, the great wonder of the world that is Machu Picchu where you can't get enough of taking pictures from every corner.But the best of all, without a doubt, was the company. Living incredible experiences with people we had never met before, but without them the trip would not have been the same. This is the essence of WeRoad. I can only say, thank you, thank you and thank you for this trip. Oh, and thank you Gerda for captaining the super team! PURO!

I truly feel like I made friends for life. I’ll be joining more WeRoad tours for sure!

name: Scoutingprints
description: Oscar Chatwin's Scouting Prints is a service available at any time to provide you and your charity organization with high-quality, on-brand, affordable banners, signs, prints, and stickers. We are a better option than other businesses for scouting services as the owner is an Explorer Scout who understands the meaning of Scouting and how the brand should be portrayed. All of our end products are thoroughly quality tested and checked before shipment. We also follow the Scout brand guidelines to ensure your group stands out at fundraising events.
review_text: Excellent communication and super happy with banner which is getting plenty of use.Would have liked a slightly quicker delivery time due to my needing the banner sooner but it came in the 10 day timeframe I was originally given so no promises were broken.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_title: IxDF is the single best course for all aspiring UX designers
review_text: IxDF is a great value for money. I think every aspiring designer pursuing to become a UX Designer should consider taking this course. The courses are rightly structured and the content is informative. The quizzes helped me clear my confusion. Leaderboard always kept me engaged in the course. The handouts are useful whenever I want to get back to do some research. The community helped me connect to fellow designers around me.The design thinking ultimate guide course helped me excel at my job. I would give full credit to IxDF for assisting me to build a solid foundation on design thinking and User centered design.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_text: I've loved my experience with IxDF so far. Quality content and a great range of topics to learn-- all taught by industry leaders-- and bonus items like downloadable cheat sheets and webinars. They seem like they genuinely want people to enjoy learning, and I appreciate that! Would recommend.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_text: Sadly, I couldn't continue or finish the course due to personal circumstances. My negative experience was that after my first year's subscription expired, I did not immediately realize that I was automatically renewed without my permission and at a higher price. Somehow, I must have missed the auto-renew policy in the fine print somewhere during sign-up. So fair enough, but I did not like this at all. On a more positive note, when I wrote them about this and explained my situation as well as asked if it was possible to re-start the date of my new subscription since I had only realized it very late, the response was that they can't re-start the date or give my money back, nevertheless, they did extend my membership by 6 months. So although not great, I did appreciate the gesture and very friendly tone of the e-mail. It's always signed by Rikke, so not sure if I'm really communicating with her or it's a generic customer service template, but I have to say that I do appreciate the approach and kindness in all our communication. Sadly, I cannot continue or finish the courses so I cannot really give you a review of the whole course experience. I hope that one day I will be able to sign-up again and get a certificate. Thank you.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_title: Experience with IxDF as seasoned UX person
review_text: Studying and developing skills in UX fields with IxDF is one of my most enjoyed professional activities.I am a seasoned UX person with more than 10 years in the field but the lessons never got me bored and are always well-packed with academic content and practical information. Experts like Alan Dix, Frank Spillers, and William Hudson not only share their knowledge and expertise but also help me vanquish all the doubt about what I am in the job as I am a self-study UX person, who never got an academic background in the field but gaining all the skill and experience on the job. In some way, their sharing let me know that what I'm practicing every day is the industry's standard and the right manner to do the job.I've just joined IxDF officially last year but from the very first day of knowing about it, I'm pretty confident this community is an elite one and always recommend it to my fellow designers.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_title: I am learning a lot during in all the…
review_text: I am learning a lot during in all the courses I'm enrolled to. It's a really rich content with deep theoretical concepts and what I enjoy the most it's the opportunity of learning from experienced people with deep knowledge on their market.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_title: I'm loving being a member of IxDF
review_text: Attending to Don Norman's classes on "Design for the 21st century" is not simply formative. It's highly motivational.If you already realized being a Designer is not "about you and your art", but "about the world and solving problems", I couldn't recommend this course enough: it explores humility and empathy, connection with the reality and with real people.It's about being Human.PS: I'm loving being a member of Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) - and I'm already half-through a fantastic course on Acessibility!

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_title: Great variety of content for UXers of…
review_text: Great variety of content for UXers of all levels. Like the fact that you can take multiple classes at once and at your own pace. Master Classes are a nice, condensed option as well.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_title: Great affordable resource for designers looking to fill gaps in their education
review_text: Positives:👍 Large variety of courses offered on different topics from beginner to advanced levels👍 Relatively affordable for courses taught by industry leading professionals👍 Go at your own pace learning👍 Huge community with webinars, in-person events and networking opportunitiesNegatives:👎 Modules unlocked on a biweekly schedule makes it easy to lose momentum👎 Compulsory yearly membership means you can’t just take one course👎 Most test questions are multiple choice, which can be tricky for non-native English speakers👎 No real feedback as you go alongOverall I’m impressed and can't wait to taking more courses. If you are new to UX or are looking for a way to continue your education, it's absolutely worth checking out.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_text: I have taken the 'Design Thinking: The ultimate guide' course offered from Interaction Design Foundation. Found it very useful. It has been designed in a beautiful manner which makes it quite easy to understand and follow. The material is right to the point and videos are included where it makes sense and additional links to the various topics have been provided if the individual wants to look any further. Questions at the end of the each section test if an individual has really gone through the section or just skimmed through. Personally I loved it and will for sure recommend people to take this course. It's worth your money and time.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_text: So far I have been fulfilled and happy. I followed many courses on the website before applying for the User Research Bootcamp. I learned a lot, I practice and the pace was smooth. The facilitators in the Bootcamp are professional and very available. I recommend Interaction Design. I am a nurse who shifted my career to UX researcher thanks to their courses and the Bootcamp.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_text: These Courses Are Really Helpfull for me ! i am still learning from iran

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_title: First of all the support that the…
review_text: First of all the support that the interaction design foundation gives is so big, that I didn't see websites like them.for the courses, you will not find these kinds of information in any courses you can learn how you can use tools yes but for the concept itself and the principles of Design and how the people think and how you can focus on the user instead of just a good UI.for the prices, they are the lowest in the market and that gives them triple benefits.and as they teach me in every product you use there are three factors that define the product how do you feel when you use the product? do you like to use the product? is it usable? all these factors are applied to the website.but I think they can add a mentor at the end of every course to see if your portfolio is good to catch a job.so I think they are the best so far.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_title: I’m motivated by IxDF to continue…
review_text: I’m motivated by IxDF to continue professional development in the design industry. I value learning and want to continue my UX/UI design journey. I have completed six courses with certificates and plan to take more courses. I see the Interaction Design Foundation as a wonderful, high-quality educational experience. Courses are created by industry leaders and trusted professionals. I am gaining knowledge in user experience design, design thinking, HCI and information visualization adding an in-depth skill set to be more confident and prepared to take on varied UX/UI visual design roles.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_title: The best UX/UI resource for everyone!
review_text: This website is the greatest source of reliable information UX/UI designers need!

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_text: I've been progresively taking courses on IxDF's User Researcher Path. I'm very much satisfied with the overall experience, the courses are well paced and contain lots of useful information and tips. The only course that I didn't find so useful was the one on UX Management. It definitely has lots of information, but I think a little bit more grounding and succinctness would have been better. Specifically, I think not many UX practitioners have a background on management, given that it is a role one evolves into after acquiring certain seniority and I believe the cognitive bridging for this gap could have been better.

name: Interaction-Design.org
description: The Interaction Design Foundation (IxDF) is the world’s biggest online design school offering UX design courses and literature created by design experts. We were founded in 2002 and have over 100,000 students.Don Norman: "A goldmine of information on interaction design."
review_text: IxDF gives you the ability to have all the industry and information that is related to interaction design, in one place. On the other hand, it gives you the key to enhancing your motivation. If you are a self-motivated person with a desire to learn then you will do well with these courses.The IxDF is more than a learning platform. It’s a great resource of information, inspiration, and opinions related to the UX and UI industry. It’s a community with a treasure trove of knowledge. It will help you to empathize in thinking and as a result, you will enhance your skills to be a better designer.

name: The Match Day Shop
description: We work hard to find the best available signed Items and memorabilia. All the signed items have been thoroughly checked by AFTAL registered experts and come from trusted sources or official signings.For your total peace of mind all the signed products come with our lifetime guarantee certificate of authenticity.We opened the store in 2010 as an independent Fan shop for Gooners by Gooners, part museum, part gallery/gift shop there is something for everyone! We love being part of the Arsenal Family and are happy to help with any special requests you may have. Drop by say hello, have a browse in the shop on a match day, collect your items after the game or have them shipped worldwide. We are not open every day but Private shopping appointments are available on request. We can source any player if not on our website or shop just ask.

name: iLikeToSell
review_title: Bought a small garden shed from these…
review_text: Bought a small garden shed from these people and paid over the phone agreeing a delivery date a week later! However never got the text message the morning of proposed delivery so rang them to enquire, I was told it would be between 10am and 2pm, however nothing arrived so made another call only to be told it was only two stops away but could not contact the drivers? Imagine my ANGER when at 5.30 I got an automatic message (not even a human voice) telling me the delivery was NOT going to take place and no reason given??  I think these people are scammers and take money under false pretences. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!

name: iLikeToSell
review_text: Fundamental pieces missing and so we have a half built shed with not roof. They say they will send the missing items but no time given. Customer service is unbelievably bad. I would strongly advise you not to use this company.

name: iLikeToSell
review_title: Oakham Overlap Shed 10 x 7 Review Update
review_text: Oakham Overlap Shed 10 x 7 Review Update So ILikeToSell have finally replaced the shed floor after a lot of discussion and providing pictures of shed floor rot to the OSB board. Because at first their suppliers didn't believe that the floor had been treated and said the treatment had failed, so I wasn't best pleased. Since then, they have agreed to replace it. I will say that the customer service assistant at ILikeToSell was pleasant and helpful though. The problem initially was with the suppliers. This time we will not only treat the floor, but we are also going to find some extra durable protection for it, as OSB board (like chipboard) seems to soak up the damp easily within the first couple of years and can disintegrate, so extra protection is recommended for this budget flooring. But thankyou to the customer service assistant for your help.

name: iLikeToSell
review_title: Terrible Customer Service but great at responding to negative reviews!
review_text: I posted a review last month advising of the terrible service I received as only part of order was fulfilled.  Money was taken as soon as the order was placed so they got that bit right.  I spent several weeks chasing up (now 4 months have passed) and had absolutely zero response to any of my comms asking for refund for missing part of order.  Within days of posting my previous negative but factually correct review I received a reply advising it is difficult to respond to such queries due to the Covid situation but to provide them with order details and that I would receive credit within a few days.  I sent order details straight away.  I have still not received a response or my money so I stand by my original review.The Covid situation did not prevent them from taking my money or responding within days to my previous review but somehow it has conveniently prevented them from dealing with my genuine customer service concern.  I wondered for a moment if I was being harsh then read other damning reviews of the business.If they cannot fulfil the order for any reason then they should make this clear upfront that Covid was causing them delays.  4 months and counting I feel is long enough to wait for something that could easily be resolved within days.Based on my experience I would steer well clear of this business as once they have your money it's game over.  I wait with interest to see how they now respond. Please prove me wrong!

name: iLikeToSell
review_text: If you are thinking of buying this fence or anything else from ILiketosell  think again. Product is OK but they have little regard for their customers. When I complained about them missing the delivery day, they set, for my fence panels it took them two weeks and several emails to respond to my complaints. When they did it was only when Tesco (who I ordered the panels through) pushed them to do it and, even then, their apology was half-hearted. Their line is "time for delivery is not of the essence........". Might not be to you Iliketosell but it is to your customers who take time off work to receive their goods. Try and complain by phone and you are put through to an answer machine and they don't call you back. There are loads of other companies providing the same service as this one. Go and look at them is my adviceMy advice is to look elsewhere

name: iLikeToSell
review_title: Shocking service will never be ordering from them again
review_text: Arranged delivery for Thursday of a new bed so got rid of my old one just to be told after 5pm my order that they said was on route would not be coming as the didn't even have all the boxes stvthe depot. I am 7 months pregnant and have no bed to sleep in! They got in contact the next morning saying it would be delivered that day but surprise again it did not appear and customer services could not get a hold of the driver so I had to do it my self! He said it had not been delivered due to traffic! So another night heavily pregnant on a very uncomfortable couch and your customer service not seeming to know anything about my order! Got told it will be delivered the next day (sat) but no one will be in as me and my partner both work! So seriously such a bad company not reliable at all and know nothing about what they are telling you!

name: iLikeToSell
review_text: I've been trying to get hold of their customer service team since yesterday, so has the customer service department at Tesco. A bed was delivered minus two slats. They've been informed and allegedly they will get back to you before 17.30 but it seems that nobody is there to actually return any calls. Poor customer service, item ordered incomplete....still waiting...

name: iLikeToSell
review_text: They say you find out how good a company is when things go wrong...well things did go wrong and the company response was absolutely abysmal! It started when the driver arrived at my door to tell me my shed was here but parts were damaged during transit!? Having the day off work to take delivery and erect, I wanted the replacement parts ASAP. The driver said his phone wasn't working and they didn't pay him to use his own ( probably explains why I didn't get the call promised prior to delivery) and he would be back in the office within 2 hours to report it and I'd get a call from customer services and get a replacement the same day or latest the following day. After 3 hours i called customer services, they said they were not aware of any issues, and they'd have to order new parts, with a min delivery of 5 days! I explained my situation and they advised me to purchase the replacement parts directly and they would reimburse me to a maximum of £30. I checked with my local supplier and the delivered goods were quoted at £47. Another call to customer services who sought approval and then advised me it was ok to order the parts and a note would be made on my order that once I'd submitted an invoice they would refund. I guess naively assuming I was dealing with a reputable supplier I went ahead.Needless to say I am now struggling to get my money, I have had to threaten with credit card and small court intervention and despite a number of promises they still have not paid and I am being fobbed off with the old favourite 'cheques in the post'. 'I like to sell' have delegated the responsibility of reimbursing me firmly with their supplier whom I have no contractural relationship.I have now started proceedings to recover both the cost of the shed and the additional outlay for replacement parts.A very bad experience and by far the worst transaction I have ever had the misfortune to be involved in ( and I do a lot!)So be warned there are lots of other companies where you can buy a shed and I only wish I'd gone there! Hope this review will save any other shed buyers the hassle!

name: Magnetresearchchemical
review_text: This website is a scam. I sent $272usd by Western Union to someone called Yuliya Balla in Ukraine for samples of their products but a few days after the payment was received I get an email off 'customs' saying that they need another e260eu to deliver my package. This has NEVER happened to me before but has happened to me twice recently, see my other reviews! I wouldn't have went to the bother of leaving this review if they didn't rip me off. Definitely looking like a another Scam Site. I will update or remove this review if this issue gets sorted soon, which I doubt very much. Peace -GS-

review_text: i have just purchased a 2nd generation ipad was going to return but in the afternoon started studying the apps i found so much that ve bought another its great i needed youtube and now i have  my favourite channel and found that its got all the sports i need spurs /and arsenal so now all set well done one click crazy deals

name: oneclickcrazydeals.com
review_text: I recently ordered a refurbished Chromebook from this company, as my barely used new one from Argos having been sent off to be repaired for the third time. This was a fraction of the cost. It looks to be in very good condition and, although it only arrived yesterday, it seems to be working perfectly well.

name: oneclickcrazydeals.com
review_text: I ordered an IPad 2 through Woucher at a very low price. The item was delivered within the time frame given. It was professionally packaged, with the IPad looking in perfect condition. I was delighted.Unfortunately, some of the features did not meet my needs and I contacted oneclickcrazydeals via email. Their response was instant, apologising and offering me a refund for my product or an upgrade. I decided to opt for an upgrade, and again, at a very reasonable cost. Any communication from there onwards was transparent and courteous at all times. Returning the iPad was a breeze, and I was always kept up to date with the progress of my return and new delivery.By mistake, I did not remove the device from iCloud for the return, and the team went above and beyond to fix this issue. Even though I felt I was causing them such an inconvenience, they assured me that everything was ok and nothing was a problem.Having looked at their positive reviews, I am not surprised that they have been rated very highly. I would most certainly recommend oneclickcrazydeals to any of my friends and family.Thank you very much for providing me with such an excellent shopping experience.

name: Hearourvoicestore
review_text: This website is extremely questionable. Never again.I told them I love their messages on their products, but their lack of customer service, terrible business ethics and questionable integrity totally put their product messages to shame.I've also reported them to the BBB for their questionable transaction practices.

You are promoting a great cause, and I want to support you, but you need to improve the comfort and quality of the t-shirts.

name: Heets USA
description: We are the FASTEST USA third party suppliers of heat-not-burn products.
review_title: SCAM site - BE WARNED - DO NOT SHOP at HEETSUSA.STORE
review_text: As other reviewer has noted - this is 100% a scam site and store. They are also using USAFASTSHIP as an alternate. They have a slick website, responsive support (Robert), but they claim they were hacked, that their email was hacked and that they are reliable etc. Reliable for scamming is all they are good for. The Trust Pilot listing says they are based in NJ but no one at the address and real store / facility of that address knows anything about Heetsusa.store. The support guy 'Robert'  told me they were based in Chicago.  What a coincidence that the ONLY positive review here from Martha (made up name by heetsusa.store) posted a positive review of the site on Reddit (her first contribution to reddit ever...hmmm).. It is all a shame...because if they spent more effort in actually doing real business they might be on to something but instead they scam around the world (noticing attempts to scam in Asia which will be addressed elsewhere). Anyway TrustPilot community - stay WELL away from this crock of lies. They have a slick site, smooth talking support but they will steal your money as quick as you click pay for order. If Trust Pilot offered 0 out of 5 stars...that would be my choice.

name: Heets USA

review_text: This is one of the scam sites. After you pay you wont get your order.

review_text: I've never had a single issue with ordering from them. Very happy with their service.

name: The Kitchen Depot

review_title: Quite possibly the worst kitchen I have…
review_text: Quite possibly the worst kitchen I have ever had!! The only thing that's worse the  the 19 doors that are chipped, iDrilled to death carcasses, the wrong size doors, brackets loose, squint and broken panels is the lack of customer service! This lot should arrive on a horse! One of my units is 10mm shorter in depth on one side... that's almost impossible to achieve even for these clowns! Brand new house and this is what we get Disgusting!

review_title: They don't know what after sales or customer care mean!!!!
review_text: We just bought a brand new house and this mob fitted the kitchen. Despite the developer trying to get them to come back to conduct remedial repairs they are not interested, they have left chipped edges to a panel, they have butchered one of the wall units when installing and they have left unfinished edges on plinth.Could go on about poor design etc. but if they would just fix the poor workmanship that would be a start.Been in a month now and no sign of any attempt by Kitchen Depot to come out.I appreciate things can go wrong but its all about the after sales and this mob clearly aren't interested. We had intended replacing the kitchen down the line but certainly won't be going anywhere near the Kitchen Depot. Next steps for me is Lawyer to the developer which could all be avoided if they would just come out and do what they need to do to make good.

review_text: This is a review of The Kitchen Depot in Cambuslang and the service we received thoughtout the new kitchen process.The shop opened last year and is fairly near me hence it was my first port of call when thinking about a new kitchen. We were comfortable straight away and Melissa who designed the kitchen was amazing. We did not go anywhere else as we trusted Kitchen Depot and did not see the point.Melissa spent so much time coming up with multiple ideas of what we could do with our space and the final result is amazing. Our kitchen feels bigger, looks so much modern and we have managed to fit in things like a dishwasher which we never had before.Claire, the owner has been a great source of support throughout the process and the fitter Zsolt has done the best job. He is a meticulous worker and worked so hard to deliver us the perfect kitchen on a timely basis.Overall I cannot fault anything about the service and the quality of my new kitchen and I would recommend Kitchen Depot to anyone, especially the Cambuslang branch.

review_text: Tea was amazing at designing and coordinating our kitchen renovation, it was a huge transformation and I can’t imagine getting a better kitchen from anywhere else. She kept our rather tight budget in mind throughout and we are so happy with our new space! Thank you Tea! 😁

review_text: Ongoing support from Kitchen DepotWe had a full kitchen refurbishment undertaken 4 years ago by Kitchen Depot which we are very happy with  (which was undertaken in a timely and professional manner). However recently we noticed that one of the cupboard doors had developed a crack/defect. We contacted Kitchen Depot and they could not have been more helpful and have supplied a new door etc at no cost. Can only congratulate Kitchen Depot on their after care service which I assume is due to it still being a family run business.

review_text: Highly recommend The Kitchen Depot Letchworth. Our kitchen was designed by Chloe and we absolutely love it!We had an idea of layout but she made it a reality. We changed our minds a few times, moved things around and also needed bespoke units but nothing was too much trouble. Seeing the kitchens in the showroom helped us make decisions on the final fixtures and everyone was so friendly and helpful.The build ran really smoothly and Jack and his team were amazing.Overall a great experience from start to finish and would recommend to anyone!!

review_text: Thank you to Chris, Kat and especially to Charlotte for helping us to create our superb kitchen. From our first visit to their showroom to the final signoff, nothing was too much trouble and Charlotte supported and guided us along the way with the myriad of decisions needed for a new kitchen. Thank you all so much.

review_text: We were looking to replace our very old and tired kitchen that we inherited when we bought our home. It was beech in colour (the usual with all new builds), and had no original thought process to functionality for a family of four. After trying many kitchen companies we took a trip to The Kitchen Depot in Kingston Bagpuize. Starting with a brief look at what they had to offer we were delighted with the choice for all budgets. Tea was our amazing designer and really listened to all our wants, needs and quirks that our family needed for a good, functional kitchen. We don't have a huge kitchen so maximising space was a key feature for us.We are delighted with the outcome and Tea has met our vision by producing a sleek, modern and most importantly functional space that is no longer the walk of shame. Amazing kitchen that we're proud of. Thank you 😊

review_title: Lounge Bar and Built in cupboards...Not a Kitchen
review_text: We didn't actually want Kitchen cabinets as we were looking for a lounge built in cupboard and Bar effect. The selection of colours and cabinet sizes were really good and gave us the effect we were looking for. The team at Hemel Hempstead were really helpful and knowledgable of the products and helped us design exactly what we were looking for. I think our requirements were a first for the team, but they all did a great job in measuring and providing designs in 2 and 3D for us to get a real good look at what we were designing. The installation team were also really good at fitting and finishing off the complete design. It was a first for them too, fitting in a front room and not a Kitchen. Nothing was too much trouble for them and they left the room spotlessly clean and wiped down all the doors and handles. I would highly recommend the Kitchen depot in Hemel Hempstead to anyone that was looking for really gggod quality products , Design and Installation.

review_title: Personal touch from Sarah and the team
review_text: We chose The Kitchen Depot over other kitchen suppliers as we liked the personal touch that Sarah and the team gave. We must commend Sarah on the time she spent with us planning our kitchen – I think it was around 8 hours in total! We were unsure what we wanted but with Sarah’s help we looked at all the options and eventually came up with a style and design we liked. Sarah was very helpful in providing advice on finishes, materials, design etc, and coordinated everything - from the delivery of the units to arranging for the worktop suppliers to come and take a template and then finally come and fit it. We used our own fitter who found the units easy to fit. We are very pleased with the end result and are enjoying showing it off to family and friends.

review_text: We cannot thank the Kitchen Depot in Cheltenham enough for transforming our dated no longer fit for purpose kitchen into our dream kitchen.  Everyone says ‘wow’ now when they enter our home! We absolutely love it!  The Kitchen Depot have provided a very professional service from our first meeting with Charlotte in the Cheltenham showroom to the final ‘sign off’.  We are very impressed with the quality of the kitchen units and fittings which are exceptionally well made and solid. Charlotte was always on hand to answer any questions we had and was always very welcoming when we popped into the showroom. Chatting with the design team made us feel at ease with the process as they guided us through the various options and encouraged us to make what was for us some bold decisions.  We simply cannot recommend the Kitchen Depot highly enough!

review_title: Design, Supply and Install  of new Kitchen
review_text: I was recommended by a family member who had their new kitchen designed, supplied and installed by The Kitchen Depot. I was looking for a new Kitchen, thinking I wouldn’t be able to change the exciting layout but when Marcus, one of the designers, started the design, his suggestions totally changed my existing layout. At Kitchen depot they can provide bespoke kitchen units to fit your space. We agreed to go with Kitchen depot at the initial design appt as we were delighted with the quote and design offered. The supply and fit date was arranged a few weeks later, this was really quick and suited us. Before the delivery of units and fit, the allocated fitter came and measured our kitchen against the design to ensure the design was accurate, the fitter Gergi was absolutely great, he took around two hours to ensure all measurements were okay and answered any of our questions. The fitter was great at communicating with us when he was arriving and how long he would take to install etc. Gergi left the kitchen tidy every evening and finished within 4 days . There was one or two items not delivered but Angela at the after sale team at Kitchen Depot was superb and arranged for the parts to be delivered and for Gergi the fitter to come back to finish off the kitchen install. I couldn’t recommend Kitchen Depot highly enough and their fitter Gergi. I am over the moon with my new designed kitchen, it’s fabulous  and the hassle free service I received.

review_text: We eventually chose The Kitchen Depot, Hillington, Glasgow after spending lots of time checking the market regarding Kitchen unit prices, quality, availability etc., After choosing Kitchen units etc. an added plus was on how professionally we were treated by all staff, on every visit whilst deciding final details. Nothing was too much trouble for the design team. Really went out of their way to ensure we were made fully aware of all design options on offer.                                                                       We opted to use the companies installation team again who also carried out their part really well. Found the team courteous, pleasant, tidy workers, arriving at arranged times, who really knew what they were doing. Really pleased with end result.                                                            Would have no hesitation in recommending this company to any future clients. Can't praise them highly enough as to how we were treated from just an enquiry to delivery & installation. Well done to all.

review_text: We recently decided to have a replacement kitchen restyled, bespoke and we decided to consult with The Kitchen Depot, Bishopbriggs this decision was reached after seeing the fantastic TV advertisement after our contact with the company Jill wasted no time by arranging a visit to us followed by an appointment out to their fantastic showroom. Our selection was made and William the main trade person has created our fabulous dream kitchen throughout the installation Jill remained in regular contact in order to quality assure everything was going to plan. It goes without saying we received a 5 star service at a very competitive price and most certainly best value for money, we have no hesitation in recommending The Kitchen Depot, Bishopbriggs should you be considering a new bespoke kitchen

review_title: Great value for money, great service - what’s not to love?
review_text: We bought our kitchen at the end of 2018 from the Kitchen Depot.Firstly, the service in the showroom at Hillington was fantastic. They did all of the cad drawing, sent people out to take measurements, and at no point did it feel like a hard sell. The staff also very helpfully recommended websites to buy matching white goods for the kitchen - they were very knowledgable. Kitchen Depots are NOT overly cheap but this does mean they LAST. They offer amazing value for money, and their base doors and fittings are far more sturdy than the likes of in style or Howdens, who were the local competition. Helpfully, the kitchen depot offer finance too, and this is at a fantastic rate of interest, making getting a new kitchen affordable. Another top thing about this company is that they do all the fitting/trades at the same time. Our kitchen was a wee bit more complex as we were removing walls and replastering ceilings - this meant it took a bit longer than it should have, but the folk did a fantastic job with the fit and they really took their time and were incredibly helpful in answering our questions. We have had one or two issues with the kitchen over the last 3 and a half years, but the company have always been there to fix the teething issues and nothing is ever a hassle. Even recently, when I contacted the company after chipping the paint on my door, they sent out a free tester pot for me to touch it up. I cannot recommend them highly enough. The kitchen has been fanatic value for money for us, and everyone always says ‘wow’ when they enter our home, nearly four years on. What’s not to love?
