name: Souschef
review_text: Used the company lots of times.I'm usually buying far eastern products - noodles, soy sauce, miso, etc - that you can't easily get elsewhere at a reasonable pricePrices are competitiveDelivery is fairly pricedItems have always arrived in good condition with long sell-by datesI'd recommend

name: Souschef
review_title: Great products and service, highly recommended.
review_text: I've bought from Sous Chef a few times now. Orders arrive swiftly, well-packaged and good quality. It's great to find a company that is so reliable. Their range of products is really great too.

name: Souschef
review_title: So my review will be based on recent…
review_text: So my review will be based on recent research for a feedback/review on they paini and biscuits. As I am new customer and all products are costly decide to look for what other customers things of they quality.  To my disappointment all what I could find is how great customer service is etc and I couldn't find any reviews on their panini and quality of they bakery so for that reason decided not to go ahead and complete my order on line. I find it quite bizarre when people write about delivery companies on chef site rather than the product itself

name: Souschef
review_title: Really good customer service and a…
review_text: Really good customer service and a lovely product. Claire was incredibly helpful and kind in resolving an issue and my mum loved her gift - thank you!

name: Souschef
review_title: This is where to go when you can’t find…
review_text: This is where to go when you can’t find that specific ingredient in your local stores. Fantastic array of goods, and I’ve just started subscribing to their monthly surprise box which is shaping up well!

name: Souschef
review_title: Ordered a beech wood rolling pin which…
review_text: Ordered a beech wood rolling pin which arrived damaged and in too small a box. However the firms response was one of mortification. A full apology was given to us with an emailed gift voucher and a replacement rolling pin in perfect condition was delivered the very next day! Very impressed with Sous Chef's response and impressed with the quality of the rolling pin. Would definitely use this firm again and recommend them . Five star rating for them.

name: Souschef
review_title: Our coquilles dishes are beautiful and…
review_text: Our coquilles dishes are beautiful and stylish and the service is fast and customer friendly!

name: Souschef
review_title: Quality food and the best customer service !
review_text: I bought a few boxes of biscuit from them for gifting and two were dented. When they found out, they sent replace right away! Brilliant customer service ! I would buy from them again.

name: Souschef
review_text: Superlative customer service from Lucy. In July 2020 I had bought an Anova vacuum sealer for use with sous vide cooking. Two or three days ago when I tried to seal a couple of steaks, no suck/no vacuum! E-mail was responded to with a request for a short video of the problem. Within 24 hours I had an email advising me a new one was being sent to me by the supplier and there was no need to send the faulty one back to them. It is when things go wrong that’s the true measure of a company’s customer service.

name: Souschef
review_title: Excellent customer service, excellent variety of products
review_text: Excellent customer service handling issues. Thanks Edie for her great customer service. Great variety and selection of cooking ingredients that are difficult to find in your local supermarket. Prompt delivery with no issues.

name: Souschef
review_text: Really like the selection of cooking ingredients that are hard to find elsewhere. Prompt delivery with no issues.

name: Souschef
review_text: Have ordered previously from Sous Chef and have had no problems. However, an order this week arrived damaged due to how it had been packed (heavy item on top of cake). Sous Chef apologised and responded fantastically. This high score is for their excellent customer care - thank you. Mistakes happen, and other companies could learn from Sous Chef’s after-sales customer service.

name: Souschef
review_text: Sous chef are consistently fantastic, generally I order a large amount once every couple of months and have never had an issue with packing or delivery. Every item is meticulously fitted into the box like a game of Tetris, so much so that it takes a considerable amount of time for me to unpack them (which is no complaint at all, I revel in this as it builds the excitement of unboxing each item) - Impeccable service.Many of the bad reviews on this platform are based on Hermes, in my opinion if you are going to spend such an amount on certain luxury products, why not pay for the more reputable courier. It is simply your own fault for not spending that little extra to safeguard your precious items whilst they are being transported to you. Thank you SousChef for broadening my culinary horizons and making rare ingredients very accessible, you have singlehandedly made me a better cook. Keep doing exactly what you are doing.

name: Souschef
review_title: Products Good/ Delivery & Packing Not So Good
review_text: I am a repeat customer of Sous Chef. The website has a good range of harder-to-get products. I have almost always been satisfied with product quality. The packaging and delivery has let me down on multiple occasions now. The box almost always looks like it's been sat on or kicked. Tins with dents, spices with holes in the bags, crushed pasta. It's a shame. Whenever I've needed to make a complaint it's usually dealt with with no issues.  I'd also note to check if you can find products from your local supermarket for cheaper.

name: Souschef
review_text: We have had enormous problems with deliveries from Hermes recently but Souschef went above and beyond to resolve these for us.Such a difference from other companies we contacted. We will definitely  be using them in future.

name: Souschef
review_text: Superfast delivery through DPD less than 24 hours beautifully packaged quality products from a quality operator

name: Souschef
review_title: First visit to the Sous Chef website…
review_text: First visit to the Sous Chef website today and it was such a pleasure. The item I wanted was in stock (unlike on other websites), and shipping is free which makes a big difference to the cost. Great communication regarding my delivery. The wide range of high quality items in the store make it impossible not to buy more than you intended, and I have bookmarked the site for future use.

name: Souschef
review_text: Sous Chef has a brilliant selection of great quality products, but they have started using Hermes for their (paid for) economy delivery.I don't think I've ever had an issue-free delivery from Hermes, and it's been consistently bad at three different addresses.A competitor I order from offers free DPD delivery, and I think Sous Chef should reconsider their Delivery strategy.

name: Souschef
review_text: wonderful company to deal with, prompt, polite and extremely helpful.Great range of products.

name: Souschef
review_text: Great experience. Knowledgeable staff, excellent kit and great service.

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_title: I was very lucky to have Eman from…
review_text: I was very lucky to have Eman from hiiguru.She is not only a fantastic designer but someone who takes the time to get to know you and your tastes.I have been working on remodelling our bathroom and she brought great ideas and touches that matched our taste and would never have thought of. She made it perfect and always listened.Would definitely recommend Eman, Dara and the entire hiiguru team.

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_title: Emily helped me so much with deciding…
review_text: Emily helped me so much with deciding the type of curtains to install for my flat. Emily helped narrow down my options based on design limitations and my preferences, and also recommended a few retailers to find the perfect set of curtains. She helped me save so much money in rework costs, and she also saved me so much time! I highly recommend Emily for your design needs.

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_text: Within just 2 hour's notice of making my appointment (and me completing the pre-consultation form with my thoughts (very cool idea!)), Jen pulled together great advice around transforming a potentially bland kitchen (about to be ordered) and dining area into a stylish area with the use of different textures.  Jen suggested the type of worktop, flooring, dining furniture, lighting and colour paint palettes that would pull it altogether. I will be seeking Jen's advice again soon and recommending HiiGuru to all my friends!

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_text: Dimitar has been great, gave me lots of useful design tips and got on board with my vision really quickly. And all of this in a 30’ consultation.

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_text: Love this company. Easy to use. Completely custom package for my needs when redesigning a bunch of rooms in my home. They were so helpful in figuring out which packages I needed. I had a wonderful designer who really listened and understood what I wanted from my vague explanations. She gave me answers to questions but also showed me how to be brave and try things myself. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend HiiGuru (especially the designer Idil) and will be using them again in future.

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_title: A nudge in the right direction for our nursery setup!
review_text: My husband and I are in the process of changing our office/guest room into a nursery/guest room for our baby who's on the way. I had a consultation call with Jennie, who validated my initial thoughts on furniture placement and gave me some great ideas for colors, accessories, and a way to bring the whole room design together without being too matchy. I appreciated that Jennie came to the consultation prepared with some images she thought could work for the room, based on pictures I shared from the rest of my house. After the consultation I felt inspired and excited to move ahead with this direction for the room! Jennie was also warm and fun and easy to talk to. HiiGuru was the perfect support for me with this room design, because I didn't want to bring on an interior designer to handle the entire project and just needed a little confirmation and nudge in the right direction. Thank you!

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_text: For my flat refurb project, I booked Sam for unlimited access and felt instantly reassured by his support and knowledge. He was able to guide me through some key decisions, gave me his expert opinion, and also helped answer some small questions that came up along the way. He was also able to help me anticipate certain things I never would have thought of otherwise. It was amazing to have such easy access to an expert at such a reasonable price!

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_title: I had a great session with Laura
review_text: I had a great session with Laura! I was about to make a disappointing and expensive mistake but she reassured me that the sofa, fabric and colour I wanted would work - as well as helping with complementary colours and lighting tips!

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_title: I am moving to a new flat in a few…
review_text: I am moving to a new flat in a few months and wanted to take the opportunity to make the place truly a home and reflective of my style. I had a session with the Interior Design Guru, Bronwyn, and she listened to all my challenges (I have 2 kids and a lot of clutter!) and my preferences, and she helped me define a plan on how to get started with my interior design process. I was so impressed by how Bronwyn broke things down in an easy-to-digest way - not an easy ask when I’m pretty much starting from scratch and have absolutely no design experience at all! Now I don’t feel alone in this process, and know that I always have a Professional Interior Designer on call whenever I need help (without having to pay for a whole project!). Thank you HiiGuru for making this possible!

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_text: I used HiiGuru to help with our living room plan and decor. My boyfriend and I had just bought a place and were struggling with our lounge’s layout, and how to style it in a way that we both liked. Peter gave us different ideas on how to tie together all the elements in a cohesive way. It was exactly the expert advice we needed to give our new space a boost!

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_text: I had such a productive (and fun!) session with Sam. He was so great with understanding my style and giving me suggestions that worked for both me and my husband (and even helped settle a dispute between us!). I love that everything was done over video chat. I got to speak with a true expert and received tangible advice without paying a fortune - so worth the time, money & stress saved!

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_text: My wife & I just moved into a new flat and hired a builder to help us with bathroom & kitchen renovations. As we were deciding on various colours and materials, we thought it would be useful to also consult an interior designer for an expert opinion. Sam was our Interior Design Guru - he quickly understood our style and preferences, helped guide our thinking on a few key decisions, and advised us on what to do when we got stuck. We have much more clarity and confidence in our decisions now - Sam saved us time & stress and helped us avoid some expensive mistakes. We look forward to speaking with him again when we enter the next phase of our interior design process!

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_title: I had a virtual interior design session…
review_text: I had a virtual interior design session with Dimitar and he was great at giving me advice on everything from wall colours and furniture to shelf styling and how to best achieve symmetry in my living room area. I’d definitely recommend HiiGuru to anyone who needs advice on interior design at a reasonable price. Thank you HiiGuru!

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_title: Already using Peter's wall recommendations in my space
review_text: I used Peter as my design guru and could instantly tell he was very knowledgeable in this space.  We talked a lot about symmetry and what would fit best in my space.  I have already incorporated some of his ideas!

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_title: When my hot water stopped running
review_text: When my hot water stopped running, hii guru came to my rescue this weekend! Moe , the home repairs guru, instantly gave me the confidence that we would fix my boiler on the zoom call and indeed we did in 5-7 minutes! The whole experience was unbelievably friction free, effortless and so affordable. I am amazed that this works so well! Can’t wait to try some of the consultation services for home decor or beauty now! Thanks Moe and thanks hii guru!

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_title: Moe the engineer was very helpful and…
review_text: Moe the engineer was very helpful and help me through the whole process with my boiler  thank you for such a pleasant experience, I couldn’t recommend him more , look no further

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_text: Had a 10 minute consultation with the Interior Design Guru, who helped me with my home office space. Easy and fuss free online booking system, and prompt consultation. My Guru was friendly, supportive, and more importantly, fun! Would definitely be using more of Hii Guru's services in the future!

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_text: I used HiiGuru's beauty service to learn how to do a proper winged liner once and for all. I had my session with Atira, who was so knowledgeable about makeup techniques.  She demonstrated two techniques based on my eye shape and eyelid, and gave me tips that I've been searching for endlessly on YouTube (without success)! I would highly recommend Atira to anyone who wants makeup advice and to learn some tips and tricks. She made our session super fun too and it really made me miss going to Sephora and trying out new products and techniques.

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_title: My wife and I had a consultation with…
review_text: My wife and I had a consultation with Fiona, one of Hii’s sleep consultants. We had a session with Fiona to help our 4 month old transition from sleeping in our bed to her own cot. We also needed to get her going to bed earlier. Fiona was so easy to talk to and really took into account our parenting style. She gave us practical advice as well as a realistic timeline of what to expect and when. The first two nights were tough, but every night saw an improvement and after one week our daughter was at her desired bedtime and sleeping contently in her own cot. Fiona’s help has completely changed our evenings and both parents are sleeping better as a result 😊

name: HiiGuru
description: 👋  Your Personal On-Demand Interior Design Guru
review_title: I had a skincare consultation with…
review_text: I had a skincare consultation with Julia and I was highly impressed. She was friendly, professional, knowledgable. She went through some biological and scientific reasons for why our skin does what it does which was super interesting and also gave me some practical day to day tips for keeping a healthy skin and skincare routine. She answered all my questions and provided me with a ton of insight. She also followed up with notes which was quite handy. The hiiguru platform is really user friendly, I was able to book and then jump on a zoom call pretty easily and smoothy. So convenient to have this virtual option and expert advice at your fingertips. Highly recommended - 5 stars.

name: Discogs
description: Buy rare and hard to find music on vinyl records and used CDs from thousands of online record stores. Manage your music collection with a detailed discography on rock, electronic, hip hop, classical and other popular and obscure music genres.
review_title: A site that forces your information out there even if you DONT WANT IT.
review_text: Please remove my stupid college recording project from your website. I'm not famous and I didn't officially release it and I don't know who put it on there. It also has loads of INCORRECT info which is laughable. Take it down please. I have a right to my internet publicity and if my face is on your website and this album was never officially released, no one had the right to put it on your site.

name: Discogs
description: Buy rare and hard to find music on vinyl records and used CDs from thousands of online record stores. Manage your music collection with a detailed discography on rock, electronic, hip hop, classical and other popular and obscure music genres.
review_title: DISCOGS USELESS. ANDRÉ KOLE A LIAR AND RIP OFF MERCHANT
review_text: I don't know why Discogs offer a 'support' procedure as they are as useful as they are as supportive as a chocolate jock strap. Utterly useless and set up to favour crooks. I ordered a NM graded LP from André Kole in the Netherlands for a total of €38.40. NM (as set out in the grading instructions within Discogs site) basically means the record LOOKS unplayed and as new. What arrived looked like the LPs had been unsleeved and stored under a bed for twenty years and the sleeve stored in direct sunlight for same given its bleached condition. I questioned Kole stating my unhappiness. He disagreed and reckoned the grading was down to personal opinion. I knew I was definitely dealing with an idiot. I wanted a return and refund. He reluctantly agreed, also stating I wouldn't be out of pocket. I spent a further £14.10 to return tracked (I wasn't risking Kole saying it hadn't arrived). In short, the LP hit customs in Europe and stayed there for over TWO MONTHS. By the time it eventually arrived, the Discogs feedback window CLOSED - something they claim they cannot change - and I know Kole was counting on this happening by this point. He did refund me €30 but reneged on his promise not to leave me out of pocket. Now over £20 in shipping. Kole now not responding and Discogs not interested.AVOID DISCOGS IF POSSIBLE AND DO NOT BUY FROM ANDRÉ KOLE IN NETHERLANDS.

name: Discogs
description: Buy rare and hard to find music on vinyl records and used CDs from thousands of online record stores. Manage your music collection with a detailed discography on rock, electronic, hip hop, classical and other popular and obscure music genres.
review_title: Took a week to ship a single CD
review_text: Took a week to ship a single CD. No warning on the delay from the buyer, no action can be taken. You just buy things and deal with whatever disappointment comes your way. Welcome to Discogs.

name: Discogs
description: Buy rare and hard to find music on vinyl records and used CDs from thousands of online record stores. Manage your music collection with a detailed discography on rock, electronic, hip hop, classical and other popular and obscure music genres.
review_text: Discogs is a marketplace and as such I can’t hold them completely responsible per se.  However I can say the sellers can be very nefarious.   I’ve had two this week trying to get me to pay for items directly, bypassing Discogs.  Like I would blindly send money using the friend option to a random PayPal account with no buyer protection.  Agree with many on over graded records and no recourse to dispute.   I only buy from sellers with a high number of reviews and 100% sat scores.  Nothing that’s not in my home country.  Nothing expensive/collectors unless you can risk it.   eBay definitely favors the buyers in disputes. Discogs seems to be a “buyer on your own” situation.

name: Discogs
description: Buy rare and hard to find music on vinyl records and used CDs from thousands of online record stores. Manage your music collection with a detailed discography on rock, electronic, hip hop, classical and other popular and obscure music genres.
review_title: There is bad sellers at discogs.
review_text: I've usually used ebay for purchasing LP.I recently used discogs for a month.The experince at discogs was terrible that I couldn't have before.Check the seller's feedbacks and point first!Do not order the lower grade sellers under 98%.They'll send wrong grade LP.And they'll say a lie that it was perfect.As For ebay,They resolve the issue immediately when customer met wrong item.So the customers don't have to fight with bad sellers.But doscogs is totally different.When you have some issue for item,you have to fight with bad sellers by yourself.Discogs dosen't help anything.When the seller was saying a lie,You have to call to your credit card company to hold your payment.It's not so good.And the seller dosn't support the return shipping charge.Even though they made a mistake.Discogs dosen't make any safety assurance for custommer.And the bad sellers makes bad feedback to customers what they just want.I received bad feedback from bad seller.But it wasn't true.The seller posted VG plus grade LP.But he sent G grade Lp.And then he wrote negative feedback that it was close to near mint and I said a lie.stay away from discogs.just use ebay.Ebay has safety assurance for customer.It's very dangerous to purchase at discogs.And you would be really stressed with bad sellers.Discogs looks that they don't control the bad sellers.That was horrible exprience that I've never seen before at Ebay.

name: Discogs
description: Buy rare and hard to find music on vinyl records and used CDs from thousands of online record stores. Manage your music collection with a detailed discography on rock, electronic, hip hop, classical and other popular and obscure music genres.
review_text: Worst experience ever. Seller sent me overgraded vinyl record & sleeve, messages from him were flippant then downright nasty.  Had to get minimum partial refund from PayPal after which seller left negative feedback. Asked for review & feedback to be removed. Discogs refused request even though he clearly breached their feedback guidelines.  He called me "shake down artist" which is virtually the same as "scam artist" which Discogs own guidelines state cannot be used in feedback.  There is no buyer protection on this site anymore; previously there had been protection.  Clearly Discogs is no longer interested in following or imposing their own rules. Ebay & Amazon far superior as you do get protection. You can also talk to someone on both those sites, on Discogs you cannot.  Email messaging with Discogs is a complete waste of time.

name: Discogs
description: Buy rare and hard to find music on vinyl records and used CDs from thousands of online record stores. Manage your music collection with a detailed discography on rock, electronic, hip hop, classical and other popular and obscure music genres.
review_text: Recently purchased some laughably overgraded and utterly rubbish quality vinyl....on enquiry to seller I immediately received a passive-aggressive wiseguy reply. Writing this off to experience and binning the goods. No intention of not cross-referencing with Trustpilot again prior to any financial transaction - let alone in light of the sea of negative feedback here. Sticking to Ebay and Amazon for the long haul. What a ludicrous waste of a brilliant business model and what a sign of the idiot times.

review_text: Discogs is no longer the awesome platform it used to be. Now, it sometimes has incorrect information about music albums. Sometimes packages get damaged because of relying on FedEx. Which FedEx is now damaging products before they get shipped to customers. So, customers are having a harder time getting undamaged products from Discogs now. It just shows unprofessionalism on Discogs's part by associating itself with FedEx. Also, trying to register an account on Discogs has become a privacy nightmare. Disposable emails, V.P.Ns, and other things have made users not be able to get registered on Discogs. So, Discogs has cowered down to fascist Big Brother disguised as preventing spammers, bots, trolls, etc.

review_title: Lots of bad reviews here but mostly…
review_text: Lots of bad reviews here but mostly sellers to thick to figure out how to use the discogs sellers pages.The only negative things I as a buyer will say about discogs is sellers listing stock that isn't even in stock or the occasional bad condition record listed as much better than it's reality.Some sellers will try to charge fat too much but it's up to the buyer to look at all available items and choose the best price according to condition for themselves and if not happy on receipt of goods send back for a refund.I would rather buy from Discogs than eBay or other record selling sites (unless the record is brand new, then I buy direct from record conpanies/Bandcamp pages of musicians.)Overall my loads of buys from Discogs has been 90% positive.

description: Buy rare and hard to find music on vinyl records and used CDs from thousands of online record stores. Manage your music collection with a detailed discography on rock, electronic, hip hop, classical and other popular and obscure music genres.
review_text: Imagine eBay and discord but for super angry divorced dads who collect vinyl That are constantly looking to fight.Incredibly toxic platform, there is no admins or moderators so it’s all individual older age guys running the website. If you want to make changes or fix a release good luck LOL, they will INSTANTLY become hostile in the name of “imputing incorrect info” when in reality it’s correct, but you can’t mediate that because your not able to talk with an actual admin who knows the rules. It’s seriously the most toxic platform I’ve ever been on, worse than Reddit and discord. All of the forums are toxic, when you ask for help it’s incredibly toxic, and in general it’s just a really messy and bad place. Thankfully that generation is dying off, so in 10-20 years it’ll be a little less worse.

name: Discogs
description: Buy rare and hard to find music on vinyl records and used CDs from thousands of online record stores. Manage your music collection with a detailed discography on rock, electronic, hip hop, classical and other popular and obscure music genres.
review_text: BUYER BEWAREThey say that there is buyer protection - in reality this depends on how you pay and there is little Discogs can do should your order have an issue. The story:I bought a vinyl from a reseller for an album that was released the week before. I hadn't received it after a couple of months, the seller told me that there were issues on the release of the vinyl due to distribution lines, COVID, etc. They told me they could prove they had made the order and that the vinyl would be shipped directly to me when it's ready. After 7 months of constant contact with the seller wondering where my £100 vinyl was I contacted Discogs who told me in a long winded way that there's nothing they can do to get my money back if the time had expired from PayPal, and I couldn't leave feedback because they have an arbitrary 90 day policy on leaving feedback on a seller. At 90 days post payment the seller was telling me that it would be shipped within a month, my money had been sent, the seller had not updated the page to payment received. All very suspicious. LUCKILY the seller was legitimate, I got the vinyl 7 months after paying for it. But had I not, there's nothing Discogs would have done to help me get my money back.

name: Discogs
description: Buy rare and hard to find music on vinyl records and used CDs from thousands of online record stores. Manage your music collection with a detailed discography on rock, electronic, hip hop, classical and other popular and obscure music genres.
review_title: Getting charged ridiculous fees after refunding buyer
review_text: 1st of all the combined shipping update they did a year ago is so ridiculous, it is impossible to figure...  hence I stopped selling there.. I was only able to set up one country.. Australia which I wasn't even sure it worked, so fast forword a year I sell a record for $60.00 to Australia, I was shocked, I realized I didn't even have the record, because I thought my inventory was dead and I sold it elswhere, so of course I tried to refund the buyer and I found out that after shipping and taxes to Australia the buyer paid $94.94, I olnly received $74.00 and change...  I tried to refund the buyer the full amount after canceling the item and I couldn't!!  Because Discogs and Paypal took $20.00 in fees that they wouldn't refund.   I contacted customer service and they said "oh well that's how it goes"...   I am done with both of them...

review_text: Really good and reliable, i received my vinyls in excellent condition in 3 days! I don’t understand the negative views at all.  I took a risk and ordered, and there were no faults. I think it just depends on the seller, so just make sure they’re reputable. Overall very satisfied

name: Discogs
description: Buy rare and hard to find music on vinyl records and used CDs from thousands of online record stores. Manage your music collection with a detailed discography on rock, electronic, hip hop, classical and other popular and obscure music genres.
review_title: Don't care to correct inaccuracies pointed out by the artist themselves, appallingly incompetant and smug customer service that ignores their own guidelines
review_text: I'm an artist who has been in a painfully drawn-out, repetitive and, frankly, daft email back and forth with a Discogs 'Community Support Coordinator' who neither acknowledges the official Discogs guidelines that I've pointed out to him nor the inaccuracy of how they have listed one of my projects and the IP violation which is resulting from this.This project is part of a wider fine art piece which was surprising to find on Discogs to begin with; it turns out, a Russian DJ had downloaded it for free somewhere, altered one of the pieces of music, and put it on a podcast which he then uploaded, auto-generating an artist page for the project... only the name is wrong. I have been trying to get this name corrected as it is extremely relevant and important to this deeply personal project, but this customer service person I'm dealing with insists it's impossible. I cite Discogs' own guidelines, exceptions, quote various passages from the site itself, and this person doesn't even acknowledge these. I then ask for an artist page with the *correct* name to be generated so that the work can at least be linked to that instead; "no, our community will flag it because it's a duplicate!". How would that be a duplicate? Discogs is crediting this project with the wrong name because of some bootleg on a podcast!Honestly, I wouldn't trust any of the information there; they have absolutely zero quality control, no checks, and little concern for accuracy. I have an appointment with an IP specialist over this and will certainly be taking it further as I'm extremely angry about this situation and the unpleasant taste it's left in my mouth regarding this project. That this website has the gall to misrepresent musical artists and/or present inaccurate information with such little concern while basing its whole business model on these same artists is revolting.

name: Discogs
description: Buy rare and hard to find music on vinyl records and used CDs from thousands of online record stores. Manage your music collection with a detailed discography on rock, electronic, hip hop, classical and other popular and obscure music genres.
review_text: Worst support ever. This review reflects my experiences with the site and their putrid staff members rather than the traditional pros/ cons/ best bang for your buck review, either way, it still matters just the same. For two years the staff removed every negative review I left for a seller whenever it was appropriate. Sellers got away with everything and the staff repeatedly left me with no recourse. Last time they did it, naturally I became enraged and I had had enough so righteous indignation took front row seat  and I felt compelled enough to lash out and issue their staff the worst 2 year cursing out they've likely ever gotten in their whole lives, and they deserved it. They then blocked access to everything in an attempt to retaliate on top of the 2 years they participated in the discrimination. Now the block is not a problem for me, there are tons of workarounds. Nonetheless they still to this day on a brand new account continue to engage in this childish game of cat and mouse where they've seemed to focus their efforts  into non-stop spying on my network activity (instead of doing their jobs) and blocking every new account, new IP address I come up with. And they've been doing this nonstop, painstakingly for weeks. It makes them look desperate, misanthropic, empty, vitriolic, pathetic. I've also recently found out they've removed hundreds of negative feedback from a seller, just look up in their forum under thread 718917. For over 2 years I put up with their constant attempts to marginalize and push me into a corner every time I had a problem. The marketplace is a joke. Feedback system is a joke. Worst support ever.

review_title: I've purchased from this company before…
review_text: I've purchased from this company before many times. Some products are amazing, some really overpriced especially their small perfume bottles, others not so good and others not good at all. Ok, why the two stars? I asked for samples of several perfumes to be sent to me only to be shipped and billed all the perfumes. The reason I am asking for samples is to see if I like the perfumes in order to buy them because it's dumb to send a customer a brand new perfume for them to open it smell and return it if they don't like it. That's wasted items there. Another thing I have found really annoying is that items that smelled amazing are no longer available for purchase and thirdly, why would you issue a cheque and send it via post to a customer in 2021? The customer service is ok in that they processed a refund but via cheque? Come on. Didn't even ask me if this was my preferred method of refund. Then to be sent whole bottles of perfumes and then having to return them cus the agent didn't understand what a sample is. After weighing the pros and the cons of dealing with this company I don't think I'll ever buy from here again. Their marketing is really good they always catch me with their promotions but the items I like are never there. Til I see the items I like, I'll never come back here again.

review_text: Battery not workingI charged it as per guidelines and even after more than 4 hours the first time when I received it, not working. I tried again the next day still the same. Very poor quality for a price so deceiving. Not worth it.

name: Silk Wave
review_text: Not surprised to see i have the same issue with this product as other reviewers. After only using twice and being impressed with it, from the third it would not charge. Half the price of the curler its imitating. Dont waste your money and buy the original. Fab results when it works though

name: Silk Wave
review_text: What a fabulous piece of kit!!To top it all off, it’s even wireless and remote!!Incredibly easy to use, lovely to look at and makes a great present!!So far i’ve bought 2 and need 2 more as gifts!Totally recommend!!

name: Silk Wave
review_text: The curling itself is great, the product is fairly simple to use and convinient for travelling. However the battery is making this product fairly unusable. I have thin, shoulder length hair and I cannot get through my entire head of hair before the battery runs out. You can't use the curler whilst it's charging either. Now when I fully charge it, it drops back down to 2 bars a couple minutes after being turned on. These types of curlers are great, but Silkwave is a cheap, plasticy immitation.

name: Silk Wave
review_title: Love it when I got it, not now...
review_text: I loved this when I got it - I've never been able to curl my hair easily. However only 6 months on, when I count on one hand the amount of times that I've used it, it doesn't hold charge. After charging overnight, as soon as I switch it on it goes down to 2 bars, and is dead within 20minutes. The same thing has happened with my sister's too. Don't bother buying this - no guarantee apart from 14 days, pay a little more for a better model.

name: Silk Wave
review_title: My daughter bought it for my birthday.
review_text: My daughter bought it for my birthday.We were so excited to use it.Unfortunately doesn't work as advertised. Even if I used a mousse and a hair spray, the curls will not last more than 15 minutes.We are so saaaad.I do not recommend this product.

name: Silk Wave
review_title: After reading alot of bad reviews I was…
review_text: After reading alot of bad reviews I was worried about receiving mine. But I absolutely love it. I think for people with thick, long hair it may not work as well. I did put too much hair in once and it got stuck...panic! But I just used smaller chunks and it was fine. My hair only takes me 15 mins to curl and I can get 2-3 uses out of it before I have to charge it again. I love the results. Maybe for people with longer/thicker hair, silkwave could make a larger barrel? It may help :)

name: Silk Wave
review_text: Very dissapointed in this company. Clearly states on their website product comes with usb cable...mine did not. After emailing them they assured me it would be sent out asap. Over a week ago!. Will not order off this company again

name: Silk Wave
review_title: Won't hold its charge at all
review_text: Won't hold its charge at all. Won't hold its temperature at all either.

name: Silk Wave
review_text: Absolutely rubbish! Do not buy this! It is not quick and easy and the results are poor. You cannot put any more than 5 inches or so of hair otherwise it gets tangled and jammed, so their adverts of women with long curled hair is a lie. The strands have to be miniscule otherwise, again, it gets jammed. Took me an hour to curl my whole head and I have thin, blonde hair. So not quick and on the go at all. Despite me using the hottest setting and using hair spray, the curls fell out after around an hour. The product itself is cheap, it doesn't hold charge well at all and the led display is always flashing on and off. Cheap, light plastic

name: Silk Wave
review_text: When it works it’s brilliant. After only a few uses the battery wouldn’t hold its charge even after 24/36 it only had two bars then it stopped charging altogether. Emailed Silk Wave and my immediate return I received another FOC. Today after being used 6/7 times it started to not hold its charge only reaching 3 bars then the barrel broke. Also you can’t charge it hiker it is recharging. Shame I won’t be getting another waste of money. As I said brilliant results when it worked

name: Silk Wave
review_text: Christmas present 2020 only used it 3 times.  Tried to use it recently but now won’t hold its charge even though it’s been on charge for several hours.  Absolute waste of money it’s gone in the bin 😡

name: Silk Wave
review_text: Absolutely amazing product at such a great affordable price.  Not only is there more than one different heat setting but there’s 6 different cool down settings too which is brilliant for creating different kinds of curls with the product! I love it because you can take it out with you on the go to top up your curls if they drop or if you’re running late! It’s small, compact and portable, who wouldn’t love this product.Along side all these amazing features you can also take your silk wave curler out and use it as a portable phone charger bank which is just insane to be able to offer such a unique trait from the product itself, you’d be crazy not to buy one for the more than affordable price.

name: Silk Wave
review_text: I bought this for £40 direct from Silk-wave. Don't waste your money. I have used it a handful of times and it now no longer holds a charge so I can no longer use it. A charge takes 4 hours and it doesn't work whilst being charged! As the product is more than 6 months old Silkwave have refused to help me even though it has only been used 4/5 times! poor value for money and poor customer service.

name: Silk Wave
review_title: I ordered the silkwave hair curler for…
review_text: I ordered the silkwave hair curler for my niece for Christmas. It was £40. The product is rubbish. It’s very flimsy, it doesn’t work on long hair and it runs out of charge very quickly. This means you do a section of hair and then it needs charging again. The company only offer a 14 day refund so we are stuck with it!!

name: Silk Wave
review_text: Amazing ! Didn’t arrive in set time frame so emailed them and got my next day delivery charge refunded by Ivan. Silkwave arrived yesterday and I’m amazed ! It’s amazing!! Curls galore ! Fab company

name: Silk Wave
review_title: This product is the work of the devil
review_text: This product is the work of the devil! It chewed up my lovely long hair and I had to pull it out. I thought I was actually going to have to cut it. If you value your hair, please avoid this product.

name: Silk Wave
review_title: Ignore the bad reviews, the product is great
review_text: I ordered the product and read reviews afterwards! I was a little sceptical due to the amount of negative reviews. I even emailed customer support and they responded straight away.I love this product, it works perfect on my hair. Great price great product,  would defo recommend.

name: Silk Wave
review_text: Disappointed. Doesn't hold charge, as soon as I switch it on it drops 2 bars, do no more than 2 curls and it's dead... such a shame I was really excited when I got this for Christmas.

review_title: I’ve had same problems as others

Customer service impossible to get hold of and the website says return faulty goods but no address anywhere that I can see???? Started a dispute claim with PayPal- disgusting product so disappointing

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_title: The worst customer service ever and made not to last
review_text: Bought sofa bed from you... £1300 ... after a year it is impossible to sit on... cushions are so thin and I feel like I am better off sleeping and sitting on the floor... and that would be ok if you did anything about it after I complained... you told me it is my own fault because I have not plumped the cushion enough... I mean... what a customer service... I was offered for the technician to come over and after I said yes sure I was told I will have to pay for his visit... Do you not care at all for your consumers? Your customer service is a joke and you are actually commiting a fraud as your name states it is made to last... in fact after a year I can only bin the £1300 sofa bed I have bought from you... Oh yes, I was kindly offered to replace cushions but to pay for them with my own money 🤣 People need to know to stay clear of you...

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_text: We recently purchased a folding bed from Made To Last.  I cannot recommend this company highly enough.I needed to discuss the order with customer services because we had recently taken on hosting a family of refugees and I needed advice on the best bed to buy, and special delivery arrangements to fit around us.Emma and her team took it upon themselves to make sure that our purchase and delivery met our needs.  We received the bed to schedule and it is absolutely perfect for what we wanted.  Their website was easy to use and informative, prices keen, and customer service the envy of others.Thanks Made to Last for such a positive experience during what is a stressful time for me, my wife, and family.  I'll be sure to look you up next time!

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_title: Bed arrived really quickly after it was…
review_text: Bed arrived really quickly after it was ordered. The bed is easy to operate and according to our guest comfortable to sleep in. We bought the cover which helps keep it dust free and fits well. On the whole very happy although I will get a topper for anyone staying longer.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_title: Replacement mattress for z bed (fold up bed)
review_text: I ordered a replacement mattress for a z-bed.  Although the company do not advertise that you can buy mattresses separately, you can. They are the only place I have found. It seems crazy to me that if you need to replace the mattress you would otherwise need to replace the entire working frame.  I am really pleased with the mattress quality and would recommend this as an eco alternative to replacing your entire frame (check sizings carefully if you buy one as there are many to choose from depending on your frame size)

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_title: Expect delays and expect to have to chase but only sofa bed with proper sized mattress I could find
review_text: Placed my order at the end of January and was given an end of March delivery date. In early March I contacted MTL and was told that there was a general delay and that the order would be completed week commencing 11th April. I followed up on 11.04. and was told that the order was still due to be completed by the end of that week. After some more chasers I was told on 21.04. that there was a delay with the fabric (why this wasn’t known earlier is not clear) but it was finally completed on 29.04. Apparently there was a generic email sent to people effected by the delay but I never received it and have checked my spam folder. I contacted Jaspreet to arrange the delivery for the first week of May (we were going away the week after) but of course the delivery didn’t materialise. I had liaise with both Jaspreet and Marc and requested deliver on Monday 16.05. but somehow that wasn’t clear and the sofa finally arrived on 18.05.I had requested a couple of free scatter cushions for the hassle and delay but that was not deemed reasonable even though MTL have had my money for almost 16 weeks and communication has been reactive rather than forthcoming. Jaspreet has been great but I think they have too many orders and are overwhelmed with trying to give the customer service you’d expect for the money you spend. The sofa itself looks very well made and colour is exactly as the fabric swatch. The two people who delivered it were great.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_title: A great experience, and a great retailer
review_text: Rarely impressed with many retailers or service providers in recent years; here is an exceptionNo Covid-excuses, no delays, no issues - quite simply, a lovely, fairly priced sofa, delivered in reasonable timescales with good communications. Delivery team were excellent, assembled the feet etc, including adding pads to the feet, and removing all packaging without extra fees or negotiationA great company, offering a great product and service - highly recommend

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_text: Ordered Burwell 2 seat sofabed after receiving a range of fabric samples.Placed order on website and was given a rather optimistic 1 week delivery date! Was very quickly emailed on the next working day to explain that there was a mistake with the estimated delivery date and an explanation that it was in fact meant to be 5 weeks, which is what we had expected. But that if we wanted to cancel at that point, then we could and that they were sorry for confusion.It was good to have such open and clear customer service and I really appreciated them reaching out.Sofa was completed and I received several emails explaining the stages and arranged delivery with the delivery company - was given some flexibility on when would be best.Delivery arrived on time and the two guys from the delivery company assembled the sofa quickly and with a smile.The sofa itself is extremely comfortable - I have sat on a lot of sofabeds and I don't think you would be able to tell - you could easily use this as an everyday sofa without knowing it was also a sofabed.The sofabed has a great mattress and converts quickly and easily. Very comfortable - really pleased with the product and the customer service I received. I would definitely buy from this company again.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_title: Love the quality of the sofabed
review_text: Love the quality of the sofabed. Comfy and robust to sit on and mattress thicker than most others we looked at. Daughter had a good night sleep on it. Fabric is thick and looks like it will last. It was 3 or 4 weeks quicker than expected to manufacture. There was an issue with the delivery company promising a date but then not turning up and no contact til I was in touch a few days later at which point they expedited delivery.Very happy with the sofabed and would recommend.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_text: Very happy with the product and the finish. The delivery service was also to a high standard and cleared away all of the packaging.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_text: Possibly the worst experience of buying something  on line: having ordered the sofa bed and then been given a delivery date the first part of the saga was that the two-bit delivery company phoned late on the day of delivery (having given a time slot of the morning) to say the van had broken down....fine.  They then tried to say that i would have to wait nearly a week as they had other deliveries scheduled!!!! Having made a huge fuss, the sofa bed was then delivered two days later.  The best bit is that the sofa bed arrived in 6 pieces/unassembled and the delivery company got my builder to sign a piece of paper saying that I had declined assembly, dumped it and left.  Having unwrapped it to find no instructions and pieces that only a weighlifter could pick up alone I phoned both the delivery company and Made to Last.  MtL did accept it was disappointing and did phone the delivery company immediately who produced the signed delivery paperwork. To be fair to MTL they arranged for Homeserve to send someone out the next day (Day 5 of the delivery saga) to assemble it: the technician gallantly assembled it single-handedly whilst I was in work, having phoned several times to say how difficult it would be on his own. In the process, he then scratched my brand new floor in my 3 week old new extension.  All three companies are now denying responsibility and we are in dispute.  The only positive, is MTL have always been contactable and the customer service people are very pleasant but I can honestly say I have never been so upset or disappointed in my consumer-life.  Steer clear would be my advice, which is a shame as the product when eventually assembled was nice. The small print says you can ask them to deliver fully assembled when you order....even though you're never asked that question on the purchase page.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_text: Lavenham sofabed from Made-to-Last has been an expensive disappointment. It is hard, dents where you sit and is difficult to plump. Worst of all, the angle of the seat is such that you have to almost hold yourself on to it so as not to slip forward. As a sofa, it is a failure.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_title: WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE I HAVE EVER SEEN IN THE UK
review_text: I ordered my sofa on 27/08/2021 with a delivery date announced for 05/11/2021 and the full delivery was completed on 16/02/2022 after endless missteps from made to last and their delivery company. Extreme delays with last minute warning, delivered a broken sofa 10 weeks late, delivered the replacements pieces late again. Offered a £100 compensation that does not even represent a 10% discount. The delivery men majorly damaged my hardwood floors whist assembling the sofa. An absolute chaos from day 1 with no responsibility taken from made to last other than empty apologies and a ridiculously insulting compensation. Stay away from them at all costs. The sofa isn’t even that great, the fabric is already fluffing off and it’s not very comfortable as the sitting area isn’t flat so we sink in. Steer clear, they are absolute thieves and I really hope no one else has to experience the terrible time I’ve had with them for a disappointing item and most likely my deposit gone with the damage caused. ABSOLUTE DISGRACE!!

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_text: Very pleased with my Knapwell 3 seater sofabed. Clear detailed website made choosing easy. Samples ideal for fabric choice. Excellent quality craftsmanship, excellent value for money. Delayed a couple of weeks due to sourcing materials  but I was kept informed so no problem. Great communication from delivery company and they came exactly when they said. Super helpful polite delivery guys. Excellent service all round.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_text: Recently bought a sofabed, flat sheet, and 2 fold pillow. Each item arrived as soon as available, the sofabed  being earlier than promised and although I needed to enquire about the pillow, which was delayed due to covid, it arrived promptly when I did so.The 3 items work well in combination and are very comfortable together. The sofabed is also comfortable as a sofa.Made to Last replied promptly to my queries and I am  very happy with them and my purchases.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_title: We were looking for a new sofa bed and…
review_text: We were looking for a new sofa bed and saw the Made to Last Coveney model. It looked just right for us, so we ordered some fabric samples, which came very promptly.One was just right for us so we ordered the single sized sofa bed.Communications from the company were great and in fact the sofa was ready before the original time given. The delivery company was equally good at keeping in touch and were polite, friendly saved efficient.The sofa bed came yesterday. It is everything we hoped for. Comfortable to sit on and to lie on. It's so easy to convert and looks good in the room. It seems like a great quality product and we're looking forward to enjoying it for years to come.We're happy to recommend Made to Last to anyone wanting a simply to use good looking and comfy sofa bed.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_title: Sofa bed arrived 1 day later than…
review_text: Sofa bed arrived 1 day later than expected I was sent an email to let me know it would be delayed so really pleased when it arrived. The delivery guys were on time and worked hard to set it up. It’s very comfortable and we are happy with our purchase.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_title: Amazing Service. Would certainly buy again!
review_text: I purchased the Moulton 3 Seater Sofa bed from Made to Last. The quality of the sofa bed is excellent and the service I received from Made to Last is brilliant too. Before my purchase, I contacted their customer service to ask some questions about the sofa bed and the lady on the phone was very helpful. I placed my order online which was very easy and straightforward. The sofa bed arrived on time and the delivery people were polite and took the sofa bed in the room. I am super impressed with the quality of my sofa bed and the service from Made to Last.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_text: Late, uncomunicative and unhelpfulSimilar to quite a few reviews, made to last take an exceptionally long time to make the items and then don't deliver on time, or even notify you that this is the case. Made to last require constant chasing to get any information on your order and the information they can provide is limited. We have blasted past 2 of the expected manufacture completion dates and a 3rd has been given for mid-February. TLDR - I have absolutely no idea when I will recieve a product I purchased 3 months ago.

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_text: Bought the 3-seater Chiswick sofa in blue velvet (the only sofa-bed of its style I could find online). Excellent communication throughout. Delivery drivers were here for about 45 minutes trying to get the sofa into our lounge (successfully in the end!). Quality of the sofa is excellent - a purchase that will be with us for years and years. 5/5, would definitely shop with Made To Last again!

name: MADE TO LAST
description: Connecting people with well designed British products that stand the test of time
review_text: Bought a sofa bed 3 1/2 years ago, expensive but thought worth the investment to last. Its very comfortable as a bed but the sofa material is worn really badly, the top faux leather like surface has worn away completely where its been sat on. I honestly thought it would last longer for that money.  😕

review_text: Had an emergency with water coming through my kitchen roof from the bathroom. Spoke with Jack who quickly and efficiently took all my details and arranged to have the plumber, Jag out who made a repair to quickly stop the water and allow us to use the bathroom. After the emergency make safe work was completed I dealt with Ross to have further work completed to prevent it happening again, Ross was helpful, polite and easy to deal with. Michael came to the house and made all the repairs leaving the bathroom clean and tidy (I forgot he had been in until I noticed the old parts in my bin!). Overall, the experience I’ve had with G Jassal and all their staff has been first class. I can’t recommend them highly enough.

review_title: not great: planned 2 weeks to 6 months of pain, avoid
review_text: A small 2 week flat renovation turned into 6 months+ of hell.A simple enlarging of a room and installing a new water tank took 6 months; agreed timeline was 2 weeks. Not a single task was done correctly, everything needed multiple callouts and fixes.The water heater needed 6 plumber visits to get it installed properly. I was kept without hot water for a duration of 1 month, during installation delaysProblems- project took 6 months+ instead of 2 weeks- my floor was destroyed by workers and I needed to put in new ones- 1 month without water- everything needed at least 2 visits; fixing previous errors- other jobs were prioritised over me, even after 6 months of delays- Pros- they answered the phones and fixes were scheduled- job was mostly completed in the end

description: At Acorn Business Finance our expertise is rooted in providing the unsecured finance businesses need to compete, to grow and to improve their prospects.Our established track record in providing business loans of all shapes and sizes to a wide range of SMEs has helped us refine our approach and tailor our service to the needs of individual businesses. The Godox V1-F and Godox XPro E-TTL/HSS Wireless 2.4GHz Trigger saw service the following day (after much manual reading and some practice) and are now earning their keep; I suspect another Godox V1-F may well be on the way in the near future.Bill

name: Smallburn Cottages
description: Our award-winning cottages provide the perfect base to explore to stunning county of Northumberland. With fully equiped kitchens, high-speed WiFi, and furnished to the highest standard, we're sure you'll want to re-book as soon as you leave.
review_text: Beautiful place, clean, comfortable, secure spacious parking, lovely bathrooms, well-equipped kitchen, lovely garden, but most important of all fab mattresses with quality bed linens - rebooked already 😀

name: Smallburn Cottages
description: Our award-winning cottages provide the perfect base to explore to stunning county of Northumberland. With fully equiped kitchens, high-speed WiFi, and furnished to the highest standard, we're sure you'll want to re-book as soon as you leave.
review_text: Fabulous cottage. Light, clean, well equipped. Good size bedrooms, both doubles have en suites, which was a real bonus, both with excellent showers. Location was perfect for us - we love Newton’s beaches, beadnall and embleton (all within walking distance). Our favourite pub the joiners arms is next door and an easy drive to bamburgh and seahouses. We have had an amazing week and would recommend this location and cottage highly.

name: Smallburn Cottages
description: Our award-winning cottages provide the perfect base to explore to stunning county of Northumberland. With fully equiped kitchens, high-speed WiFi, and furnished to the highest standard, we're sure you'll want to re-book as soon as you leave.
review_text: We hit upon this property by accident as there had been a late cancellation in the dates we were searching properties for. It turned out to be absolutely ideal for us.Lynecroft cottage is superbly appointed and immaculately presented. The village of Embleton is ideally situated near the coast for touring north, south, or inland. The garden was lovely, spacious and quiet when we were able to sit out. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

name: Smallburn Cottages
description: Our award-winning cottages provide the perfect base to explore to stunning county of Northumberland. With fully equiped kitchens, high-speed WiFi, and furnished to the highest standard, we're sure you'll want to re-book as soon as you leave.
review_title: Stunning cottage in a beautiful location
review_text: We throughly enjoyed our stay at the Arches, a beautiful cottage, finished to a very high standard & spotlessly clean. The location was fantastic located just 10 minutes from the local beach, some lovely walks and great restaurants around. Couldn’t have asked for anything more, I am so glad I found this place. Maureen was a great host, thank you to you all for making it such a wonderful stay. Will hope to be back at some point in the future.

name: Smallburn Cottages
description: Our award-winning cottages provide the perfect base to explore to stunning county of Northumberland. With fully equiped kitchens, high-speed WiFi, and furnished to the highest standard, we're sure you'll want to re-book as soon as you leave.
review_title: This was our second visit to Lynecroft…
review_text: This was our second visit to Lynecroft Cottage and without doubt we thoroughly enjoyed our stay again!.The cottage is very comfortable and well equipped and located in a lovely little village with easy access to may local landmarks, attractions.There is a beautiful lawn and secure garden to the rear of the cottage, ideal for our cocker spaniel to roam about.I have no hesitation in recommending this property and will certainly visit again.

name: Smallburn Cottages
description: Our award-winning cottages provide the perfect base to explore to stunning county of Northumberland. With fully equiped kitchens, high-speed WiFi, and furnished to the highest standard, we're sure you'll want to re-book as soon as you leave.
review_text: We had a fantastic time at Lynecroft Cottage. It was extremely clean, comfortable and well equipped. It is also far more spacious in real life than the impression you get from the website photos. Only a short walk to the beautiful Embleton Bay. So much to do in the area in addition to the wonderful beaches including Alnwick Castle,  Cragside and Lindisfarne. We even managed a day trip to Edinburgh Zoo (about an hour and a half away). We thoroughly recommend this cottage and are looking forward to returning in the future.

name: Smallburn Cottages
description: Our award-winning cottages provide the perfect base to explore to stunning county of Northumberland. With fully equiped kitchens, high-speed WiFi, and furnished to the highest standard, we're sure you'll want to re-book as soon as you leave.
review_title: The Arches - A Truly 5 Star House
review_text: The Arches is truly a 5 star house. We usually use Premier Cottages as their standard is always very high, but they didn't have accommodation in the High Newton/Low Newton area, and I am so glad that we found The Arches. Our family have spent a wonderful week there. The accommodation was excellent in every way - it was spotlessly clean and the fact that each bedroom had its own bathroom made it perfect for our family of my wife and I, our son and daughter-in-law and two granddaughters. We were slightly concerned that there wasn't a garden, and although it stated in the literature that the house was dog-friendly (and this was one of the reasons for booking) we were worried that there would be nowhere for the dog to be outside. That did not prove to be a problem as the gravelled area at the front of the house was perfect for the dog, and in any case the beach is only a 5 minute walk away. Another perfect thing about the house is that its next-door-neighbour is The Joiners Arms and we spent a good few afternoons sitting outside the pub enjoying a drink after our long walks. The food there is also excellent and cannot be recommended highly enough (especially the take-away fish and chips).

name: Smallburn Cottages
description: Our award-winning cottages provide the perfect base to explore to stunning county of Northumberland. With fully equiped kitchens, high-speed WiFi, and furnished to the highest standard, we're sure you'll want to re-book as soon as you leave.
review_title: Perfect for a relaxing stay by the sea
review_text: Smallburn cottage was perfect for a relaxing stay in Embleton, comfortable, extremely clean & well equipped, the beds were more comfortable than we have at home!The only thing that would have improved our stay would have been a fenced area around the seating as our rather athletic new dog was able to jump over the low part of wall in rear garden but that is all.Will certainly stay again & will recommend to our friends, thank you for a very enjoyable stay.

name: Smallburn Cottages
description: Our award-winning cottages provide the perfect base to explore to stunning county of Northumberland. With fully equiped kitchens, high-speed WiFi, and furnished to the highest standard, we're sure you'll want to re-book as soon as you leave.
review_text: The cottage is a delight and exceptionally clean.Really comfortable beds and bathrooms have super facilities.Easy to control the heating a hoover that works! and an abundance of lovely crockery.Being in easy walking distance to beaches and pubs make it a perfect place.

name: Smallburn Cottages
description: Our award-winning cottages provide the perfect base to explore to stunning county of Northumberland. With fully equiped kitchens, high-speed WiFi, and furnished to the highest standard, we're sure you'll want to re-book as soon as you leave.
review_text: Very Comfortable and well equipped cottage with beautiful sandy beach and golf course a 5 minute walk away

name: Smallburn Cottages
description: Our award-winning cottages provide the perfect base to explore to stunning county of Northumberland. With fully equiped kitchens, high-speed WiFi, and furnished to the highest standard, we're sure you'll want to re-book as soon as you leave.
review_title: First class, second visit in 4 months
review_text: Our second visit to The Arches, because it’s so good. First class quality holiday home, warm, 3 luxury bathrooms, top quality furniture/ bedding and spotlessly clean, great kitchen and in a perfect location for walking the coastline and next to 2 PubsThe Joiners Arms next door, our experience of the food last November was not good in fact it was terrible, maybe just a poor chef that day, but we avoided it this time and walked 5 mins down to the beach to the Ship at Newton by the sea, great food and local beer, great staff although a little expensive for the  size is fish and meat portions, but very nice indeed.The Jolly Fisherman at Craster was the best food and value, we walked 3 miles along the coastal path and beach and booked a taxi back as it was evening.Don’t miss out on staying at the Arches, you’ll be hard pushed to find a better quality holiday home, no views but if you’re out and about all day the thought of returning here makes up for that.

description: Our award-winning cottages provide the perfect base to explore to stunning county of Northumberland. With fully equiped kitchens, high-speed WiFi, and furnished to the highest standard, we're sure you'll want to re-book as soon as you leave.
review_text: Wonderful cottage in a fantastic location. A real "home from home" and ideally situated to explore the Northumberland coast. name: John Charcol
description: John Charcol is the original independent mortgage broker, with over 40 years' experience in finding the best mortgage rates for every type of buyer. Whether you are investing in property or are looking to buy your first home, we are experts in providing independent mortgage advice for all kinds of buyers.
review_text: Sophia sorted out our mortgage for us. She was very detailed and gave us several options. Her explanations were clear and helped us navigating the complexity of the different offers.Maisie then followed up the progress of our purchase till completion. We also arrange building insurance and mortgage life cover with them, all very simple and competitive price wise.

name: John Charcol
description: John Charcol is the original independent mortgage broker, with over 40 years' experience in finding the best mortgage rates for every type of buyer. Whether you are investing in property or are looking to buy your first home, we are experts in providing independent mortgage advice for all kinds of buyers.
review_title: I can positively recommend John Charcol Ltd
review_text: I would totally recommend using John Charcol Ltd. We were assisted by Jack and Louise and they were both professional and informative throughout the whole transaction. We had a complicated request for a re Mortgage and Jack was able to offer a solution that was perfect for us. Hassle free, quick and stress free. Couldn't have been easier.

name: John Charcol
description: John Charcol is the original independent mortgage broker, with over 40 years' experience in finding the best mortgage rates for every type of buyer. Whether you are investing in property or are looking to buy your first home, we are experts in providing independent mortgage advice for all kinds of buyers.
review_title: John Charcol- Mark Brazier; recommend without reservation
review_text: We had Mark Brazier as our mortgage advisor. I cannot recommend Mark highly enough. Due to the complexity of our needs (both my husband and I work as self employed directors within our own business) Mark managed to secure us a mortgage where quite literally- five other people had failed! He was swift, professional and informative. He also managed our hopes and expectations perfectly. The John Charcol fee I would have paid three times over for the guidance than Mark gave us. I really cannot recommend his services highly enough for anyone wanting to take the stress out of mortgages or those with a more complex need.

name: John Charcol
description: John Charcol is the original independent mortgage broker, with over 40 years' experience in finding the best mortgage rates for every type of buyer. review_title: Ghosted and dropped - don't waste your time
review_text: I am a first time buyer and I don't recommend using John Charcol - it was a very stressful experience. Things were great at the beginning and they offered me a really good deal with a high lending amount and little interest rate, which suited my needs. As I was house hunting at the time, I based my price range on this quote, and as it took me a few months to find somewhere, they kept updating the same quote but in line with the current interest rates. When I finally found somewhere within that price range, they said they could no longer give me that quote, despite it being the same for months, and were offering me a lending amount far lower than the original, with a higher interest rate. When trying to resolve the situation in order to save the property I had offered, my broker ghosted me for 3 days, and then never came back to me on the situation. I think with first time buyers they offer a great quote originally in the hopes that it will get cleared once an offer has been accepted, however you are left in the lurch if this doesn't go to plan and then they just drop you. Save yourself the time and stress and use somewhere else.

review_text: Unfortunately, a representative of yours at the Royal Cornwall Showground selling a whisk completely let this company down by being extremely rude and aggressive.My father and son(5) were watching your demo while I was checking messages on my phone from behind them, he noticed this and told me not to video him - in which I replied I wasn't, obviously I wasn't filming someone whisking water....🤦🏻‍♀️ He then raises his voice at me in front of everyone around us including my 5 year old son and asks what was the point in him showing the whisk - I replied politely and said I had a gadget similar so I was aware of how it works but my father was watching and interested but he instead THREW all of the equipment and the contents of the bowls in the bins and used hand gestures for us to move on.My father was contemplating buying one and actually had returned for the second time to watch but after this was put off by this terribly rude and ignorant person.Not going to get many sales with an attitude like that!!!Edited to add a reply - Unfortunately, the seller having a huge banner with just your name on it makes it everything to do with your business. He is representing you and your products and as much as you find it difficult to imagine him being rude to anyone, he very much was - prompting my review. Thank you for your offer of me emailing you, I wont be doing this, it is not why I wrote the review, it was purely to highlight to you that your brand representative was aggressive and put us, and I suspect the other people who witnessed it, off buying.

name: Kurt Geiger
description: Kurt Geiger is the #1 premium footwear brand in the UK, first opening its doors on Bond Street London in 1963. Since the sixties Kurt Geiger has continuously evolved to make covetable fashion-forward footwear and accessories with a unique market position - pairing aspiration with accessibility and attracting a global customer base and a worldwide celebrity following.Chief Creative Officer, Rebecca Farrar-Hockley and her team of specialist shoe and accessory designers lead the creative vision of Kurt Geiger’s owned brands for women, men and children’s lines; Kurt Geiger London, KG, Carvela and Miss KG from the brand’s headquarters on Britton Street, within the design hub of Clerkenwell in London.

review_title: Poor quality trainers KG outlet store
review_text: Bought a pair of pink pvc trainers from KG outlet store in Derby at outlet Centre. We travelled over 30 miles to get to the centre. Having worn the shoes for 3 days, they are coming apart. Spent £59 for the lowest quality. Wrote to KG who suggested I return it to a store - but no stores near where Iive - and I am not paying more out on fuel for the refund. KG should refund the money and get a courier to collect from my address. Never again will I but KG shoes - NEVER.Absolutely rubbish!! Better to pay less and get good wear - like Pavers. I will be pursuing for a refund due to poor quality.
