review_text: What an absolute sham of a company. Wasted my precious business time for a month. I supplied all the necessary criteria, my business is profitable, growing exponentially, impeccable credit rating etc but their 'pathetic' underwriting team declined not to enter into a contract as I did not meet their criteria. It may be their entitlement o decline my application but I will investigate further from a legal point of view. I am in the process of telling all my business associates to enter contracts with Sumup or Paymentmaster.Elavon, I have come to the conclusion that you based your decision on a totally different company that has 100% no connection with my company. I have retained all correspondence which pretty much proves same. My solicitor is researching as I type and from a principle stance also, I will be pursuing this as far as possible. They also had the nerve to request the 'financial accounts' of this other company which is 100% unrelated to mine. I will legally pursue this with vigour. Faceless, nameless, non contactable  underwriters who act with contempt and then pass the book back to the sales representative. Not even professional enough to communicate directly. Keep away and give your business to a company who'll appreciate it.

review_text: I am from Russia and at certain point I found out that I wanted to move on a career ladder and find a suitable position in Europe or the UK. I faced few difficulties. First of all, I didn’t know how to write CV and how the process of hiring looks like in European countries. Second, I was looking for a very specific position and had quite unique work experience. So I just didn’t know how to start and how to do things right. I decided to hire a professional CV writer and thankfully I found Lynn. She’s outstanding professional and the result surpassed all my expectations. After almost 2 hours talk she was able to summarize all my experience and skills. Later on in the CV she put all that information in the most advantageous way. At the same time, all the info in the CV was the truth and reflected my experience and abilities fully and thoroughly. Few times Lynn mentioned that I should be entirely satisfied and confident with my CV. I am absolutely confident with it. I’ve already strongly recommended Lynn to all my friends if they would like to get CVs for themselves. Thank you!

name: The CV Writing Service
description: A bespoke and affordable CV Writing Service, brought to you by a professional CV writer with 20+ years experience in writing and recruitment.
review_text: This is the first time I've ever used a  CV writing service. I was sceptical at first as I  had always updated my own CV. However, my CV looked tired, outdated and not getting noticed.  But I was cautious about the risks of paying for a service that might not return a positive result. I trawled through oodles ofdisappointing company reviews.... and then I found The CV Writing Service. I read the reviews, and for the first time, felt that the reviews were genuine. However, I remained sceptical because the CV Writing Service seemed like a small business that wouldn't have the clought of a large company.Nevertheless, and after great deliberation, I  decided to take the plunge and engage a professional cv writing service. So I rang The CV Writing Service and spoke to Lynn.  I asked lots questions, which she addressed...but what struck a chord was her genuine interest in me and what I said I want to achieve professionally.I was much happier after the conversation with Lynn, but did not want to part with money before receiving the goods. However, I decided to pay upfront and give it a go.Lynn managed my CV contract throughout the process. We scheduled a fact finding chat to enable Lynn to gather detailed information. This was a pleasurable relaxed and open experience.One week later, I received a first draft and was bowled over with the content and writing style . Lynn perfectly captured my career, job roles, skills, abilities and aspirations. I was surprised and impressed that Lynn creatively injected my personality to the document to bring my cv to life.We did not need a second draft.My CV is attracting interest from the target sector, recruiters and via my LinkedIn profile. I've received job offers and opportunities thanks to my new CV.I highly recommend the CV Writing Service as a professional, value for money service. Lynn's approach also boosted my self confidence and self esteem.In fact I referred my daughter, who was equally impressed.

description: The CircuitMess is a team of young dedicated people whose mission is to bring electronics and programming to the crowd in a fun and interesting way!
review_title: Fantastic idea for an engaging STEM DIY project.
review_text: Bought the Nibble (on sale). The company communicated well and shipped the product in a reasonable timeframe. They seem genuinely passionate about their products.The Nibble has been a great DIY project for my 10yo son to learn some skills like soldering and troubleshooting. He's always wanted to build his own handheld console, so I couldn't believe this was actually a thing. He learnt some patience, resilience and the joy of completing a project. What a great idea from CicuitMess.Of course we didn't have to build the entire thing from scratch. The kit was simple enough that it didn't take months to assemble, and we could see the end goal early on. It wasn't overwhelming for a kid.Now he's super keen to try the next phase which is the coding of your own games using CircuitBlocks which looks similar to Scratch, which he's familiar with. Then after that there is the levelled up coding phase using C++ and/or Python, which will give him some advanced skills to pursue a career or hobby.A truly fantastic idea for kids interested in this sort of thing.

review_text: Updated -- I want to say thank you to CircuitMess for jumping on my issues and getting me my order. My grandson absolutely loves his Nibble. Thank you!!! Here's the thing, I ordered back on March 17th and I am still waiting for my order??? So cannot review, when you don't actually get your order. Very disappointed to say the least.  I still have no idea when the order will deliver. The only tracking I have still says sent abroad. My review currently is bad! Do not order, you don't actually receive anything. :(

name: CircuitMess
description: The CircuitMess is a team of young dedicated people whose mission is to bring electronics and programming to the crowd in a fun and interesting way!
review_text: I did a lot of research before subscribing to CircuitMess, simply because electronics kits can be costly.  This has turned out to be a really good buy.  My 12 year old daughter, who I did not expect to have an interest, puts them together herself with no help.  My 8 year old son requires help with the soldering but can otherwise handle the building.  We’re all learning the programming piece together.  The website and instructions are really user friendly.It’s a lot of fun to actually be able to build a device that you can actually use.  I know many kits are no-solder, but that honestly is the most fun and challenging part of it.  It forces the kids to pay attention, because it requires a little extra work if you mess up.  We are all really impressed with the thought that goes into the kits and the kids ask when we’ll get the next one.

name: Constructioncertification
review_text: DO NOT USE THIS SITE.  The name suggests they are closely linked to CITB/CSCS, and will provide official training, but they are rip-off booking merchants who only want to fleece people.  The prices they charge are outrageous : the online course is ￡60.00 more than others, they offer a booking service for the CITB test and the CSCS card application at TWICE the price of booking directly (which is very easy to do).  I foolishly booked an online course with them, but realised my mistake within 24 hours, requested to cancel and for a refund; they charged me £50.00 to do so; their "reasoning" is they have to pay for a course login, but in fact, they reallocate the login to another new customer.  Effectively charging twice for the same login. These guys and their site should be stopped.  They do the construction industry no good.

name: Constructioncertification
review_text: Terrible company ! Don’t use spent over £200 for test and cscs card online to be told have to sit another exam and pay out more money !!!!

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_title: Pics appear to be in black hole in space.
review_text: Same complaint as other reviews. Provides good pi tires, but shipping time is ridiculous, and painful when your order goes in a black hole and can't be found.Pictures are priceless because of the memories.I will be requesting a refund for my 185 photos that are 'lost', and will order from Walmart and may pay twice as much, but I will receive all 185. And, they will be in the order I submitted, which is chronological for the albums I am making.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_text: Absolute worst experience with an online company. I spent 2 hours designing a lovely birthday for my friend. Ordered it 10 days in advance. Her birthday is today so I checked order status. It just states delivery incomplete. I went to website to contact, I could only get a robot that couldn’t comprehend delivery status. When it finally did, it said it’s incomplete! So I tried the support email, they responded quickly with a link to their online robot. So I phoned their USA number from Ireland. Guess what, I got another robot, after 5 minutes it transferred me to a human. He confirmed delivery status was incomplete too. He asked me for my details did a lot typing and asked if he could put me on hold after 10 more minutes on hold I had no choice but to hang up. It was only a card, how difficult can that be to ship? I lost money on my order, I have no idea how much the phone call will cost and my friend won’t know how much work and love I put into a gift she never got. Very disappointing.

description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_text: I ordered some products on this platform and it got to me on time,

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_text: I order quite a bit from them and they usually do really well and everything is delivered in a timely fashion. I will say sometimes items get damaged or never show up, BUT when I contact them they always replace them.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_title: There's a reason Shutterfly's reviews don't show up...
review_text: There's a reason Shutterfly doesn't openly post reviews in Google - because it would show how bad they are.  Shipping time is abysmal.  Once product finally does ship, it gets passed to USPS and falls into a black hole.  Add about 1 week to estimated shipping time. One would hope the wait was worth it, but it's not.  Even if you pay for all the extra 'premium' upgrades. Buyer beware.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_title: STAY AWAY from shutter fly Quality sucks now, use someone else…
review_text: Ordered senior pictures last year and now this year... WOW what a difference.  Last year good, this year horrible.  Canvas came in all wrinkly, frame don't match last year (skinnier and cheaper) was hoping to have them match.  Pictures hang wrong.... etc. What ever quality control they are using (Or changed to) big "F" will not use again.  Can't get anybody to talk to fix.  more like a scam company now

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_title: Shipping time at longer than average
review_text: Product quality and prices are average. The delivery time is very long. Will us another company in the future.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_text: Update 4/29/22: Giving them 2 more stars (from 1 star to 3 stars). The prints did arrive!  Yippee!  Not sure when as I sent them to a PO Box and didn't check it until yesterday. But there my little orange package was! So can't verify when it arrived.  It may have even arrived on/before their originally estimated date of 4/22/22.  But still deducting stars because of the subpar delivery service they choose to use (UPS Mail Innovations). My tracking is still showing the package stuck between UPS handing it off to USPS on 4/14/22. There is no way to file a claim via UPS since they don't allow that service to file claims.  And no way to get to a live customer service person on UPS once you enter a tracking number that doesn't start with 1Z... All not Shutterfly's fault but that's the delivery service they are knowingly choosing.  So I would think twice about using Shutterfly for their "free" reprints since there is shipping cost and getting them delivered can be a hassle if they don't show up.____________________________Their "free" reprints are not free! It would be cheaper and faster to order any place else. It is now going onto the 18th day since I've placed my order. The initial delivery date has come and gone and each day I look at the tracking information the estimated delivery date has been updated to the next day. Maybe I will be lucky today and it will finally show up?I ordered 23 reprints on April 9, 2022. The estimated delivery date was April 22, 2022.  It is now April 27, 2022. The order was shipped out via UPS Mail Innovations (UPS-MI). Already a red flag there! Reading reviews of UPS-MI I find that my issue of delay of delivery/non-delivery is their standard operations. According to their tracking my package has been stuck in the process of being handed off from UPS to USPS since April 14th (going on it's 13th day as today is April 27):04/14/202211:55 A.M.	Depature Scan: Enroute to USPSSan Leandro, CA, United States04/14/20229:30 A.M.	Arrived at UPS FacilitySan Leandro, CA, United States04/13/20222:43 A.M.	Departed UPS FacilityFife, WA, United States04/12/202211:22 P.M.	Package processedFife, WA, United States04/12/20226:36 P.M.	Package received for processingFife, WA, United States04/12/20226:00 P.M.	Shipment tendered to UPS Mail InnovationsPortland, OR, United States04/12/202211:10 A.M.	Order information receivedUnited StatesMy "free" reprints cost me $6.32. It would be cheaper at Walgreens with their usual 40% off discount. I may end up having to do the reprints at Walgreens since who knows how much longer my reprints from Shutterfly will take and/or if they will even show up?Anyway, I suggest you stay away from Shutterfly. Their "free" reprints are not free and they use an unreliable delivery service called UPS Mail Innovations which seem to do a bad job handing off packages from UPS to USPS and as a result your package becomes Missing In Action. Also going to UPS and trying to file a claim for a lost package you get the following error message:"Unfortunately, this package type is not eligible for a claim submission. [UPS:E030]"Calling UPS they force you to enter a tracking number before you can go any further. Once they know the package does not start with " 1Z..." there doesn't seem a way to get to a live person. It will only tell you that your package was delivered to a local post office and there is no additional information available.  They then refer you to USPS or to the sender.So good luck trying to get any help from UPS!

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_text: I am in agreement with many previous writers of reviews. For years I have used Shutterfly to make photo books. I have over 80 projects in my account. I had no complaints before and it was always my GO TO way of making books.I am now in the process of creating photo books for my mom who can't take her hundreds of loose leaf albums with her as she moves into an independent living apartment.It has been so incredible frustrating lately. I keep getting messages that activities failed, or have problems even pulling up projects, or saving things I have done... I am almost at the point of going to a competitor because my time is very limited and I have been wasting way to much on these problems. I even called and was told what to do to "fix" my problems with clearing Chrome history and right now, even doing that is having no effect.Fix this or I am gone and my probably 100 photo books to be made gone with me.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_text: I called Shutterfly regarding a complicated issue and was fortunate enough to be assigned to ARIENNE.She was easy to understand, patient, knowledgeable, and extremely helpful.    In a matter of no time she resolved my issue to my complete satisfaction.  She is a credit to your company and should be recognized for her qualities.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_title: I used to love Shutterfly for my photo books but not anymore...
review_text: I have used Shutterfly for my photo books since 2007, have printed about 60 photos books. Needless to say I have spent a huge amount of hours in my life doing photo books (which I love doing). Even though I might have been frustrated at times by the slow speed of loading/moving pictures, it was always quite user friendly and easy to navigate there website to make nice photo books with plenty of cool options. I am now in complete agreement with the huge number of reviewers who have successfully created photo books in the past and are now completely disgruntled and dissatisfied, calling the new photo book software a disaster. I can not find half of the options we used to have, navigation is a nightmare and display is just too small/not friendly. After trying to make 4 pages several times, I am just giving up, it was time consuming in the past but now it has just become ridiculous.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_text: I have made several Shutterfly books before. Reading several comments regarding their issues with using Shutterfly, I understand their complaints. I haven't had as much problems with the crashing of the site. But adding photos can be problematic to say the least. I have never found Shutterfly to be user friendly. That being said I haven't had a lot of problems after practice. However, my most recent project was delivered to me this past week. Even though I ordered the same quality of paper to be used as I have in the past, the quality was not up to par. It was distinctively a lower quality - the pages were noticeably thinner and less glossy. Shutterfly is not taking ownership of this. They claim the paper is the same it always has been. They did offer to redo the book for me; however, I doubt that would change anything. I also strongly agree with the comments regarding the pricing of their books. Even though the project contained less pages and the paper was less quality I spent a LOT more than I have before for same-sized books. Of course, this is partially because I got better 'sales' with the other projects. Shutterfly - forget these sales gimmicks and just offer a regular affordable pricing. I think I will be looking elsewhere for my next book.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_title: Shutterfly website keeps crashing on me…
review_text: Shutterfly website keeps crashing on me whenever I login. I called Shutterfly and emailed them. No response on fixing up my photo book project that I worked so hard to create with 80 photos. Now I just want to get out of this website and pull out the photos to somewhere else and start over again. I am so upset. I used Shutterfly 3 years ago, no problem. This time, this website has become a garbage can.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_title: Poor quality and I pay the Shipping??
review_text: I ordered photos and magnets of a professional photo shoot. They arrived too dark. After an excessive chat session, I finally got credit to my account to place a reorder. BUT they REFUSED to pay shipping, so it would basically cost be the same amount that I originally paid when I received free shipping! What a scam! I will never use Shutterfly again. Their 100% satisfaction guarantee is worthless and misleading.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_text: I used to LOVE Shutterfly. I have made over 20+ books and loved making books too. However, this new update is HORRIBLE. The website is constantly crashing, the ease of making a book is no longer, and what use to take me 2 hours, takes me 8 hours easy. Wish they didn't have to make these "updates." If it aint broke, don't fix it.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_text: I've ordered from Shutterfly numerous times. I just ordered my first photo book. The pictures were from my recent vacation. I was really excited when the book arrived this past Friday. I was so so disappointed when I noticed that 4 pictures were printed/inserted upside down. The pictures were of me ONLY. Any picture that I was in with someone else was perfect. Just the ones of me alone were upside down. I feel like that wasn't random but instead purposefully done! When I previewed the pictures every picture was perfectly in the correct direction.I think that someone in editing thought this would be funny or hurtful. I'm removing the app from my phone and not recommending. I received credit when I spoke with customer service. I didn't want a merchandise credit. I wanted my money returned to me on the card used to make the purchase. I'm forced to buy something from a business that I no longer trust!

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_title: love the birthday story with her picture and name!
review_text: I received the personalized birthday story and am so excited! This is for my grandaughters 3rd bday and it turned out better then expected! The quality of this book, the vibrant fun pictures and fun way to incorporate her picture and her name throughout the entire story is amazing and done so well. Love the size of this book and was packaged well. Just wish their were other choices for birthdays and others that also incorporated a picture and name for future gifts for her. Hope they make more! Usually buy from Dinkleboo but they only put the name in their stories and I absolutely loved the idea of having her picture in it too. Definately reccomend :)Have bought lots of different things from here and always pleased with the finished product!

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_title: Great products with scam-like business tendancies
review_text: While a great company that provides quality products, they have a very scammy feel to their business model. Luring you in with promo codes and discount and showing you cart total to be 50% off but when you're actually charged it changes to 100% of the cost, sometimes only realizing it after the charge has been made. Never take their discounts at face value, they're just trying to secretly charge you far more than you intended on spending in an almost illegal-feeling way.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_title: I spent hours creating an album…
review_text: I spent hours creating an album yesterday.  I saved it and went to finish it today and the price went up $30 from the day before.  That's right, THIRTY DOLLARS!!!  After reading several similar reviews, it's clear that this is the way this company operates.  DISHONEST and  DECEITFUL.  That's how I would classify this company.

name: Shutterfly
description: Create photo books, buy cards & stationery, and share photos with family and friends at Shutterfly.com.
review_title: Bad and Impersonal Customer Service Reps
review_text: Customer service reps are very cold and exhibit no willingness to help customer. Was sending a gift to a friend but wanted to include a note so the recipient knows who the gift is from.  “Allison” was the first contact and she had a very cold tone to her voice and flatly denied all my requests. So I had asked to speak to her supervisor. Her supervisor, Deddiesha came on and had the same cold attitude and again flatly denied all my requests. All she did was rudely asked, “ why can’t you just call her” i would think Shutterfly’s hiring practice would be better. I’ve dealt with hundreds of other customer service reps of other companies who had much more customer friendly reps.

review_text: Didn't realize this was a Chinese company till I got my receipt with Chinese characters on it. Either way looked them up and saw that everyone else has been scammed so i must be as well. name: Gadget Rocks
review_title: Emails are undelivered, do not trust.
review_text: I ordered a Dip Pen from this company, unbeknown to me, the item was coming from China! I got notifications to say Oder had been received, then one to say it has been dispatched. It was this email that alerted me to it coming from China.The tracking allegedly shows the item arrived at Beijing City and there it has sat since November 18th.The tracking number is not recognised on the Tracking system with the email. After several emails I'm told Royal Mail will be picking up once in UK. Even their tracking system did not recognise the Tracking number.As you can imagine, frustration levels are on at breaking point so email Gadget.comThe email was returned undelivered yet it it the correct address. I am not happy at all and will never use or recommend Gadgetrocks.com and I am now trying to get my money back.DO NOT TRUST THESE PEOPLE.

name: The Colonnade Hotel

review_text: Lo*te hotel! Very bad hotel!!

name: The Colonnade Hotel
description: The Colonnade Hotel is a 4-star London hotel with 43 rooms, of which 3 are suites.
review_text: On 21.11.21 We arrived at the hotel shortly after 2 pm to check in and leave our bags. We've been given a key to room No 27. When my friend was about to open the door it was slammed in our faces by a cleaning lady. As turned out the room wasn't ready and rather unpleasant receptionist had no clue what was going on upstairs. But this wasn't the worst experience of all. When we came back in the evening and as were about to go to sleep we founded ourselves laying on the most uncomfortable mattress. There were springs sticking out above the surface!! The whole thing was uneven and impossible to sleep on. A night concierge was kind enough to let us stay in a different room, this time No 23. Lucky enough, this time bed wasn't too bad, but to our shock we meant to use bathroom which was literally falling apart. I couldn't be more disappointed with a lack of care for the customers and staff who was clearly embarrassed with the whole situation.

name: The Colonnade Hotel
description: The Colonnade Hotel is a 4-star London hotel with 43 rooms, of which 3 are suites.
review_text: Disgusting disgusting disgusting DO NOT STAY HERE THE HOTEL IS A S**T HOLE staff are incompetent rude and unhelpful Avoid at all costs I wish I could add photos

name: The Colonnade Hotel
description: The Colonnade Hotel is a 4-star London hotel with 43 rooms, of which 3 are suites.
review_title: The room was cold and dirty
review_text: The room was cold and dirty, there were cables all over the floors as a huge health and safety risks, the room cleaners were having a fight with the room opposite me, I was trying to work, absolutely impossible. there was a water emergency at the same time so I had people coming in and out of my room to check my bathroom in case leakage was from my room (which was not). pillows didnt even have cover, the whole thing was disgusting, no way I could sleep on the bed or use the shower/ bath. I only had hired the room to work from it during the day. Did not order any food or drinks, it was so bad, I went down to a local cafe for lunch.

name: The Colonnade Hotel
description: The Colonnade Hotel is a 4-star London hotel with 43 rooms, of which 3 are suites.
review_text: This hotel is awful, really disappointing! Faulty Towers would have been better!My husband and I stayed at The Colonnade Hotel at the end of November. We work hard and so were really looking forward to a trip away to London. The photos on the website do not reflect how tired the decor and furniture really are. The room we stayed in was supposed to be a deluxe room and it was far from it! The net curtains had mould, the shower didn't work properly, the drinking glasses were dirty and the room was cold during the night. We went to the restaurant the first night we arrived as we didn't get to the hotel until around 7pm. The starter of hummus and flatbread came to our table as hummus and a few rounds on plain toast. The main meal was chicken, rice and salad was all they had on offer, all other meals on the menu were unavailable. The chicken was not hot and there was gristle in the chicken. I could not eat the food and so we left to get pub food. The key card did not always work on the bedroom door and so we were afraid of leaving our belongings unattended. This was a Groupon deal that cost over £300 for two nights including two evening meals and breakfast each morning. I could not stomach going back to the restaurant and so we left the hotel on the last morning feeling like we had been conned out of our money. Could not recommend this hotel to anyone, totally ruined our trip to London!

name: The Colonnade Hotel
description: The Colonnade Hotel is a 4-star London hotel with 43 rooms, of which 3 are suites.
review_text: The Colonnade, Little VeniceDoggerel - Deepening depression and gales by the scoreWe booked and unfortunately prepaidFour nights at the Little Venice ColonnadeThe reception area is well decorated, a sight that is fineMarred by a manager screaming at his staff in his office behindRoom 28 (we endured in this room for three nights)They claimed to be fully booked so could not remedy our continually stated plightsThe reception staff are professional despite the long queue of people waiting to complainThey pretend that each complaint is unexpected and new even though they are completely aware that the door cards don’t work and the hotel maintenance and housekeeping are non-existent or insane.The shower did not work (Boiling hot shower only first night and 2nd day in the afternoon, after that freezing cold)Bathroom floor tiles badly cracked, Mould in shower cubicle - mould on the tiles and on the walls – mould.The mattress was poor, the cups were removed, and housekeeping came one day out of threeWe complained every day and were told that somebody will look into it, perhaps optimisticallyThe receptionist had to open the door for us every time we returned. The second day he opened the next room much to the annoyance of the naked couple inside.The floorboard in front of the bedroom door is broken, like 'a big hole' under the carpet – a little TLC should be applied.No coffee or tea, night shift unhappily gave us some but no cups (don't know why there was a lack)Turing chained his mug to the radiator pipes to prevent it being stolen. The hotel has his blue plaque.The bedside light could be switched on for 4 minutes then went off by itself and sporadically flashed (poorly wired)The toilet bowl stand was loose and no working extractor fan in bathroom, the clock radio not working, the place looks quite tiredThe room was not properly cleaned before we arrived (old half-empty packets of biscuits discarded)We didn't feel safe since the receptionist opened the wrong door but they must have been stressed by all the complaints from every guest we met at the desk – they were bombarded.We moved to Room 26 for 1 night (24th Nov) as there is no hot shower in 28The shower worked - but it was very very hot and difficult to regulateOut of 7 ceiling lights, 4 are down, 2 above bed reading lights, only 1 could workThe TV could not get a channel, the fridge not cleaned out from previous guestWet used towel hung behind bathroom door, Infested with fruit flies, what a pestThe bedside light on left side went off after 4 minutes then periodically flashed.The clock radio was duff, the towel rail had crashedThe armchairs were grubby, the floor carpet not cleaned.Two housekeepers for 50 rooms was info we gleaned.No working extractor fan and bathroom light blownSink tap won't shut without difficulty (not dripping but a stream) – maybe this is not knownAnd yet again door access is only by receptionist who let slipThat there are many rooms with this blipThe paint is peeling on the second floor landing and the lift was a bruteWet towels and sheets were piled high on the floor in the fire escape route

name: The Colonnade Hotel
description: The Colonnade Hotel is a 4-star London hotel with 43 rooms, of which 3 are suites.
review_title: Awful experience for our first wedding anniversary.
review_text: Our stay at the hotel was shocking from start to finish. Upon arrival, we were informed that we were early - we arrived at 13:57, and check-in was from 2pm, so I was happy to wait the extra 3 minutes. Then we were informed that the staff were behind on cleaning and the room would be ready shortly. Despite calling and asking to reserve a space in the hotel car park, no space was reserved in the tiny 3 car "car park". We parked on the street, which ended up being approximately £7 cheaper than if we had parked in their "facility".40 minutes later, we were finally told our room was ready. No drink was offered in this time. We went to our room, but the keycards didn't work so we had to be let in manually by the staff. Upon entering the room, we were greeted with dirty crockery, unchanged bedsheets, mess in the bath, urine in the toilet and no toilet roll, dirty towels on the floor and a clearly unclean room. By this time we were already late for our plans, so we left on the assurance that the room would be cleaned and a bottle of champagne would be brought upon our return on the house.We returned at about 00:20, and were again manually let into our room, which had now finally been cleaned - instead of a bottle of champagne as we'd previously been offered, we were given 2 cheap small bottles of Prosecco. Not a major issue, but given the awful experience we'd had checking in it seemed like a cheap apology at best. We slept and awoke for breakfast, which is served between 07:30 and 10:00. We went down to breakfast at 09:05, walking past bundles of unbagged dirty laundry on the way just left in the hallway - something we'd noticed from the night before but still hadn't been cleared.The breakfast was a sorry affair - most of the food had run out and there was no sign of it being replaced despite there being a full hour until breakfast officially finished. Other guests came down to breakfast after us to an even smaller spread. Not once were we asked how the food was, and the food wasn't checked until I informed a staff member that they'd all but run out. None of the staff seemed to care about the guests at all besides one very apologetic gentleman at the front desk who had checked us in the day previously.We finished up and went to check out - this time, a different member of staff was on the front desk, on the phone whilst also hurriedly checking guests in and out. We handed him our room keys and said we were checking out - his response was "Ok. It's done." and that was it. No question about whether we enjoyed our stay, or if there was anything else we wanted. Not what you'd expect from a budget hotel, let alone a 4* one in the heart of London.All in all, the stay was awful from start to finish and really marred our first anniversary celebration. I can confidently say we will never be staying here again - I'd have enjoyed it more sleeping in my car. At least it would've been clean from the get go.

name: Tele2
review_title: Charge us 45kr to telling us we have…
review_text: Charge us 45kr to telling us we have paid and owe them 0kr.What a scam! They found a way to charge us 45kr when we owe them nothing!We deposited 1000kr as told by Tele2, and they deduct our monthly payment, to avoid paper notice - we always have a credit. Owe them nothing!Buuut! They mail us a paper invoice to tell us we owe them nothing. And they charge us 45kr for *that*.What a joke! You can't escape - we've called to complain for 3 months. They *always* send the paper letter, so you'll always get charged. Do you see the trap?They don't use Email!What a mess up, and what a scam!!! AVOID Tele2.

name: Tele2
review_text: Worst company, Pro scammers.it deserves 0 stars. not even 1.If you are reading this. Please do not buy any services from Tele2 and by any chance, you are a customer of Tele2. please please get rid of it as soon as possible. there are a lot of better services out there.If you are thinking of buying Don't fall for their low prices and free goodies. It's a scam they will onboard you with fewer fees and will charge you for services that you don't use.they will delay sending the devices or delay fixing technical issues and you still pay for the service that you did not use. you end up paying more money than what you promisedand do not receive any calls from iSales specifically from this number 0755587581. they are even worse they work for Tele2 and will sell you anything, promising free goodies. and will lure you to sign an agreement that generally no one reads. and you will end up paying for services you never ordered.Be aware of the binding period of your services. Tele2 is an expert in scamming people with a binding period. In my case, they scammed me with a TV subscription First they did not send any device. but they remember to send an invoice. when I asked to fix my invoice they said they can't do anything. and when I ask them to cancel the subscription they said you have a binding period of 2 years. without a device, I can't even use the subscription. and now when I cancel I will have to pay for 2 years upfront. which is more than 5000 SEK. for the service I will not use.Disappointed.

name: Tele2
review_title: I took over the services of a previous…
review_text: I took over the services of a previous owner in order to make everything as smooth as possible - thinking I could then cancel or downgrade to my needs. Don't ever make this mistake! Once you take over a service you will not be counted as a new customer, you will however be stuck with the services for 24 months with no way out. So although you technically are a new customer you will not get the benefit of being one. If I had not taken over the services I would have been able to choose based on my needs. There is no help from customer service. They simply do not care. You are just money to them.In general I think the customer should have way more rights when it comes to these services. If there was an actual physical product I could understand, but since it is just a matter of turning off the services to Tele2 it makes zero sense. I will not recommend this company and I will end my services after the fixed rate period ends.

name: Tele2
review_text: Unfortunately, I will have to agree with other reviewers on this platform.. Tele2 is totally unreliable and so far the worst company I have ever talked to when it comes to customer experience! The story of my unpleasant experience goes as following. I signed up for a contract with Tele2 on March 1st. After a lot of phone calls with the Front-end customer service team and unresponsive attitude of the technical team of Tele2, I managed to get a KPN technician to have a look at the cables of the internet connection (Tele2 don't have their own cables), on April 22nd! I managed to get internet in my apartment (the TV connection doesn't work still as I write)  by moving the modem outside my apartment (!). After the bad experience I have had with Tele2 and the fact that still my TV connection doesn't work, I decided to cancel the contract and go to a different provider, a reliable one. Not only did I have to pay for 2 months of service I never used, I also got requested to pay for a cancellation fine of 178.93 euros. Needless to say, they don't reimburse the 2 months, nor do they negotiate the cancellation fee. So in a nutshell, walk away from doing any business with them! Unreliable, knowledge-less and insufficient customer service. You'll regret it!

name: Tele2
review_title: The story of getting an internet connection with Tele2 NL
review_text: While this is a one star review I would like to say that the internet connection is very reliable and the customer service is very polite and professional. The reason for the low score was because of the process of setting up the connection. I was supposed to have a Wi-fi connection on the 7th of January, but due to mistakes along the way the connection was established on the 18th of February. The most comical mistake occurred first. 7th of January I received a message that I could now plug in the router and connect to the internet. Nothing happened. While eating my breakfast my downstairs neighbor knocks on the door to let me know that he got of the phone with his internet provider. He had been disconnected from his connection and gotten mine instead. I lend him my modem which worked on the connection and called Tele2. We worked out that a connection would be established at my place on the 15th of January (I think. I think they said 8 days). They did keep the connection open to my downstairs neighbor until then. Once again, I received the message in the morning, connected the modem I had gotten back from my neighbor, and still nothing. No connection. I called them asking if they had made the mistake again, but they said everything should be working. They would send out a mechanic to look at it. The employee said I would receive a message where I could pick what time would be best for me within 24 hours. I never got this text. I called the next day around noon saying that I hadn’t received the message, but the person told me to be patient (not the response I wanted to hear after the gross incompetence I had been putting up with). I called them again later and they arranged to send a mechanic. The mechanic from KPN was very competent polite and helpful. For my trouble I received 3 euros off my monthly bill.

name: BitSkins
description: Reliable CS:GO, H1Z1, DotA2, TF2, Z1BR marketplace
review_text: Buying skins? Simplest experience ever, great automation etc.Selling skins? A hair-width away from a scam. Okay, you need to do the Anti-Money Laundering verification, love it or hate it, it's the standard in quite a few places. Whether this process specifically is actually required by law- I'm unsure, because a few other bigger websites for similar purposes do not implement this procedure.So you sold your skin, it leaves your inventory, you have to upload your ID and selfies, wait up to 48h, and then you get the money, after the 5% fee? Oh no no, then you have to PAY ANOTHER 5$ WITH ANOTHER COMISSION FEE ON TOP OF THE 5%? Yeah, no way that's not a 1 star experience. You're legally twisting your customers' arms, after you draw them in, leaving them no choice but to take it.P.S. Update- and you cannot withdraw the 5$. Ok.P.P.S. And there's fees on withdrawal.

I recommend your service to everyone in similar situations and or for general people searching.

review_title: 2 Roller Garage Doors - amazing Quality & Service
review_text: We replaced our metal up-and-over doors with matching 55mm laminated roller doors - absolutely fabulous quality! Smooth running and very silent. All accompanying components i.e. including two 2-channel remotes per door and separate internal wall control panels with build in illumination -again robust and high quality. The installation team was 2-man, professional, friendly and efficieint. They also cleaned as they installed and left the garage spotless. An exceptionally high quality service from start to finish. Was given a likely and early installation date which was honoured. Certainly, this is one of the best experiences I have had from a commercial organisation. We were kept informed throught the process. My strong recommendation is, if you are considering purchasing a roller garage door, you should ALWAYS get a quote from these guys. You will not be disappointed. The product and service is beyond first class. Finally, the product comes with an industry leading and lengthy guarantee, for peace of mind. If you are looking for affordable quality and top-class service you need look no further.

name: Birkdale
description: Birkdale Manufacturing Group Limited is a very well established, UK-based manufacturer. We are now proud to supply garage doors, composite doors, awnings, pergolas and more.
review_text: Very disappointed with communication, product and problem solving after sales. We ordered a Birkdale Awning including installation in March 2021 through Costco and believed we were dealing with a trusted company. We checked our gap measurements over the phone and by email with a representative from Birkdale and sent photos of the proposed site after which the awning was duly ordered with no advice to adjust the measurement to allow for it to actually fit correctly. When the awning arrived on 1st July, the fitters asked whether a survey had been carried out as the awning was going to be a difficult installation. They came up with a solution and fitted the awning much higher than they would normally and angled it, asked us to sign for the job then left. It was quickly realised during the following days that it had been fitted too high for the afternoon sun and when the wind blew it bounced off our extension roof and damaged a ridge tile. After months of complaints that it was now not fit for the purpose we ordered and that we’d established it was even longer than the measurement of the gap we gave them in the first instance they have stuck to the version that we signed the job completion form so it’s not their problem. A very unfair interpretation that a customer is happy even though actual use of the product begins after they leave and can’t be predicted in the short time of fitting. Also the awning is up on the wall and the fitters are waiting for you to sign the paperwork. This was an expensive bespoke product that is longer than the original gap measurement. We still don’t have a resolution after 9 months and they have never once visited the site other than Ezi Dor to install. Very disappointed with Birkdale and Ezi Dor fitters for not trying to help us achieve a satisfactory outcome considering the bespoke product is longer than the given gap measurement. Disappointed with Costco for not doing enough to tackle Birkdale over the issue.  I would not recommend this company to anybody. Funnily enough Costco no longer sell Birkdale Awnings!Thank you for replying to my review however I’m unaware of any resolution to our problem with the product and the after sales service at the moment from either Birkdale or Costco.

On arrival fitters said then were running late from day before. I should have receive a call, stating expected time, with the option to re-schedule

review_text: Two very professional guys did an amazing job fitting me an electric garage door. It isn't often you get bespoke service like this anymore. They did a quick job and very tidy, so tidy that when they left one wouldn't have known they had been there. The finished job is superb and far exceeded my expectations. Thank you Birkdale.

review_title: Good quality door and customer support.
review_text: Good quality door and customer support.The door was installed and working well. The only thing I find odd is that the 'down' button opens the door fully, before closing. You can override this however. Maybe newer models act differently.After a few years the door stopped working with control box flashing warnings. However, the guys on customer support eventually helped me track this down to a simple change of batteries on the door.

name: Birkdale
description: Birkdale Manufacturing Group Limited is a very well established, UK-based manufacturer. We are now proud to supply garage doors, composite doors, awnings, pergolas and more.
review_text: Brilliant service from office staff, site surveyor and tradesman that completed the work.Communication from the surveyor was  brilliant, he even accommodated a site visit 07:30 out of usual office hrs to accommodate which I thought was a nice touch, very helpful, professional and took all requirements on board.The completed product not that I had doubs but was even better then I had envisioned. I was apprehensive about having a security roller shutter door because I felt it would ruin the look the shop front. Very happy to say I was worried over nothing as it actually  compliments the shop front and was colour coded to blend in.Very happy, couldn't recommend enough.

name: Birkdale
description: Birkdale Manufacturing Group Limited is a very well established, UK-based manufacturer. We are now proud to supply garage doors, composite doors, awnings, pergolas and more.
review_text: Great quality product. The service was exceptional.In particular a shout out to the installers Blaine and Hayden. Their attention to detail was amazing resulting in a flawless job despite a tricky stone archway. I suggest your company clone these guys and send them everywhere on your behalf.

review_text: Excellent product, it is definitely the smartest garage door in our street. The staff at Birkdale have been extremely polite, helpful and efficient. Thank you for a great job and garage door.

name: Tile.Expert
description: We supply premium ceramic tile and porcelain stoneware by virtually all Italian and Spanish brands. Holding ourselves as an Online store with low operational expenses, we are proud of being able to offer unprecedentedly low prices for the majority of goods in our portfolio. Moreover, we have implemented user-friendly selection and ordering procedures, which is essential when it comes to ceramic tile and porcelain stoneware, challenging products for e-commerce. We keep improving the services on the ongoing basis.
review_title: Don’t manage your order, forced to change bathroom design
review_text: We ordered our tiles after Tile Expert gave us an estimated delivery date early June. Well in time for our fitting end of June/ start July. They then contacted us to revise the date to mid June and we accepted. Mid June came and went. I contacted them and was told it had been delivered, I explained it had not. I was asked to check my spam folder because the delivery company should have contacted me. They had not. All the time it’s showing as not shipped from Italy (i live in the UK). The next day they confirm it’s not even been picked up from the manufacturer. My fitters arrive Monday. These are high value tiles - no one stocks them. These guys don’t proactively manage your order. No one realised it hadn’t moved until I contacted them. They told me they can cancel the order. Still waiting for confirmation in writing. Now we are FORCED to change the design of our bathroom because these guys messed it up. They didn’t seem to understand the importance of timelines and how not having the product totally destroys an install timeline. If they had kept me informed that would be fair enough but they didn’t and kept telling me it had been delivered.

review_text: Brilliant service all the way through what was a very emotional time for me. Tara was sympathetic, knowledgeable and helpful and always replied to my queries within 48 hours (often less). There was a small blip which was entirely MY fault but the whole procedure was completed in under 12 weeks. Interestingly a friend of mine has just gone through this with a firm of solicitors. Her`s is still not completed some 5 months on and the bill is £2,000 and rising. UKP was £500 ! Wouldn`t hesitate to recommend this company.

name: Arc
description: Arc is a nationwide event and hospitality staffing agency. Our vision is to shape the world of flexible work into a better place for all.We believe at the heart of great events are great people. Our number one priority is finding, assessing and training the best people with the right skills and attitude to fit seamlessly into any team or event and make customers happy. The two service solutions we offer are: Top-up staff – gives the maximum amount of flexibility to the client as they only pay for hours worked and there is no obligation to use Arc at any point.Managed service – allows clients to outsource some or all of 1. Recruitment, 2. Staffing, 3. Payroll and/or 4. HR Support operations to Arc.

review_title: Payroll marked my clock out short.
review_text: I am aware that pay slips can get mixed up however we have supervisors who sign us in and out and write specific clock in and clock out times. Last weekend working at Wembley was horrendous. A lot of staff were rude and ill mannered. Job card said I’d finish at 23:30 and I have to ask to leave at 00:00 where the man kindly signed me out, wrote 00:00 clock out as I remember showing him the time and he kept the job cards. I got home at 3am the next morning due to missing the last train I was scheduled to get. I also got to work before 15:30 as asked an hour before (although my shift time was 15:45). I am happy to be flexible and take the longer journey home for work but not when my job card will mark my clock out time any earlier than I actually did. The work demanded a lot of me and I want my job cards to be accurate. 23:40 instead of 00:00 is only 20 mins, I don’t know if it affects my pay, but it affected my cost of travel and time to get home. I hope this gets sorted fairly.

review_text: WARNING! FRAUDLIKE COMPANY!!!EUROPCAR is a company WITHOUT ANY MORALS! We unfortunately did not check out all the warnings on the internet. They will SCAM YOU and end up costing you a lot of money. This is how the company survive. As consumers we cannot let companies like this survive! name: Europcar
review_text: Booked a Renault Twingo for my wife and I in Slovenia. I did this online via the uk site, charged me £58 for 4 days. Which is excellent value. I took out the min insurance, shouldn't have but I did. The pick up was ok, bloke was a little stern, but feel it was a language barrier thing and/or Christmas Eve thing. was told on the email I received the deposit would be £290 but he wanted €700, approx £550. Erm.. well I paid it and we were off, bit confused by the sticker thing, where you could drive anywhere, didn't realise he meant it paid for tolls, until our rep at the hotel told us. Car was good, did its job. Returned 4 days later, when through all the hand car back it bit. All ok, when does the block come off my credit card? Automatically, was the answer. ok thanks. Get back to England and after reading the reviews on TrustPilot started pooping my pants. Credit card company said wait until 31/12/2015 when it was meant to come off and it did!!!  I was really worried about not getting my money back but so far it has been ok. Maybe its just the Slovenian company that are very good, I dont know. Anyway, pleased all round. Must push their rating up a little bit I suppose.

name: Tempest Hosting, LLC.
description: Affordable 10 Gbit Dedicated Servers on the strongest global anycasted network with a capacity of over 12Tbps+. We make sure your business stays online, so you can focus on what's important: running your business. 👍Tempest offers anything from MicroCloud Xeon servers to high-end Intel 11 and 12 generation servers and Ryzen 5000 series. We offer high overclocks and water-cooled solutions. Contact us for a custom quote.Tempest is a subsidiary of Path Network, Inc., which protects our network by stepping in front of the attacks with its unique XDP / eBPF based solutions and unique filters. This allows us great flexibility with the network.
review_title: A slow start, but overall a good experience
review_text: Didn’t get server in 24-48 hours as promised via ticket. Has been pending for 53 hours now. Edit: after my second ticket the server was delivered.So far the bandwidth has been good, no ability to remove the firewall entirely from the server, forces everything to go through the filter. Staff have been around in discord and seem friendly enough. Peering to the EU is stellar. Can do about 3gbit on a single thread to NFOrce and 500-750mbit to Hetzner 1g servers. Only provider really with 10gbit unmetered bandwidth at a reasonable price, so bonus points for that. This review will be updated as testing continues.

review_title: Ineligible to buy because of Ban on Discord
review_text: A support Member told me I am not eligible to buy a Product of Tempest Hosting LLC anymore due to a ban on another Chatting Platform called Discord.I won't name this Support Member since I am not here to attack anyone personally.However I dont think its fair to be unable to buy a Server because of a Ban from Tempest Hostings Discord ServerEDIT: Those are false allegations.I did not and will not attack Tempest's Network.If you have any Question to me you can contact me via EmailEDIT (June 15, 2022):In addition to what I already stated I wanna CLEARLY say what happened.I joined the Tempest Hosting Discord Server when a Reseller of Tempest/Path DDoS Protection got suspended (100UP).As i noticed what has happened to the API I joined the Discord Server to try and ask how a Company with very advanced DDoS Protection from Layer 3-7 can have 503 HTTP Errors on their own official Website.After that I got banned and called "a DDoSser" which is clearly wrong since I was just asking a Question.

They have been a wonderful resource and a friendly conversationalist so I wanted to give credit where credit is due. I am grateful that Tempest has given me such excellent service and will absolutely recommend them to any friends seeking hosting services.Thank you Tempest!

review_text: My community has been using different services for years to host FiveM & TeamSpeak servers.  We tried manage solutions, dedicated hardware, anything we could get our hands on. Our services were constantly targeted by DDoS attacks and people trying to take our network offline. We were also plagued by false promises by companies who would ignore us after our server was hit offline. Then we found Tempest, ever since switching their specific filters have protected all of our services from large attacks that would usually take down machines on other hosts. What's special about them is the fact that they have specific filters. They filter traffic specifically for the application / game you're running. Which is much more effective than what I've found at other hosts.The average response time for them to respond to a ticket is in most cases under 5 minutes. They are always hiring new staff to make the experience better for their clients. They've perfectly bridged the gap between being a large company and caring about each individual client.One thing that amazes my about this network is the fact that they care about each individual attack. On the rare scenario that an attack leaks traffic, that attack is patched within hours, where as other providers don't do anything about it. We've had hundreds of attacks up to 100Gbps hit our servers and nothing has happened. Their network has seen attacks of up to 1.6Tbps filtered without effect on the client, that's just amazing to me.Personally, I don't think I'll ever go back to another provider. This has been such a great experience for me, the staff care about the network and it's customers. I've only ever had one issue with my machine and it was solved in 10 minutes.For me, I would never use another service again. That's my take!

review_title: Inaccurate Delivery Times, Awful Support, Incompetent System Engineers
review_text: Inaccurate Delivery Times, Awful Support, Incompetent System EngineersThe only reason I give them 2 stars is because of their Path.net DDoS protection. That's the only positive aspect I've experienced from Tempest.Firstly, the support. I waited for a response on my ticket for over 36 days. It was a simple request for a BGP announcement. Tempest has a major lack of competent staff members, which leads to crazy long wait times. I'm not the only customer waiting months for support, I've heard numerous Tempest.net horror stories. I ended up giving up on waiting for my support ticket to be completed and they refunded me, at least it was a simple process to get refunded.Delivery times have been a major issue for Tempest, there is a huge lack of in-stock servers means you can be waiting a few months to year for a custom server order delivery especially in certain locations. Tempest has a major issue with hiring, instead of hiring like an actual company would, they resort to hiring in-experienced systems engineers that lack any formal education on completing day-to-day operations a network or system engineer would usually complete. I believe this to be the reason of these numerous horror stories you'll hear coming from Tempest. Zigi is the only staff member to my knowledge that's able to complete tasks with networking such as BGP, that is laughable for a million dollar company like Path / Tempest.Compared to similar hosting companies that can get this task done in 1 day, Tempest takes 36 times longer.EDIT: Tempest has resolved the problem and announced my IP range and added 3 months of free service to my dedicated servers.

name: Wickey GmbH & Co. KG
description: Obrovský výběr hracích věží se skluzavkou a houpačkou Nejlepší kvalita, příznivé ceny a 10letá záruka Zábava začíná v e-shopu Wickey!
review_text: The wood came wet. I stored it so it can dry and left it for two weeks. I've assembled the hole thing over the course of another 2 or 3 weekends. The ends of the wood was full of splinters and had to be sanded down. Two of the planks even came cracked. Holes in studs was never in center which caused some of the screw covers to a slightly overhang the stud. Basically no plank was cut in right angle so lining them nicely was impossible. The plastic sheet that should cover the front and back just under the roof came in one piece and had to be measured and cut, which was inconvenience, but did not take too long. The flat metal anchors suggested was too weak and the house is too wobbly for my liking. Go definitely for the better anchors.After a month of finishing I've noticed the wood started to shrink and drying up eventually left 5 mm gaps between planks that were originally fitted together. I had to re-tight every screw in the house for more than one rotation because the it started to wobbling to an insane levels. Putting the poor quality of wood aside. The instruction were clear and easy to follow. Most of the work can be done by a single person and only few steps needs another one. Contrary to expectations the product was not ready made and if you can't wait two or more months to let the wood properly dry don't buy this. You will also need a few hours to sand down all the ends of wood.Edit:Wickey offered 10% refund, replacing the broken pieces and stated that the quality of the broken parts really does not meets their standards. I took the refund and added 1 star to the review for their effort. I've refused the new pieces since I don't intend to disassembly the house to replace them. They also said, that the wood was so wet from the impregnation.

name: Wickey GmbH & Co. KG
description: Obrovský výběr hracích věží se skluzavkou a houpačkou Nejlepší kvalita, příznivé ceny a 10letá záruka Zábava začíná v e-shopu Wickey!
review_title: The wood is not precise and crude.
review_text: All the children play grounds look amazing but, when the goods comes all the the wood is very crude and not precise. You have to measure everything  and drill the holes for the screws, which takes a long time. The holes could have been at least prepared from the manufacture.I was not very impressed from the woodworking!

name: Den Blå Planet, Danmarks Akvarium
description: Glæd dig til at besøge Nordeuropas største og mest moderne akvariumKom og få en sjov dag på Den Blå Planet. Bliv betaget af de forunderlige dyr, tab pusten til arkitektur i verdensklasse og bliv klogere på livet under vand. Vores søde personale står altid klar til at hjælpe dig.
review_text: So our family situation is as following, husband, wife and two sons. One of them turned 3 april 5th and the other is 10m. Husband and wife have a yearcard which we bought in august 2021 so are son (3y now) stil had free entrance. We came to den blå planet on the 26 of may 2022 and it was busy. No problem we have year passes that were payed for we just have to get something for our son cause he just turned 3… we were told we could buy a ticket for 14:00 o clock.. it was 11:00.. even though we have year passes and our son turned 3 last month! Next time i will defenitly not buy our year card there and will recommend others not to do so either! Dont want to waist any more money there!

name: Barwood Homes
description: Looking for a new property? At Barwood Homes we aim to raise the bar in new home design. Delivering stunning new houses in idyllic village locations
review_text: Having recently moved into our new home there was the inevitable snagging list. Barwood do this differently to most in that you have 7-days from completion to report any issues. So a real chance to see that everything is at it should be.Unfortunately we did have a water leak which caused some mess. However we give 5* for the speed & efficiency this was dealt with and for Roy! Roy is an absolute diamond, someone who really cares and takes pride in his work. Friendly and very respectful in keeping mess to a minimum and cleaned up as he went through his list. Most were just minor snags but the large hole in ceiling & top of wall was sizeable.  We were completely shocked by the seamless repair. Honestly you would really need a magnifying glass to see where the damage was.  Roy, thank you. We are very pleased how this all went, especially after the rather stressful 48-hours over Jubilee weekend when the leak occured. We love our bright  spacious home and the quality of appliances and components used to create it. Well done Roy & Barwood Homes.

name: Barwood Homes
description: Looking for a new property? At Barwood Homes we aim to raise the bar in new home design. Delivering stunning new houses in idyllic village locations
review_text: We have been very impressed with the emphasis placed on customer service to ensure a wonderful experience when buying a new home in a recent visit to the development. We are currently looking for a new family home and felt very informed and welcomed.

name: Barwood Homes
description: Looking for a new property? At Barwood Homes we aim to raise the bar in new home design. Delivering stunning new houses in idyllic village locations
review_title: Public Open Spaces do not adhere to planning.
review_text: The Public Open Spaces at The Old Stour development are absolutely terrible. Anyone looking to buy a Barwood Home should take a look at these unkempt areas and spend their money with a competent developer. There are many dead trees. These have been dead ever since they were planted as they were never watered or tended to after planting. The shrub beds are full of giant weeds. The path is an unkempt mess. The landscaping schedule was never adhered to resulting in a weed strewn grassy mess instead of the wild flower planting that was shown on the landscaping scheme. Barwood should be completely ashamed at this mess.

name: Barwood Homes
description: Looking for a new property? At Barwood Homes we aim to raise the bar in new home design. Delivering stunning new houses in idyllic village locations
review_title: My reviews seem to be removed for some…
review_text: My reviews seem to be removed for some reason , my reviews have been completely honest and truthful regarding our Barwood home and the experiences we have had from poor workmanship, four years on and we still have problems roof slates sliding this has happened four or five times now on a completely new roof that should last at least ten or twenty years without a problem, terrible smells in our bathrooms from poor drains that are unvented , boiler inadequate for a property of its size , main drains on our development blocking , the public spaces are a complete joke dead grass and trees fencing not fit for purpose, path edgings in a terrible state and a gravel path full of weeds and an electric gate that’s fitted to a neighbours power supply, I just wish I could put all the problems we have had down but there just isn’t time or space to do so

name: Barwood Homes
description: Looking for a new property? At Barwood Homes we aim to raise the bar in new home design. Delivering stunning new houses in idyllic village locations
review_text: Look down the list for the childish names of supposed happy reviewers and make your own mind up. At Alderminster despite months of fob offs this outfit were compelled to remove and replace all roofs. (Drop in and ask any resident). Barwood were not afraid to lie to us and even told us that our house was "New" when in fact it was "Used" - such meaning that all warranties for appliances were invalid. No soil and vent pipes to many houses which meant the houses stunk and upon their CEO's direction I was given a survey of the drains under our floors which turned out to be falsified (fraudulent) with it being necessary to break up the floors of our house to enable the drains to be replaced/re-aligned.They would not give us a copy of the drawings for our houses but then they threw them in the skip (a neighbour recovered them) Disatisfied buyers from numerous estates are now sharing notes.We have asked Barwood to explain in writing how they managed to create such a mess but they only offered to send out a rude Director who my wife has banned from our house. They had an extremely bad mannered and ignorant Customer Care "lady" who caused mayhem everywhere she went but now has scarpered (as all cowboys inevitably do).  By all means buy one of these houses if you wish to be bitterly disappointed.

name: Barwood Homes
description: Looking for a new property? At Barwood Homes we aim to raise the bar in new home design. Delivering stunning new houses in idyllic village locations
review_text: We are currently in the process of buying a Barwood Homes property. We are in a chain where there's been a last minute holdup. We cannot thank  Barwood Homes and particularly Luke Simmons enough for working with us to ensure we don't lose the house that we are so excited to be making our new home. The chain process has been so stressful, but thanks to Luke and also Debbie, our fears have been allayed. Thank you for being such considerate developers.

name: Barwood Homes
description: Looking for a new property? At Barwood Homes we aim to raise the bar in new home design. Delivering stunning new houses in idyllic village locations
review_text: Barwood refuse to accept any liability for poor workmanship. No sealant or rubber seal around bath taps has lead to leakage under the bath which has seeped through to the adjoining room and ruined the carpet. Black mould all along the floor. No help whatsoever from customer services!!

name: Barwood Homes
description: Looking for a new property? At Barwood Homes we aim to raise the bar in new home design. Delivering stunning new houses in idyllic village locations
review_text: Had a member of the Barwood Homes team round this week (Roy Paul), to put right the few things on the snagging list. He went above and beyond, and did a great job.

name: Barwood Homes
description: Looking for a new property? At Barwood Homes we aim to raise the bar in new home design. Delivering stunning new houses in idyllic village locations
review_title: Roy came today to complete the snag…
review_text: Roy came today to complete the snag list for my Barwood home, he was fantastic, he delt with all the issues to a very high standard. Brilliant customer service 5⭐️Barwood homes have been fantastic through the whole buying process, customer service is brilliant. I am very happy in my beautiful new home, thank you!

review_text: We moved in 4 years ago. On the whole, happy with our house.Once your two years are up, Barwood offer nothing by way of support or advice, they just fob you off.We have recently discovered a significant condensation problem in our roof. Their team gave invalid excuses and declined to help. Barwood bosses, in my experience, do everything they can to avoid calling you themselves. They find the quickest, lowest input solution, without care for the customers or for fixing the issue permanently, and ask the poor team that man the phones to make the difficult calls. They are a big fan of putting in a middle man to avoid facing the challenge themselves.Really, really disappointed with our recent interaction, feeling let down.

review_text: We moved into our new Barwood home two days ago! Although the conveyancing process was extremely stressful the staff at Barwood did their best at all times to work with us, finding solutions to issues as they arose, being responsive, dynamic and above all friendly and personal. A big thank you to Mandy Soames for all of her efforts to help us meet the ever moving timelines and Clare Hayward for allowing us shelter on a cold, stormy day waiting and staying with us until completion had finally gone through.From first impressions living here the house is well designed and finished and we are hopeful that snags will only be minor cosmetic ones. The development is well thought out and an attractive environment.We are pleased we chose to buy from Barwood

review_text: Absolutely made up with our purchase at Heathe Gardens. Mandy was extremely helpful and supportive throughout the whole process and we cannot thank herself and her team enough for everything they have done for us. Highly recommended.

review_text: We have recently purchased a 4 bed detached in the Cherwell Rise development. From the beginning of the process to completion has been seamless with Debbie in the sales office to Bill overseeing any issues at the house. Handover was thorough and professional and the 7 day follow up completed without any queries. Having started life in the building trade I am equally impressed with the construction and finish. A special mention for Bill the site manager who really does go the extra mile to help whether it be addressing minor issues or giving advice on which fixings to use on the walls etc.

name: Barwood Homes
description: Looking for a new property? At Barwood Homes we aim to raise the bar in new home design. Delivering stunning new houses in idyllic village locations
review_title: Be nice if the sales advisor could remember your name….
review_text: We were interested in buying a house on the Gilden Green site. I spoke to Jayne on several occasions over the phone and she contacted me to check the progress of the sale of our house. When I then went to view a house on the site, Jayne called me Rebecca three times. I corrected her that was not my name but she continued to call me Rebecca. Jayne managed to call me my correct name over the phone but several times in person couldn’t seem to remember my name… funnily enough she could get my partners name right. I have two friends who decided to buy houses on this site but Jayne then decided to tell our friends that I was viewing a house, which was private information which I hadn’t shared. This is a clear breach of GDPR and my sensitive information was shared without my permission. This put me off buying a house on this site and we bought elsewhere. I know of several issues with the houses on the Gilden Green site which have had issues, Barwood have not sorted them out therefore, avoid avoid avoid.

review_text: Horrible service, useless customer service and caused us to lose a member of our family. Our dog had an infection and we are a poor family so we trusted your company to provide the necessary medication for her. We paid for 1 or 2-day delivery and after a full week with constant emails and calls to your useless customer service we went back to the vets to scrape enough money together for the medication from them. after 1 more week on the medication we found it was too little too late. she died on the 15th of may at 4:30 am from the infection. she suffered that entire night and all the awful customer service could do was apologise for the delay. the medicine eventually arrived 3 days after she died. My family will never forgive or trust pet drugs online again and will be sure to spread this to anyone who will listen

review_text: I ordered insulin for my dog, it was much cheaper than buying from the vet and it arrived the following day which was brilliant. My only concern is that although it was packed in a box with a chill pack, it’s 20° today and it had been in the DPD van all day until it was delivered at 4.10pm. Maybe some kind of polystyrene packaging along with the pack might be better.

name: Pet Drugs Online
description: We’re part of IVC Evidensia, Europe’s leading veterinary care provider based across 11 countries around the world.
