review_text: Placed a prescription for Apoquel 5.4mg x 60 with you on Tuesday 10/5/22 and status was still showing as “processing” on the Friday. This is my first order with you and I became concerned that Brea would run out of her daily medication on Sunday. I paid for Royal Mail first class delivery but as today is Friday and you do not work weekends I was concerned as to when the prescription would be received.In fact the medication was received on the Tuesday having been dispatched on the Monday - as expected Brea ran out on the Sunday.There would appear to be turnaround time issues which are not helped by a Monday to Friday office hours only operation.  As a now retired NHS Scientist and Quality Manager I was used to a never closed service 24-7-365 approach!I note that there have been a few other negative reviews of late expressing similar concerns, and as Brea, following an annual review, is due a repeat prescription towards the end of July I will be monitoring, with respect to TATs, whether to use you or an alternative supplier especially as I will be submitting a repeat prescription rather than what was a one off.

name: Pet Drugs Online
description: We’re part of IVC Evidensia, Europe’s leading veterinary care provider based across 11 countries around the world. review_text: When I ordered my pets medication, I uploaded a photograph image of the prescription. 2 days later, I was informed that no prescription had been received so I had to resend it. This order was placed on the 25th May.With no sign of the medication and in the absence of any communication, I emailed the company on Sunday 3rd June. I received an email on Monday stating that my order did not correspond to the prescription and that they were awaiting a response before they could progress with the order. I received no such email. On Monday I emailed again confirming the order. 2 days later, I received the same email stating that they were still awaiting my response. As my pet is now running dangerously low on this important medication, I phoned the company today. After leaving a message, I was phoned back and told that they don’t have this product in stock.The whole process has been extremely stressful and a complete waste of time. I will never use the company again.

review_text: Ordered Royal Canin Urinary S/O to dissolve a stone in my small 11year old King Charles Cavalier. The vets recommended Hills from their experience but it was unavailable at the time. This food has dissolved her stone entirely in less than 6 months, which has saved her enduring intrusive surgery and a £450+ bill for us. Food arrived promptly and will continue to order from Pet Drugs Online. Now on Royal Canin Maintenance for this. Thank you!!

review_title: No Medication, no Contact but they Keep the Money
review_text: (Updated - Pet Drugs Online, I stated quite clearly how many tablets the prescription was for and how many times it could be used. Your reply is therefore more of the same nonsense I got when I phoned you.)Thanks to these cowboys we are now short on medication for the dog and until they refund me (because they think it's fine to keep the goods and the money) for the order they weren't going to send I cannot afford to go elsewhere. I've told them to close my account as they are worse than useless. If your pet needs medication I strongly recommend going elsewhere. If you want more here's the story...I've ordered from them in the past (with a prescription) without any problems. I've previously used the same prescription twice (with 'is repeatable' written on it) without issue.On the 16th May I placed a second order using an 'is repeatable' prescription. The prescription is valid for 6 months, is for 90 one a day tablets, therefore it can be used twice.I hear nothing, but I'm not concerned as they have been a bit slow in the past. After 10 days I still haven't had any contact so I check the website, my order is shown as 'pending' but there is no indication why. So I ring them, then the nonsense starts. They claimed to have e-mailed me two days after I placed the order. No e-mail was received. They now have a problem with the prescription because it can't be used twice. Why? It's in exactly the same format as the previous prescription I used twice.I never got a satisfactory answer to this question, but they promised to check and contact me. They rung me just over an hour later and informed me that I couldn't use the 'is repeatable' prescription twice. That's despite the fact that they have previously accepted 'is repeatable' prescriptions twice without comment.It's at this point they offer to issue a refund. Now I am furious, if they weren't going to send the goods and they knew that over a week ago why didn't they refund the money then? Again no satisfactory answer is forthcoming only some pathetic excuses from the disinterested employee.I'm not rich, I can't afford to have companies just hang on to nearly £100 for a week and a half for something they've no intention of sending.I've told them to close my account and delete my records. Under 'Data Protection Right to Erasure' rules they have a month to delete the data, delete any data they've shared with third parties (which they shouldn't have) and contact me to tell me they've done it. I'm not holding my breath.

review_text: I’ve used this company many times over the years as they provide a really good service, are very prompt and are truly competitive on price.  However, I was prompted to write this recommendation following a much appreciated event.Having got a prescription of our vet, I bought 6 months supply of heart tablets for our ageing Cavalier King Charles, Honey.  Unfortunately, Honey died unexpectedly and just before my previous batch of tablets ran out.  I then had no use for the new batch and enquired if it was possible to return them.  PDO were very understanding & sympathetic.  No problem was the immediate response; “return them & once we’ve checked them, providing they’re untouched, we’ll credit you in full.”  A credit was duly paid within just a couple of days. Altogether great customer service

description: ResMed changes lives with medical devices and cloud-based software apps that better diagnose, treat and manage sleep apnea, COPD, and other chronic diseases.Visit our website
review_text: I was initially thrilled to receive my package on 26/5/22, only 2 days after placing my order online (24/5/22) for AirMini filters.  Then I discovered that ResMed staff had sent a completely wrong item - I'd received a nose cushion, which I definitely did not need or want! (Stock code 38813 ordered, code 63813 delivered) I rang the Customer Service centre, only to be told that I had to return the wrong item, before they would send me out the correct item!So after having the convenience of online ordering and quick delivery, I had to package up the item, and go to the Post Office to send the item back to ResMed. On 30/5/22, Aust Post emailed to confirm they had delivered my package to ResMed.  BUT, I have only just received the correct item (on 15/6/22) over two weeks later ... after another two phone calls to the ResMed Customer Service Centre chasing my item.In the meantime, I have not been able to use my C-Pap machine, and had I had a car accident, I'm not sure my insurance company would have covered me either! Very disappointed with the service provided, due to THEIR error, not mine.  They should have posted the correct item to me immediately, and carried the risk of me not returning the original item.  Or at worst, offered to charge me for the 2nd item, then refunded when the original item was returned. Or maybe they should just have offered me a free replacement.

review_title: We applied for a green homes grant to…install a heat pump
review_text: We applied for a green homes grant to help pay for a new heat pump, but shortly after applying the government announced the scheme was closing.  Evergreen were extremely helpful and managed to help  complete everything necessary on time so that the grant application went through. Despite being up against it timewise, all the work was completed in November.We are over the moon with our new heating system , our house is always warm and there is plenty of hot water. It seems incredible that on the coldest day the heat pump can still run efficiently.  The homely app makes it very easy to control if we do want to adjust the temperature, and we are so pleased to have an eco friendly heating system.

name: Evergreen Energy
description: We design and build home heating systems using the latest heat pump technology.Our heat pump systems use naturally-occurring energy from the surroundings to heat your home affordably and reliably. review_text: Good experience, the Evergreen Energy team are very professional and supportive. We had an air source heat pump installed in our 300 year old farmhouse, so unsurprisingly it was a tricky job. The team managed to get it all sorted and we now have a modern heating system throughout the property.We made use of the 'Assignment of Rights' programme, which means we don't receive any of the government renewable heat incentives, but it meant we had to pay way less upfront for the system. This was the only way we could afford to get the system installed so for us it was a great solution.

review_text: Evergreen have given nothing but 5 star service from start to finish. We had an air source heat pump and complete heating system installation through the assignment of rights scheme. name: ManoMano
review_text: Those guys are clueless. Made an order. Paid. 5 days a bed should have been delivered and yet nothing. They can’t but not answer the calls and with online chatting they just stop responding. Many of their products are sold through others online retailers. My best advise: don’t loose your time and energy with those people.

name: ManoMano
review_title: Don't deserve 1 star but its the lowest…
review_text: Don't deserve 1 star but its the lowest rating you can give.Terrible company to deal with handed the whole problem over to the supplier who we had to deal with direct. Returned goods and took 3 months and a lot of e mails to get refund. Will never deal with this company again, just to much hassle

name: ManoMano
review_text: MANOMANO ARE CROOKS. SCAMMERS.ALSO THE APP THEY RECOMMEND CUSTOMERS TO DOWNLOAD, (AFTERSHIP), TO TRACK UNDELIVERED ITEMS, IS ALSO A SCAM. THEY SAY THEY ATTEMPTED DELIVERY WHEN THAT WAS UNTRUE. FINALLY THEY SAID ITEM HAS BEEN DELIVERED!!! I'M STILL WAITING.THE ENTIRE OUTFIT IS A VERY WELL ORGANISED SCAMMING OPERATION.

name: ManoMano
review_text: Order number M220342675657 placed 20/03/22. Money taken and goods not received. The company certainly don’t make it easy to report such like problems?I want the goods or refund ASAP.

name: ManoMano
review_text: TERRIBLE COMPANY - Save your time and by the stuff somwere else. This company does not deliver products. No customer service, no contact. THEY SIMPLY CHARGE YOU AND DONT DELIVER!!

name: ManoMano
review_title: Order never arrived, refund never processed.
review_text: I made an order which never arrived. I kept asking customer service to locate my order and ask when it would arrive but they kept telling me to rest assured, as my order was on the way. This was about 2 months of being told that it’s coming. I then asked for a full refund after not having the confidence of my order arriving. They told me they would process it but it’s been a few months now and still no information about when I will get a refund. When I ask then when I will get a refund, they tell me that my refund is with the right department and all will happen in due course. I made the order in November 2021 and it is now April 2022 and I have not yet heard when I will get my refund. The customer service people I talk to are very nice but very restrictive with the information they give me and I have lost all faith I will ever get my refund back. I would recommend anyone not to shop from this online store, just in case you have the same issues as me.I ordered from the Spanish site (pedido1359).

name: ManoMano
review_text: I ordered a dome climbing frame for my grandsons birthday which isn't till May. I ordered it on Monday4th April and I have already had it delivered today. I was really surprised at the delivery time but also very impressed. I will certainly use them again

name: ManoMano
review_title: I have been trying to get in contact…
review_text: I have been trying to get in contact with this company via there website. As they said my items I ordered had been delivered over two weeks ago! I have not received my item. They have not contacted me to any of myMessages. I have been ignored time after time! I know just want a refund! I still have heard nothing from the company! I feel robbed! I want my money back! Or my items! You are not aloud to do this!!!!!!!!

name: ManoMano
review_text: Customer service is absolutely shocking. Its actually a third party you're purchasing from. All the people via customer service and email to the actual seller clearly cannot understand English. AVOID !!!

name: ManoMano
review_text: I wish I had read these reviews before spending £667.78. Order furnature on 9th March promised delivery by 15th-17th March I stayed in for 3 days off work, using my holiday. The tracking system is absolutely hopeless. It was my 60th birthday on the 17th March and arranged small party sitting on new furniture had to cancel. I have spoken to Mano Mano and they just keep referring me back to Red Deco. My goods are still in France even today 22 March. I have ask for a full refund at least 6 times and I’m just fobbed off they don’t appear to listen. I have asked to speak to a manager never one available and pushed back to speak to Red Deco. This company is awful my contract  is with Mano Mano not Red Deco. I’m so fed up I will never use this unprofessional, useless company again, I have sent so may emails saying PLEASE GIVE ME MY MONEY BACK.

review_title: I felt like I was scammed right up until the glasses arrived. Fix your website!
review_text: The entire website looks incredibly shady, so right after I ordered I regretted it as I read the reviews on Thrustpilot. I ordered a Rayban and apparently I made a mistake in entering my email address. Their webstore is quite terrible so it did not check if I entered a valid email. It did however allow me to pay for the glasses. This is bad! Always check if your customer entered a valid email address, or you have no way of contacting them and they won't receive any updates on their order. It's quite possible that most of the bad reviews here are just because of this. People make a mistake, have no way of contacting the seller and so they think it's a scam. I must say that their customer service did respond and the mistake got fixed, but still the entire thing feels shady(heh). They send it through UPS but the receipt says that there are no shipping costs. With UPS? How? It doesn't make sense?The glasses arrived within a reasonable time and they seem real, so that's good. Still, I can only give two stars because the entire process from paying to receiving the glasses felt as a scam. I don't like to be anxious for 3 weeks thinking I lost 160 euros just because the web shop is crap.

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_text: Gupta has helped me improve my physical level from 30% to 60%. Still a long way from full recovery but a great deal more manageable. The brain retraining hypothesis seems to have considerable basis evidence. Gupta gave me the tools to mentally manage this illness. The information is beautifully presented both online an in a manual. The coaches are welltrained and very supportive.n

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_text: Beware of this company. There are technical issues with their videos, and they do not have customer service you can speak with. They try to tell you over the email that the problem is your device - even though you have tried it on every device in your house and it doesn’t work on any of them. Apparently, I am not the only one with this issue since they have a link under every video to click if you are having audio problems.

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_title: Gupta gave me hope after getting Long Covid
review_text: This is my second review, an update about how everything is going after some additional months of doing the Gupta program. I am doing it after developing Long Covid in March 2020, and I started the Gupta program around a year later, in May 2021. I have decided to repurchase the Gupta program for an additional year because I'm not yet healed - but it helps me tremendously to have the videos and the retraining to keep me going. The program made me find hope that I will heal, and even though I had hoped I would have further in my healing, I've come a long way! The webinars have been  wonderful, especially the interaction with other retrainers - to hear what have helped them and hear about their healing journey. I really appreciate that Ashok has said they're going to be more interactive - I hope we'll get to see more retrainers tell their story - it's amazing to not feel alone. There are a few improvements I'd be happy to see: I'd like to see auto-play for the videos, so the next video would start directly after the other one. The website is quite slow loading the videos, and it's quite a faff,to have to go back from full-screen mode, press next session, go back to full-screen mode again etc.. When being in a flow of watching the videos, auto-play (that stayed in full-screen) would have been appreciated!Secondly, some meditations and exercises don't have the same audio quality as the rest of them. I really like the visualisation exercise, but find it harder to immerse myself into it when the audio quality isn't very good.

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_title: More on my experience with the Gupta Program
review_text: This is an update to a previous review.  I still recommend people to take Ashok Gupta's  program.  It has really helped people with specific disorders and so it is important to have a reasonably accurate diagnosis going into this work.  In my case, much later in life (a couple of years back actually), I learned I had a significant respiratory condition (not just asthma) that impacted my energy level as well as having CFS.  So when I previously used the Gupta Program, my recovery was affected by this permanent lung damage and so it was good to finally know this, and it had a bearing on why I did not make it to 80-100% recovery.  After adding specific breathing modalities from Buteyko Breathing, did I then continue to improve further.  The two modalities of the Gupta Program and Buteyko Breathing are  very helpful for me to stay on an even keel.  Any notable improvement is a success for one undertaking this journey even if one does not get to 100%.

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_title: I was introduced to The GUPTA Program 4…
review_text: I was introduced to The GUPTA Program 4 months ago from someone who had Long Covid and used this program to recover. Having tried so many things to get better I decided to give the program a go. 4 months ago I couldn't get out of bed. Today I have recovered by 80%. I now take our dog out for a few miles walk each day and can engage in my family life and have gone back to work a few hours a week. x I feel so blessed to have been guided to Ashoc Gupta xThe program brings us right back to our heart and helps us do much needed inner work to heal our bodies. I still have a way to go but the progress has been amazing over these months. I would highly recommend this program. Its been a challenge but now there is support which counts for so much x x

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_text: For 36 years, I lived with Chronic Fatigue Syndrome and symptoms no doctor could determine the cause of, nor  offer any help...  it must be "in my head" was how I was treated.Living with CFS is like being a V8 engine running on only 2 cylinders.  I spent so many $1,000's trying to get well. In March 2020, I got Covid and ended up with Long Covid. My "engine" seemed to almost quit running at all...I became bedridden.  My search for health now felt my life depended on it.Then I found the Gupta Program. Now I know  why these chronic disabilities have lingered for decades and, most important, how to ease my way out of them...I  am finally healing. Of course, I wish I'd found the Gupta Program decades ago, but, am grateful I have now.  It's addressing the Long Covid, CFS, and even my diagnosed Complex PTSD...  I will use it the rest of my life.

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_title: The best birthday gift I could give to myself
review_text: This program has exceeded my expectations in terms of achieving holistic healing. Ever since starting it 4 months ago I experienced a leap in my spiritual, emotional, mental& physical health. Not only have I seen significant improvement in my overall well-being but also I’ve been experiencing incredible synchronicities, my intuition has exploded, I am more joyful∈ love with life than I’ve ever been before. I’ve enjoyed attending the weekly interactive webinars, the Facebook forum and also having a buddy.Ashok is caring&compassionate&genuinely wants people to achieve whole recovery.

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_title: A well-rounded program - compassionate and deeply healing
review_text: I was referred to this program by an environmental doctor after a mold illness diagnosis. I also suffered from food intolerances and had chronic pain for well over a decade. Understanding that all of these conditions stem from the same root cause - a dysregulated nervous system - was eye-opening. Being given the tools to develop resilience and gradually return to balance has been a real gift of self-empowerment. The book and the webinars are informative and easy to follow. The twelve-week virtual sessions with Ashok have been instrumental and a real lifeline, humanizing a journey that can sometimes feel isolating. Ashok is kind and compassionate. The addition of retrainer testimonials during the sessions has been truly uplifting. At about 60% recovered, I’m well on my way to full health and now, instead of dreading this condition, I look forward to the journey.

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_text: I developed multiple chemical sensitivities and food sensitivities 30 years ago.   Since that time, I have tried my best to manage my symptoms by following a rotation diet, avoiding chemicals and fragrances, and trying a variety of treatment modalities.  These things kept me going, but they brought no hope of healing.  When I heard about the Gupta Program and read the explanation of the condition, I felt great relief as this was the first explanation that made complete sense to me and gave me hope.  I signed up immediately and stayed with it through some other health issues. Recently I have been able to focus exclusively on the program, and have started tolerating more soaps, cleaning chemicals and fabrics.  I still have food sensitivities, but I am sure I have found the right path back to complete health. The program has also helped to bring some healing of past trauma and an increase in self-confidence -- I am deeply grateful for this!  I highly recommend this comprehensive program and the supportive webinars!

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_title: I have tried a lot of different things…
review_text: I have tried a lot of different things over the years for my long-term illness and I have seen results since beginning the Gupta Program! The Gupta Program provided education about my condition, tools to use, various forms of support, and community. It takes commitment; however, I stick with it, because I am getting better. Thank you!

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_title: This program has changed my life!!
review_text: This program has changed my life!  I purchased the program four months ago for physical conditions, but the biggest change so far has been in my mental/emotional health.  In the past I have replayed "movies" of every negative thing that has ever happened to me or things that might happen in the future, rather than living in the present. I am learning to break those negative loops in my brain and re-engage with joy! Ashok is such a compassionate, genuine person, who seems to truly care about everyone. The program is very affordable, compared to comparable programs.  The weekly webinars help to keep me focused on my recovery.  I plan to purchase the next webinar and really focus on my continued physical recovery.

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_title: I do not know where I would be without this program.
review_text: I highly recommend this program. Not only for people with chronic illness, but actually for anyone who wants to be able to live with a lot of energy and authentically.I have long covid and was bedridden for 2 months until I came across this program. I was out of bed within a week and after 2 months I was doing all my household chores again and I was able to walk for 15 minutes again. This program is so complete and knowledgeable. Ashok has so much knowledge that it is almost impossible not to heal if you actually apply the program and have perseverance. But what choice do you have? I am not 100% cured yet and I have full confidence that this will happen. And the program is so much more than just curing the condition. I am already so much more aware of my old inner programs that have cost me a lot of energy all my life such as: putting others first, pleasing others or going beyond my limits. This for me is not only healing the condition but also healing my old beliefs that no longer serve me. And I've been working on many different types of therapy for 10 years and these have helped me / made me more aware, but Ashok's method makes it final that even if something happens in my life I no longer fall back into the old patterns that used to happen.Thank you so much Ashok and Ashok’s team

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_text: I found the Gupta program a game changer and it might be life-changing. I have had ME for 8th years, but there is a change now after 8 months of solid training. The program includes themes, information and techniques I was already doing, but together with the re-traning and all the wisdom and knowledge from Ashok Gupta it all together resonated deeply with me. The program helps me to put my own knowledge & experience together with all the wisdom and re-traning I have learned from Ashok, into a very helpful daily routine. After 6 months I felt the freedom of being able to let go and trust the method/program and when doing so allowing my body to heal. I love the deep scientific and spiritual basis for the program, a lot of useful content,  Ashoks way of presenting and the “Do your best leave the rest” approach. Thank you Ashok and team🙏🏻As a foreign language person, it would have saved me energy to have english subtitles available when watching the course sessions.

name: Gupta Program
description: Gupta Program Brain Retraining™ Is A Powerful Revolutionary Neuroplasticity and Holistic Health Program For Chronic Conditions such as ME/CFS, Fibromyalgia, MCS, EHS, Anxiety, Pain Syndromes or Related Conditions.Thousands of people around the world have got their lives back using this Program.
review_text: I really appreciate this program as it doesn’t promise to be a quick fix but is really supportive, no matter what your functional ability or life situation. It’s positive and uplifting, but also gentle, and covers important areas of recovery like meditation, brain retraining, parts work etc. The presentation is clear and compassionate. I love watching the videos as they are filmed in the Swiss Alps, in nature, which makes it easy to relax and absorb the information. Thankful to Ashok Gupta and his team for creating this program! 😊

review_text: I completed another limbic retraining program a few years ago for my CFS/ME. It definitely helped me to a point, but then I plateaued. I would recommend this program to anyone suffering with CFS/ME, Fibro, Long Covid, etc.

review_title: Happy to encounter the Gupta Program!
review_text: Well, I'm so glad I read an article in my magazine voor ME/CFS about te Gupta Program. I'm trying to get my strength and energie back for at least 15 years now. I have tried several disciplines, but none of them really worked. I bought the program in November last year, started it with joy. Then things happens in my life and I don't do the program properly. When I started the webinar things are going better. I felt more energy, able to do more thing without being totally exhausted. I was experiencing I was on my way of recovery. Then again much is happening in my life requiring my attention and time.With the result not doing the program properly.  In the last session of the webinar I realise that my commitment has not been strong enough to continue the program. Therefor I'm going to sigh in for the next webinar and make my commitment strong this time.I learned so much about the way our brain works and how you can changes his habits to get better. And Gupta explains it so clearly in a pleasant way, with lots of examples so you get it.My compliments !

review_text: I have been doing the Gupta program for 3 months and seeing great improvements in my health! The program is so well put together and you feel supported with the weekly webinars. I have tried a few other brain rewiring programs but this one is the best by far! I feel like I am finally getting my life back after spending 8 years going from Dr. to Dr. with no answers. My immune system and nervous system are calming down and  I'm finding joy again by taking the focus off feeling ill. So happy to have found this program!

review_title: So grateful for the Gupta Program
review_text: I feel blessed to have found this wonderful nurturing program. I’ve had Lyme for over 25yrs, complicated with mold reactivity and for the last several years MCS. I lost my husband last year and I believe that caused my adrenals to become challenged.  Basically I was a mess and I needed a comprehensive program with all the tools in order to regain some of my life back.  The Gupta program is doing that.  I am still fairly new, so I will continue to work the program as suggested. I look forward to the day that I am completely healthy, happy and healed!   If someone is willing to put in the work, I believe that the limbic retraining works.Ashok is a beautiful human being and I appreciate all that he gives of himself to help so many people.

name: Offpeakluxury
description: Luxury Breaks: Offpeakluxury offers short hotel luxury breaks at the finest luxury country hotels and boutique townhouses in the UK and Ireland
review_title: Show no compassion and not helpful
review_text: We were due to stay at Mar Hall hotel near Glasgow on the 28th April 2022 and booked our stay with a gift voucher purchased by our son from offpeakluxury.On the morning of our stay, we came down to find our dog seriously unwell and subsequently had to have him put to sleep later on that morning.We were totally distraught and couldn’t continue with our stay that night.We had also booked flights up that morning from Heathrow to Glasgow for our stay and British Airways were brilliant in issuing us with a voucher to use at a later date, however when I called offpeakluxury to cancel our reservation at Mar Hall they were not so helpful. They showed no compassion and just said that because I was cancelling within 48 hours there was nothing they could do and to check our travel insurance which didn’t cover loss of pet anyway.We didn’t want a refund, just the chance to stay at the hotel another time.They didn’t look at our situation on an individual basis and use any discretion in helping us out at a very upsetting time. After what we went through that morning that would have gone a very long way.Beware booking through them if your plans have to change at the last minute even for something so completely devastating.In response to the reply below,On the morning I lost my dog and had to contact offpeakluxury I was extremely upset and was not able to face a confrontational phone call with the customer service advisor. It has taken me weeks to come to terms with our loss and even consider contacting them again to see if they could reconsider our case. A little more sympathy would have been very nice.

name: Offpeakluxury

review_text: Excellent friendly service; the lady was most knowledgeable and helpful and we look forward to our three night break at Billesley Manor hotel. Hopefully it, and Stratford on Avon, will not disappoint. Breakfast included plus one evening meal and a bottle of wine at a very reasonable price. Will review again after the event but sounds good so far.

name: Offpeakluxury

name: Offpeakluxury
description: Luxury Breaks: Offpeakluxury offers short hotel luxury breaks at the finest luxury country hotels and boutique townhouses in the UK and Ireland
review_text: Please don't use Off Peak book direct with the hotel our recent experience ruined ou 20th Wedding Anniversary. After arriving at the hotel diffusers placed around the hotel brought on an asthma attack although efforts were made to help we had to leave the hotel to help relieve this. Off Peak refused a refund initially but after complaining again a lesser amount in vouchers were offered. Staff at the hotel led us to believe because our contract was with Off Peak it reduce our potential to resolve the matter. Shame on you Off Peak no refund then partial in vouchers, your customer services ruined our Anniversary!!  Following a reply from Off Peak, they have not got the facts right flowers and spa products were offered because of the hotels inability to provide the treatments booked. As for notifying the hotel about an asthma condition, really !! no one we've spoken to has found a need to do this. The reaction was one not known of. Off Peak managed to make contact to take our payment of £700 which was paid promptly !!!

name: Offpeakluxury
description: Luxury Breaks: Offpeakluxury offers short hotel luxury breaks at the finest luxury country hotels and boutique townhouses in the UK and Ireland
review_text: We purchased a voucher for my parents 60th Birthday pre covid and was unable to use for approx 18months whilst hotels were closed etc.My mother and father suffered serious I’ll health and it was extended to the end of December 2021.I called in December and explained that due to on-going medical issues I would not be able to make a booking before March 2022 and I was told to call back before the end of March.Subsequently tried to book and they have told me the voucher is invalid and expired at the end of December.Basically calling me a liar and that I did not speak to them in December as there is no record of this.£450 paid and after two horrendous two years my parents were so looking forward to this.I am now seeking legal advise. Customer service has been horrendous.No understanding or sympathy whatsoever.Response read ‘this is the directors final decision and the voucher is now void’!

name: Offpeakluxury
description: Luxury Breaks: Offpeakluxury offers short hotel luxury breaks at the finest luxury country hotels and boutique townhouses in the UK and Ireland
review_text: I have booked numerous holidays with off peak leisure, and have never been disappointed. The hotels they use are always to a high standard. The eateries have always offered delicious food, friendly staff and excellent service. If you want to be spoilt this is the company you need to book your holiday with. Off peak leisure offer some superb deals, and the staff are always friendly, efficient and informative, I would never use any other company to book my UK 🇬🇧 holidays, because I would not get this level of service or quality hotels and value for money.

name: Offpeakluxury
description: Luxury Breaks: Offpeakluxury offers short hotel luxury breaks at the finest luxury country hotels and boutique townhouses in the UK and Ireland
review_text: Having used Offpeakluxury on numerous occasions for luxury mini breaks in the UK I can’t fault the professional service which OPL provides always going the extra mile to make your experience feel very special I wouldn’t use anyone else 5 Stars all the way

name: Offpeakluxury
description: Luxury Breaks: Offpeakluxury offers short hotel luxury breaks at the finest luxury country hotels and boutique townhouses in the UK and Ireland
review_text: Booked a "Luxury" break a the Corus Hotel in Hyde, Park London as a birthday celebration. Room and Brasserie pictures were in accurate - Brasserie isn't located in the conservatory. Chef leaves at 7.45pm sharp even though OPL allowed me to make a dinner reservation at 8pm. Passed all blame on to Hotel, although OPL have since amended their web site. Hotel failed to resolve and only offered me a discount for next stay. Why would I want to do that? Make sure you check fine print before booking.

name: Offpeakluxury

review_title: Excellent service overseen by a very…
review_text: Excellent service overseen by a very pleasant young lady.

review_text: We made a booking but were forced to cancel on the day of arrival due to illness. Mary at Off Peak Luxury pulled out all the stops and saved the day, enabling us to postpone the booking to a future date. Fantastic service.

review_title: First class service from hotel & Country breaks
review_text: We firstly dealt with Steve at the Wood Norton Hotel who was very helpful and agreed to upgrade our room complimentary, which we thought was very generous. Then Mary looked after the booking and this lady was exceptional to say the least, as nothing was too much trouble.

name: Offpeakluxury
description: Luxury Breaks: Offpeakluxury offers short hotel luxury breaks at the finest luxury country hotels and boutique townhouses in the UK and Ireland
review_text: We book regularly and always have excellent service from the Off Peak Luxury team.Booking is really straightforward and we appreciate being able to speak to the friendly and helpful staff.Staff are prompt and efficient in getting back to us if we have any questions.

name: Offpeakluxury
description: Luxury Breaks: Offpeakluxury offers short hotel luxury breaks at the finest luxury country hotels and boutique townhouses in the UK and Ireland
review_text: Went above and beyond!Our worst nightmare when travelling to the hotel we had pre-booked for our anniversary. A call from Julie delivered the devastating news. The hotel had an outbreak of Noravirus and had cancelled all room bookings for 48 hours. We really were in limbo but for the help of Julie and offpeakluxury. In less than an hour they emailed 2 options of similar packages. I sat with my wife in a coffee shop and we made a decision to go with one of the options. Julie went back and booked it for us, and arranged a refund for the difference. Everything done so swiftly on email including order confirmations and vouchers. In no time we continued our journey and checked in on time to our new hotel.These guys were outstanding and I can’t recommend them enough. If we had booked direct with the hotel we would have met our end on this one. Using a ‘broker’ like offpeakluxury covers you when things go wrong. They do all the work and the moral of this story is don’t leave home without them! A big thank you to Julie and the staff at offpeakluxury for helping us out on the day, for both the speed and professionalism. Outstanding.

name: Offpeakluxury
description: Luxury Breaks: Offpeakluxury offers short hotel luxury breaks at the finest luxury country hotels and boutique townhouses in the UK and Ireland
review_text: Easy to book, great price including evening meal and wine (a package not available elsewhere)

name: Offpeakluxury
description: Luxury Breaks: Offpeakluxury offers short hotel luxury breaks at the finest luxury country hotels and boutique townhouses in the UK and Ireland
review_text: Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms, but the thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff. All of the people are incredibly helpful and generous with their time and advice.

name: Offpeakluxury
description: Luxury Breaks: Offpeakluxury offers short hotel luxury breaks at the finest luxury country hotels and boutique townhouses in the UK and Ireland
review_text: If I could leave 0 star I would  booked a birthday trip away but unfortunately have caught COVID. Tried to cancel even though its within cancelation period to be told I have to pay the admin charge. Sent my PCR results showed my isolation period ends the day after I am suppose to go to the hotel but still will not refund me all my money. Disgusting company making money off people when they can't attend through no fault of thier own. Shall I just attend then and make everyone else sick absolutely disgusting

review_text: Couldn’t have gone to more trouble.  Excellent.

name: MotaBars
description: Established in 1986, The largest, independent, towbar fitting centres in Warwickshire, MotaBars fit towbars to an extremely diverse range of vehicles every day.Many new vehicles use comprehensive electronic control units (ECU) for supervising ABS (anti lock braking) and electronic stability control (ESC, ESP) systems amongst others. The software controlling these systems frequently requires re-programming following the fitment of a towbar.MotaBars use the latest diagnostic tools and software to re-code the vehicles ECU to the manufacturers recommended specification, (identical to a dealer installation).Many local main dealers entrust MotaBars to fit towbars to their new and un-registered vehicles, earning MotaBars a reputation throughout Warwickshire as "the" prestige vehicle towbar fitting centre.Conveniently located, the large workshop has ample parking and a comfortable waiting room. A 15 minute walk from Leamington town centre or 5 minutes to Asda.We have a range of Thule bike racks and roof racks in stock, and a number of Rhino products, but all can be ordered.Towbars supplied include: flange and swan neck towbars, detachable towbars, Towtrust towbars, Westfalia towbars, Witter towbars and Thule towbars. (All towbars are European type approved).Telephone 01926 426382 for a quote! See less

A 15 minute walk from Leamington town centre or 5 minutes to Asda.We have a range of Thule bike racks and roof racks in stock, and a number of Rhino products, but all can be ordered.Towbars supplied include: flange and swan neck towbars, detachable towbars, Towtrust towbars, Westfalia towbars, Witter towbars and Thule towbars. (All towbars are European type approved).Telephone 01926 426382 for a quote! See less
review_text: Fantastic service throughout, I had a remap and parking sensors fitted, supplied and fitted all in one day without any issues and parking sensors colour matched to perfection. Also had a head unit fitted, I bought my own head unit and they just fitted it. It wasn’t as straight forward as it should have been, (my head unit had some issues) but guys at motabars sorted every problem without a fuss, just want to thanks everyone at motabars especially Greg for sorting me out.

review_text: My husband and I are starting caravanning again and needed a tow bar fitted to our Nissan Qashqai. Broad Lane Caravans recommended Motabars in Leamington and we have today had a removable, Thule, tow bar fitted. The service was second to none - Greg and Julian were extremely professional and really knew what they were talking about - you’d expect that though, as they’ve been with Motabars for 28 years. Julian was very patient with me when it came to showing me how it all worked. The tow bar is very heavy (obviously) (I’m a weak female!!) and after he’d shown me how to fit the tow bar, I had a go and bless him, Julian took the weight of it whilst I put it on and took it off. Greg and Julian were great and really made what I thought would be an onerous task today (as I’m not that technically -minded) really easy and comfortable. I would highly recommend Motabars, even if you have to travel a bit further out from your home town, as you won’t be disappointed. First class service.

name: LOBERON
description: Fondata nel 2012, LOBERON è una realtà aziendale in forte crescita non solo in Italia, ma anche in tutta Europa. Il focus dell’impresa rappresenta la vendita di mobili, accessori e arredamento per la casa negli stili country, shabby chic, classico, rustico e mediterraneo. L’obiettivo principale di LOBERON è portare nelle case degli acquirenti prodotti di qualità e design che trasmettano calore, personalità e prestigio.
review_text: Just when I began hoping that the obstacle course (dealing with Loberon) is finally ending - another surprise! I had made peace with the fact that some things were not delivered at all, some were held somewhere in the warehouse without anyone notifying me and some arrived broken - things happen and we learn from our mistakes (my decision - never to order from Loberon again). The broken furniture was picked up relatively quickly (had to wait only for a week) and refund was promised. Good? Not really.Last week (a month after broken stuff was picked up) I had a friend call them inquiring about refund. Response was - it will be issued next week. Good? Not really. Today, when I sent an email to enquire about what does the "next week" mean, exactly, I received a response: "Please send the receipt from post office (I never took it there) and list the items (the order number was in the subject line)." The nightmare continues...My credit card company gave me a temporary refund, but as Loberon has been dragging their heals, it will be reversed this week. I have to, once again, find the money to pay for something I have not had a pleasure of owning. I do realize that Loberon's refund will eventually arrive, but... 4 months of headache, 4 months of money being tied down (we are talking 4 figures), 4 months of unanswered emails, 4 months of frustration and stress...I understand the issues some companies have in the wake of Covid, and Loberon is one of them. However, it seems that while most other firms have recovered, Loberon has not.

review_text: I ordered a console table on 5th April. It has now been a month and the table hasn't even left the warehouse. In addition, i have been charged twice for it - once when i ordered and once when Loberon claim to have shipped it. Customer service is the worst i have ever encountered - emails are just ignored. We have made orders with their key competitors in Italy such as Maison du Monde, Kave Home and Sklum and received much better service so despite some lovely looking products on the website, we would never order from them again and are warning friends against using them also.Edit: it is strange that despite me providing a bank statement clearly highlighting the duplicate charges Loberon continue to deny it. I will have to work with my bank to do a chargeback - more hassle created by poor customer service

name: Nomorobo
review_title: Nomorobo may not be totally on the level
review_text: I use Nomorobo (I pay $1.99/mo.) on my cell phone and also have it through FIOS (included) for my landline. I have always had the feeling that Nomorobo is, and this sounds odd, somehow causing me to receive more nuisance calls rather than less?! It seems like I started getting more unknown calls after signing up with the service, than less, and I wonder if it is so they can show more "value" in their service?

name: Nomorobo
review_text: Nomorobo is a scam company whose services are offered to you by phone service provider verizon, not affiliated. Once you sign up on their website, you have the option to report scam/spam phone calls to your phone. The number that is offered to send these reports to is not owned by nomorobo. Its to a company called Thirty Energy. I know this cause I have answering machine messages from them. Might inform Jim Browning of this so more people can know of this scam. Anyway, they claim there is a mistake on your electric bill and to contact them to correct it. This is a phishing scam to get bank info, names, addresses, income, and more. Do not use this service and do not give them your info.

name: Nomorobo
review_text: most of these companies are not worth the money you pay them

name: Nomorobo
review_title: We are pretty happy with Nomorobo…
review_text: We are pretty happy with Nomorobo installed on our Verizon FIOS landline.  The number of unwanted calls has been reduced to 2-4 a day, down from a dozen or more.  Sometimes I see the name Nomorobo on the Caller ID, and when I answer it is someone I usually would be happy to talk to - how Nomorobo figures this out is beyond me.

name: Nomorobo
review_title: We set up Nomorobo for our Verizon FIOS…
review_text: We set up Nomorobo for our Verizon FIOS line and are now getting more calls, not less.  All calls ring many times, so there is NO evidence that Nomorobo stopped any calls at all.Verizon makes about $20 billion in profit per year, so there is absolutely no excuse for it to not do a lot better about nuisance calls.

name: Nomorobo
review_title: NoMoRoBo has been our main call blocker…
review_text: NoMoRoBo has been our main call blocker for years. Remember it is the scam callers committing the illegal calls and congress and state goverments not writing laws to protect us and an outdated FCC system that allows blocked calls that is the problem.  Now companies just buy 1000 numbers and keep dialing.  I report all that get through.  If other users also report, then we will all get fewer calls as they will block the number when enough people label it as spam.  I get at least 2 a day and sometimes 5 to 10 "blocked" by NoMoRoBo.  With the current FCC system, the line must ring once for the call to be recognized.  I see NoMoRoBo and ignore it.  Set the calls to get the message and not go to your VM.  FREE for cell phones.  Cheap for home phone.  I use a separate service that unmasks most hidden numbers.  Only private lines and lines for abuse shelters and the like should be allowed to block.  No business should be blocked and the fines need to be charged through the provider so they can bill the caller.  There are now providers that specialized in offering the 1000 cheap numbers so they can make the extended warranty call from many lines.  Friends, find methods to tie these people up so it wastes their time.  I say "hold on, I have to let my dog in" and set the phone down.  And tell your senators you want the phone system fixed so businesses can not block numbers and numbers can be sensed before the phone answers.  And they need to sue the phone providers and network providers that knowingly support these crimes.

name: Nomorobo
review_title: I am still getting robo calls everyday
review_text: I am still getting robo calls everyday.  Not nearly as many, but they are still coming daily.

name: Nomorobo
review_text: First few weeks was GREAT. spam calls back again, I mean car warranty calls - seriously????

name: Nomorobo
review_text: Horrible. The calls are now increasing and the only thing customer service tells me is that it's hard for Nomorobo to keep ahead of these telemarketers. Really? Isn't that supposed to be their job???

name: Nomorobo
review_text: I wish I could give it less than 1 star.  It blocks, at most, 1 in 20 or 30 spam calls.  Virtually useless.

name: Nomorobo
review_title: Signed up yesterday and I have received…
review_text: Signed up yesterday and I have received more calls this morning than on any other day.  Junk!!!!

name: Nomorobo
review_title: Robo Calls Are a Bane to Humanity!
review_text: I was getting so many calls per day before I started with Nomorobo. Now, I may get one every couple of weeks or so. The people complaining may be using the free version, which will probably only help so much. I pay a little over $2 a month for almost total peace and quiet.

name: Nomorobo
review_title: The only problem i have with them…
review_text: The only problem i have with them is....if calls are blocked why do blocked callers able to leave messages?

name: Nomorobo
review_text: After many months of calls being blocked, we're finding that very few calls are being blocked now.  We are considering dropping NoMoRobo unless things improve radically in the next 2-3 weeks.  Dec.8.21

name: Nomorobo
review_title: Used this service for 8 months, it never blocked a robocall
review_text: Used this service for 8 months.  Nomorobo was not successful in blocking robocalls, I would still receive 10+ per day.  Each one I would "report" to Nomorobo but the next day I'd get another 10 calls.  This went on for 8 months.  I'm finally done.  This app doesn't work, save your money.

name: Nomorobo
review_title: We only have it for our landline
review_text: We only have it for our landline.  Thank goodness we never signed up for our cell phones.  I'd hate to be paying for such lousy service.  For example:  We got 8 robo calls yesterday and Nomorobo didn't catch any of them.  If they catch one a week, it's a lot.  Even when Verizon marks the call as a spam risk it doesn't catch it.  When it does catch one, it still rings once.  We don't even answer our phone anymore unless we know the number or the caller talks to the machine and it turns out to be the doctor's office or something like that.

name: Nomorobo
review_text: Absolutely horrible customer service and a terribly un user-friendly website

name: Nomorobo
review_text: Terrible.  I get about 5 or 6 spam robo calls every day.  Nomorobo blocks one call every third day or so.  However It still rings when they block it (how i know it's blocking), so even when it works, it doesn't really work all that well.  Lame technology.  Misnomer. Waste of time mostly.

name: Nomorobo
review_title: I thought Nomorobo was a good company. I should have looked here first.
review_text: I signed up my landline for Nomorobo a week ago with high hopes that some of the robo calls would be stopped. Today I received 7 of them and in addition I am now getting a bunch of emails (I had to enter my email address to sign up) from things like a man from Nigeria who wants to give me millions of dollars and a few that are only partially in English. My email was relatively clean before. Coincidence??  I am sorry I signed up and sorry I gave them my real email.

name: Nomorobo
review_text: I signed on for this service thru apple 3 months ago.In that time frame I have received at least 50 robocalls. Nomorobo was able to block 3 of these calls. My biggest mistake was signing on for a year. I should have listened the online reviews.

name: Write My Reviews
review_title: Why not to buy from Currys
review_text: I purchased a new Sony TV from Currys on the 13/06/22 for £1179 with a promotion discount of £100 for handing an old tv, CURRYS order: CUR2221843714.I was offered a free delivery on the 17/06/22, I received a text from dispatch late on the 16/06/22 advising me that a delivery would be between 09:50 am & 13:50 pm.As I'm a single person working I needed to amend the time possibly to late in the day or to a suitable alternative date.Apparently neither, Currys staff member accused me of being a cheap skate for going for a free delivery, which was absolutely unexpected. I raised a complaint and was told it'll take 24 hours to get a response.Not receiving any call back I decided to ring back, the agent told me that Currys doesn't have a Complaint Dept and terminated the call.I rang again the agent wasn't any different as rude as her previous male colleagues.Rude, obnoxious, righteous, arrogant and ignorant.I decided to cancel the purchase, I wasn't prepared to spend £1079 & be insulted in the process by a bunch of marauding imbeciles.Currys staff had strong Indian accent, based in the UK or elsewhere makes no difference to me they've absolutely no manners, as for customer service, none or whatsoever.After years of spending at Currys, sadly this is my last purchase, if you don't appreciate my custom you don't deserve me as a client.

name: Write My Reviews
review_text: Desperately needed too stop smoking. review_text: Booked in for FIVE days from the 20th to the 25th April at a cost of £478,a complete waste of money .  We were very wary on arrival at the state of the building on the outside ,No surprise it was no better on the inside really disappointed with our room outdated furniture and fittings small narrow beds as hard as a rock grubby bedding no curtain's bedside lamp's falling of the wall stained carpets .Wet room crap shower ,tap falling of the sink and cracked basin .  The CHEF got his training at a GREASY SPOON child sized portion's which you could not eat .A full English consisted of 1 Sausage 1 Slice of bacon a Pullet's egg a quarter slice of fried bread half a raw Tomato and about 12 bean's This was supposed to set you up for the day .Evening Meal Ham and Pea soup bulked up with bread tasteless FROZEN VEGETABLES tasteless Gammon was a slice of Bacon all inedible   The good point's the Staff are brilliant and the Comedian on Wednesday evening Andy Oakley the best we have ever seen .    This Hotel want's a deep clean from top to bottom redecorating new crockery cutlery and bedding .    We had a room with a Balcony that the outside has not been cleaned or swept in a long time .  By Friday we had had enough we packed our bags and left .

Arrived at the b&b no answer waited outside no contact eventually the neighbour cam out and informed us that the owner had died some weeks ago and that booking.com were aware. It was our 47th anniversary , there was no dog-friendly accommodation in the area so we had to drive some 5 hours through rush hour traffic to get home. shortening our break and ruining our anniversary. When complaining they offered to book another b&b even though it was yesterday could not get it through to the customer service agent . Shall be closing my booking.com account immediately. Appallling.

We explained the situation that on compassionate grounds they should waiver the extra £125( we had submitted the Cremation ground certificate) but all our appeals to the management through Twitter including Ratan Tata fell on deaf ears and in the end we had to pay £250 to travel back to the UK. Very disappointed with their heartless attitude and poor customer service. Please be careful when booking with Vistara! Think twice. I certainly will not be travelling with them ever again.

name: Thirstymeeples
review_text: Not received refund.This was my first experience with this company, so my atrocious experience may not be indicative of the company as a whole. I received a game as a gift for my Birthday, unfortunately, it was the incorrect version of a game (one I already had). This ofc is our fault not theirs. However trying to return the item turned into a herculean task. As I wanted to support a smaller business I was more interested in trying to organise a swap rather than a refund. I wanted to trade the one I received for the one I wanted (and pay extra if needed). After 3 unanswered emails to the same email address listed here on trust pilot and maybe a dozen phone calls I ran out of time and was forced to return the item via recorded delivery. It has now been 2 months and there has still been no refund, despite another couple of emails and another dozen or so attempts of phone calls which as with my previous attempts all rang out.

review_title: Bath store - Nice place, unfriendly staff.
review_text: Bath store. Nice place, unfriendly staff. Arrived 3 minuets before my slot booked for 11am. Sign on window read "open" whilst door was left ajar. I made my way in and was met by a staff member with a look of contempt on his face. I then made my way into the shop and waited at the till until the same staff member setup the tills. At this point I realise they weren't quite ready to receive members of the public (contrary to the sign on the window) and at no point did he say anything to me while I waited. Then another member of staff joined him and she said to him, "It's not 11 o'clock yet is it?" He replied, "No it isn't" right in front of me... It made me feel like a burden rather than a valued customer.

name: Thirstymeeples
review_text: We have visited thirsty meeples many times and had a great time with attentive staff and yummy food, unfortunately today we were not impressed. The food wasn't great, dry stale bread and unlike previously no one came to ask if we wanted any further drinks. The normal joy of this place is trying out new games which the staff explain how to play. This visit we asked 3 times for staff to help recommend games/tell us instructions and no one did apart from the initial game. We were at the café from 11am until 2pm. We asked at 12pm for assistance and were told that they didn't have time as new people were arriving, we asked again at 1pm and were told that someone would help us shortly. At 1.30pm we asked again as we only had half an hour left and were told we be added to the list. No one came over. Not great service atall.

name: Thirstymeeples
review_title: Bought a limited edition board game…
review_text: Bought a limited edition board game online. Was shipped the same day, arrived the next in perfect condition and packaged as you would want it to be for a limited edition item. Recommended!

name: Thirstymeeples
review_text: Order processed quickly and efficiently. Excellent customer service as well - I accidentally placed the order twice as it appeared it hadn’t gone through the first time. I received an email first thing the next morning from the company proactively checking whether this was an error and then when I told them it was immediately arranging refund.

name: Thirstymeeples
review_text: Extremely helpful and knowledgeable staff, always friendly to talk to. Whenever I've ordered on their website the games have been really well packaged and arrived quickly. I fully recommend!

name: Thirstymeeples
review_title: A single staff member can spoil a day
review_text: One member of staff was in my opinion rude. As a wheelchair user it's difficult to access the shop, so I positioned my chair in the only place possible. I was asked to move it, which I was happy to do if they would tell me where to put it. The reply I got was "the roof". Now, I get this was a joke, however it made me feel like I was a burden and unwanted. These sort of comments are unprofessional, and I won't be returning. Good comedy punches up, it doesn't make those that already struggle everyday to feel bad about themselves. I think it's worth pointing out that this is disability discrimination, as defined on citizensadvice.org which states that "It is disability discrimination if someone is harassing you because of your disability. You may be able to take action about this."Someone is harassing you if you find their behaviour towards you offensive, frightening, degrading, humiliating or in any way distressing. Examples of harassment could involve nicknames, teasing, name-calling, pulling faces, jokes, pranks or any other behaviour which you find upsetting because of your disability. Even if this behaviour is not deliberately meant to hurt you, it may still count as discrimination if you find it upsetting."Another awkward moment occurred when someone brought in food from KFC. Now, its perfectly reasonable to ask him to leave, however, it doesn't require any more than that. Weirdly, the guy asked us all to look at him directly and then said we were literally eating his rent in front of him. Now this is just hyperbole since it makes no difference at all if someone eats in a cafe or eats outside of the cafe to one's income. I understand that it could affect profit if that guy was going to order food, but he wasn't and never would, because the food is overpriced. It really spoiled the atmosphere. This could have been dealt with in a much more pleasant manner by simply asking him to leave. Again, no additional comments, snarky remarks, weird power-tripping staring contests are required.  Renting a game is also expensive, 6 pounds each with a non-refundable deposit is ridiculous.

name: Thirstymeeples
review_text: Great prices in the shop. very competitive. Very friendly staff. Great board games cafe!Will always always come back and buy from them as long as they keep things the same way!

name: Thirstymeeples

review_text: My purchase with Thirsty Meeples went really well. Initially I had a query about something so I contacted them and they replied promptly and satisfactorily.My game arrived packaged really well with a good strong outer cardboard box and inner paper padding. There were no bashed corners or dents to the game box when it arrived which is important to me.The price was also about the best I could find anywhere so cannot ask for anymore. Would be happy to buy from them again and would recommend them to others.

name: TradeSparky
review_text: I recently purchased 3 solar panels from TradeSparky and the service was superb. Someone else on here commented the same that they also initially were very nervous in purchasing from this company based on some of the negative reviews. Then I looked at the dates and realised all the negative reviews were written around the COVID and the lockdown periods , and all the reviews in the past couple of months were fantastic. So I decided to take a chance as their price was very competitive and they had the panels I wanted in stock.I am so glad I took the chance. they communicated with me right through the whole purchasing process and the panels arrive 24 hrs after I ordered them! Absolutely AMAZING service. I wish I had found TradeSparky sooner as I had bought other solar things from "ijo Powers" whose company policy turned out to be to refuse to give ANY form of receipt for your purchase (not even an automated acknowledgement of the online purchase), which I am guessing is because they plan not to honour any form of guarantee ("no proof of purchase, no gaurantee"). I will certainly make future purchases from TradeSparky and can not recommend them enough.

Communication was excellent; conformation of order, notification of dispatch and delivery time all received.  Couldn't be happier!

Every day for a week I contacted them chasing but not one reply eventually got my money back.Why advertise to sell something that you don’t stock ! Totally wasted my time and fed up with explaining to my customer why they hadn’t arrived, beware they don’t stock the items on their website they get your order then try to order it in from wherever they can !

However one item was on back order. Contacted them by email asking them to cancel and refund the missing item. Within an hours of me sending my email it had been acknowledge and I had a refund.I'll certainly use them again.

name: TradeSparky
review_text: would give them a 0 if I canpart of my order was sent incorrectly in 2 different parcels, frist they tried to blame the courier although the courier had delivered as per trackers on both occasions- TradeSparky just sent the wrong items but this went on and on for weeks! now they say items out of stock! last week they said they will issue a refund- nothing received to date!Advertising next day delivery for £6.95, nasty surprise at check out that it is actually  £8.34! you will pay this even though not all items are dispatched the next dayMisleading site, terrible service

name: TradeSparky
review_text: No problems with order.Good prices and delivery.No delivery schedule/timescale by email or account page otherwise would be five stars.

name: TradeSparky
review_title: Absolute shambles, Avoid like the plague!
review_text: Absolute shambles, DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!I ordered a light fitting on 27/12/21 and paid for the 48 hour delivery (they quote £6.95 p&p then sneakily add 20% at checkout so charge £8.34 without telling you!) As it was just before New Year I gave them a bit of slack on delivery times but by 5/1/22 I had still not received it or heard anything so I called to find out what the delay was, as it was urgently needed to replace a broken unit in a holiday let cottage I own and have new guests arriving this weekend. I received an email a couple of hours later saying it 'SHOULD' be with me on Monday 10/1/22 but no guarantee that it would be. Feeling aggrieved and cheated by this, I replied with a request for some form of compensation for the inconvenience this has caused me.A short time later I received an email from Tradesparky stating they had contacted 'Robus' the manufacturer of the light fitting and been told that particular unit is 'Obsolete', they then apparently tried other sources to no avail and issued a refund.Had I not contacted them and then emailed with my dissatisfaction about the unacceptable timescale to supply this item, I would have been waiting another 5 days for a delivery that would never arrive.I have now found a similar product from the same manufacturer on a well known auction site for over 10% less and with free delivery so have ordered from there and will hopefully receive it by Monday 10/1/22. Had I known it was not available from Tradesparky when it should have been delivered several days ago, I could have ordered it from elsewhere and had it in time to fit it before my guests arrive. I have learnt a valuable lesson here and wish I had read the other reviews on trust pilot before I placed an order with this joke of a company as it seems the vast majority of their customers have experienced similar levels of incompetence and lack of customer service.

name: TradeSparky
review_text: Unfortunately Tradesparky appear to be one of those companies that blame Covid for what is in reality extremely poor logistical management. Please be aware that despite claimed delivery times of two working days, they actually did not even review or acknowledge my order for one and a half working days. Consequently in reality it will take eight days for me to receive the order. This means cancelling installers etc.If you cannot fulfill orders within a certain period, then do not state that you can as people rely on these timescales. I will not use this company again and I would urge others to think carefully about doing so if on a tight timescale, as they seem to have a lethargic attitude to fulfilling commitments.

name: TradeSparky
review_title: My experience with Tradesparky  was excellent
review_text: My experience with Tradesparky  has been minimal but however quite successful . Having sequentially ordered four Givenergy inverters and battery storage systems all the items we paid for and delivered as promised on or even before expected on the day as promised . I found the team most helpful and accommodating and above all the prices were good if not the best out there . I find the critics comments on here baffling to say the say the least ie  I cannot find the telephone number !! I ordered the wrong goods  !! what is wrong with people in the UK they always complain but never praise good service . Well done TRADESPARKY . I will use you again

Now I've paid for a sparky for a install with no charger.Order TSL 048200

name: Linxdot
description: Linxdot is a Helium approved, HNT Hotspot manufacturer. Linxdot has been designed & built by a team of experienced engineers and IOT experts who specialise in electronics product design and manufacturing. Our customer support team are always on hand to help if you need to contact them.
review_title: They promised I could get a refund but…
review_text: They promised I could get a refund but they just changed there policy that they don’t do that anymore. This is against EU regulations. There support sucks they don’t respond and let you wait for a reply for a long time and when you reply to there response you need to wait weeks again. Linxdot are scammers!

name: Linxdot
description: Linxdot is a Helium approved, HNT Hotspot manufacturer. Linxdot has been designed & built by a team of experienced engineers and IOT experts who specialise in electronics product design and manufacturing. Our customer support team are always on hand to help if you need to contact them.
review_text: Dear Linxdot,I wrote to you on 8 of June that i need to cancel my order and till today i still dont have any response. I lived in Slovakia and due to war between Russia and Ukraine my family had to move out. I dont live in that place anymore and we are struggling with the living as we are helping out our family from Ukraine. LINXDOT please help me out here. I dont have any other choice, I wont be able to use miner at all, I dont live at the place anymore and suddenly my family end up in financial crisis. My ticket number is 3221.

review_title: Gets the job done, great value!
review_text: For some reason, I couldn't connect my fairphone 3 to it with bluetooth. I just got an error message "Device disconnected". Good thing I had an old tablet that was compatible so I could set up the miner. Otherwise, it sent a beacon and got witnessed during the first day so it's a solid machine that gets the job done! As long as it works, it's perfect. And as you can actually get one, that kind of makes it better than most miners out there. And it's a great value! Might get another one as soon as I find a spot for it.

Luckily, the occupants of my old home were very helpful and it was my fault for assuming that the delivery address should be the same as the billing address.
