name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_title: One of my favourite places to get…
review_text: One of my favourite places to get clothing, the quality is amazing, the designs are the best around and the service is tip top!

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_text: I am buying a lot from Dephect, Tshirts, sweatshirts and prints. The designs are so cool and I am always curious about the new collection. Recently, I had a problem with a print, it got cracky after a few washes, which is unusual. Normally, the prints are high quality and last for years. So I got in contact with Maz from Dephect and I got a quick reply. He offered me a new Sweatshirt for free. Also, he answered my questions about print techniques. Perfect service and cool design makes me a happy customer.

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_text: Had an issue with my first order and an actual person got back to me immediately and replaced the garment. Fantastic customer service.

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_text: Great customer experience. Very helpful when I ordered a product that was sold out. Notified me when it would be back in stock so that I could reorder the product. Prompt email responses in answering any queries. I would order from them again.

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_text: I ordered a Dephect Tee that got held up somewhere along the line in shipping. I reached out to Dephect customer care and somehow – magic, I suspect – they were able to get my parcel moving again and it was with me within the week (even though I'm in Australian and the parcel appeared to be held up in the UK). It made it in time for Christmas, and I couldn't be happier. Thanks to the entire team.

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_text: Great brand and fantastic customer service!! I recently spoke with Maz about an issue with delivery (not their fault I'll add) and he was very helpful. I would recommend 100%. Huge thanks!

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_text: We love this brand, ive buying from them for years and never had a problem, apart from last week order that unfortunately my order arrived and had a small issue due the printing. Ive contact them straight away and Max has helped me with the issue and sent another Tshirt without me asking for. Couldnt believe the efficiency from the Costumer service. Happy with the outcome and for sure I wont stop purchasing from them x

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_title: Sizes are not what they are in North America
review_text: I think this company is great. With cool designs and artists. I’ve gotten quite a few shirts and hoodies. Unfortunately I didn’t know that XL is actually more like a large fit for me and tight. I didn’t think I would be able to return them and reorder for DXL. I wish I now returned them for a looser fit. Now I just have to try and stretch it out. The Canadian fees are pricey with shipping. Hope to order the right size next time.

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_text: I recently ordered a T shirt from Dephect but the introductory discount code didn’t get to me in time for placing my order. I emailed the team once it arrived and they refunded the discount price straight away, my t shirt also arrived within one day. Excellent service and really funky t shirt designs. First Xmas present bought!!! Thanks guys

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_title: Amazing designs & fab to learn about…
review_text: Amazing designs & fab to learn about the artists I accidentally ordered 2 of one design emailed straightaway & sorted no problem. Thank you

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_title: Been getting my T-shirts from these…
review_text: Been getting my T-shirts from these guys for over a decade now and always been on point, good quality Tee’s and they last forever! I’ve stil got ones I brought ten years ago that I still wear and are good!  I ordered three new T-shirts one came with a mark on it emailed them and within hours they emailed me back saying we sent you a new one. Amazing service!

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_text: I've been buying tee shirts from Dephect for over a year now. The quality of the tee shirts is amazing and the designs are beautiful. Whenever I wear one I often get positive comments about the design.As well as the quality of the product and the artist profiles, the customer service is excellent too, with a real personal, yet professional touch.Recently dealt with Maz who was so helpful and really went the extra mile to sort out a technical issue.Highly recommended.

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_text: Dephect's customer service is on point... Placed an order during a 3 for 2 t-shirt sale but accidentally ordered all the wrong size. Messaged Dephect when my order arrived explaining what happened and they sent me another discount code so I could reorder and still get the discount. I was informed I could ship the original order back for a refund, but since I live in the US shipping it back would cost half as much as I paid for the shirts, so instead my friends are gonna get some cool gifts. Quality of the shirts is great, awesome print quality, super clean and crisp. Excited for my correctly sized shirts to arrive so I can match with my friends.

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_text: Awesome and great quality clothing. Customer friendly and great service! (Thanks for everything Maz)Will definitely buy more in the future.

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_title: Had been admiring the fantastic designs…
review_text: Had been admiring the fantastic designs from dephect for a while & finally took a plunge on a range of t shirts. first off fantastic quality material is used for their t shirts. thick and soft, not like high st brands which always feel thin and cheap. the prints on them are not only so unique but thick and very well executed meaning they will survive washes and daily use with ease. thankyou so much for producing excellent clothing

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_text: Can’t recommend Dephect enough! Amazing quality T-shirts; nice quality fabric and also long lasting high definition prints. Super speeding delivery. And top notch customer care (thank you Maz you are the best) Couldn’t really ask for any more. Much love guys, keep up the good work!

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_title: Great unique designs and stellar customer service
review_text: Great unique designs and stellar customer service. One of the shirts I wanted was sold out in my size, so I messaged them to ask about new stock at 7:20am. By 7:35 I already had a reply from Maz confirming it would be back in stock later that week. Delivery was quick and even exchanging items for a different size was a smooth experience.

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_title: First class customer service and great designs
review_text: I recently bought a T-shirt from Dephect as I loved their designs. When it arrived there was a small flaw in the print (very small and not that noticeable). I dropped them a quick photo and email the evening it arrived to point out the issue. The following morning I had an email in my inbox at 8:40am telling me a replacement was on its way and there was no need to return the original and apologising for the issue.First class customer service. The new T-shirt arrived the following day and was perfect.The quality of the material used is good and looks like it will last a while and wear well. I had tried RedBubble before but the quality of their T-shirts seemed to really go down hill with older ones lasting longer than some of the new ones I’d bought. I’ll definitely be buying a load of Tees from Dephect if my first experience is anything to go by.

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_title: Amazing clothing from a team of extremely talented individuals
review_text: At some point, around 10 years ago, I started buying t-shirts from Dephect and since then I haven’t bought one from anyone else.  I’ve worn them all around the world and on at least three continents have had to repeatedly tell complete strangers, where I got my shirt from.  They don’t just deliver what you order, they also deliver high quality wearable art, that nobody else can.  In Europe, Asia and North America, if someone new crossed or crosses my path, I buy them a shirt from these guys, not one I have, but one for them.  That’s how much these things mean to me!  My daughter is 8 now and I just bought her first one for her.  She was delighted that she’s now in not my gang, but theirs.   If anyone wants to be assured of their quality, email me and I’ll send you a pic of my collection, some I lost then bought again, some are 5 - 10 years old, some I have two of.These guys rock and I hope they NEVER stop making clothes for me to wear with pride.

name: Dephect
description: www.dephect.com
review_text: Unique designs from independent artists. Great quality clothing and printing. Excellent customer service. What's not to like? Highly recommended.

name: Vivisalento
description: Il Turista al centro. Pacchetti vacanze All-Inclusive per tutta la famiglia o un'indimenticabile fuga romantica. Vivi un'esperienza indimenticabile in Salento.
review_text: Our trip (family with child) in Porto Cesareo was amazing. The accommodation at Casa La Stera is great and very clean. The owner is really friendly, helpful and supportive, we can just recommend the house. We could park inside and we could reach everything (city center, shops, restaurants, beaches) within few minutes by car. We loved the beaches (e.g.Torre Lapillo), the sea was so crystal clear like in the Caribbean. Hope to see it again next year.

name: guardarian.com
description: The bridge between fiat and crypto worlds for your business. Buy and sell crypto for fiat, offer prepaid cards tied to your clients’ crypto-accounts.
review_title: So I've been trying to order monero on…
review_text: So I've been trying to order monero on changenow trough guardarian for 3 full days. after more than 6 attempts and still the same problem I give up.This is extremely disappointing for a site that sells its speed. Now I will go to another site. The after-sales service is disappointing. apart from canceling the orders in progress, they are not capable of anything.It doesn't matter there are plenty of crypto sites on the internet. I advise against.edit :Warning, I made the mistake of using my girlfriend's account on my computer. This had the effect of blocking my account, according to the after-sales service.Except that in the meantime, I had managed to order with my account and my card, it worked.However, at no time was I informed that my account was blocked and that every order I made would be automatically cancelled. And of course a 5Euros fee applies to each direct debit. I tried again 6 times to order, because the after-sales service replied that I had to try again with my own card on my own account on my own computer.And obviously now I'm going to get scammed out of 5euro per transaction and I have no recourse because I accepted the therms of service. Be really careful, don't get scammed by ChangeNow.IO and guardarian.They are really selective scammers. Don't contact me for try to change my comment. there is no chances, everybody needs to know.

review_text: I used Secret Spa as I'm clinically vulnerable to Covid so was nervous about going to a hairdresser. name: Champlain Valley Organics LLC - Vermont Pure CBD
description: All of us at Vermont Pure CBD pride ourselves on using sustainable and natural methods to grow and transform hemp into healthy products. Through controlling the entire process and treating each step with love and care, we are able to ensure that we produce a superior end product compared to other brands on the market.  We are passionate about sustainability and wellness at every stage, from our fields and greenhouses to the creation of our products. We produce a full spectrum CBD oil using advanced alcohol extraction techniques. We grow all of our hemp on organic Vermont farmland. At Vermont Pure CBD we do everything we can to treat each employee, plant, piece of land, and final product with the care and respect that it deserves. Every day we put our hearts into our entire operation—from crop production and harvesting to the packaging of the final products. We believe that our passion and care can be experienced in each and every bottle we make. Thank you for choosing Vermont Pure CBD as your trusted CBD supplier!Enjoy your wellness!
review_title: We are so happy we came across your CBD…
review_text: We are so happy we came across your CBD Coconut Roll-on!!!!  We found it in a small garden/farm store in Winchendon MA.  We went back for another but they were out of them. And the roll on version is great for me.  Thanks for making an honest product - you have a life time customer!!!!

review_title: I bought products for the second time
review_text: I bought products for the second time. Farmer Joe was extremely helpful and kind. He delivered it to me next day before I had to take a flight..My mother lost a lot of weight due to illness. Since she started using the CBD Tincture 3600mg 3 months ago she stopped loosing weight. She said it increased her appetite. when she run out of the bottles that I got for her, she tried a local brand and didn’t feel the same effect. My father used the Full spectrum capsules-50 mg for 3 months at bedtime. He stopped complaining that he is up all night. I still couldn’t tell if it was the CBD or that he got used to his new ‘home’. When he run out, he started complaining again... I renewed his supply and will keep follow up on it.-Chopstick is working for my son that is very picky about his chopsticks and say that most don’t help him.For my self, I got Bitter Chocolate, I’m taking 2 cubes at a time. Love the taste and the mellow effect.Almost forgot the honey CBD, got it for my husband, he didn’t like the taste. I took over since I actually like the taste. I’m a big fan!!!

review_text: Our older dog has become finicky with food and was refusing to eat etc.  We swapped up his food under our vet's recommendation but he continued to hold off eating until his stomach was upset often resulting in throwing up what he did eat.  He lost a lot of weight  so we called VT Pure CBD and the owner Seth helped us choose their chicken flavored CBD dog treats.  Although there are no studies claiming that CBD increases appetite or helps with nausea in dogs, Seth suggested we give it a try, it can’t hurt.  Wow are we glad we did!  It’s been two weeks of giving him a treat first thing in the morning 15 min before breakfast, the vomiting stopped the first day and he’s starting to put weight back on.  His blood work came back normal from the vet with slightly elevated white cells so we are working with them to treat inflammation in his GI track and they told us to keep doing what we are doing since he’s gaining.  We’ve upped his treats to 1 before breakfast and again at dinner. We are now on a subscription plan for the treats so we don’t run out.  I can’t thank Seth enough for taking our call.

review_title: We booked one night in Wengen from TUI
review_text: We booked one night in Wengen from TUI,  we booked a very nice upgraded more expensive room with a view and balcony and paid company in full and received a confirmation from TUI the next day with the room that we booked. Upon  arrival at the hotel, hotel informed us they were overbooked and we were downgraded into the smallest room on the attic, no view, small window and no balcony. Hotel informed us that this happened to few TUI customers and there was nothing they could do for us. I contacted TUI the next day to ask for partial refund, they said there is nothing they could do because we did not call them from the hotel instead of dealing with hotel directly behind the scenes. I just want to make sure for any future customers to be aware of their business model and there is no recourse or even attempt to help. We cannot do anything because we prepaid in full, I am just glad it was one night and not a ruined longer vacation. We would never use them again and will go through much more known companies. We travel all the time and this is the first time I had to deal with such blatant lack of recourse. Julia

review_title: View or access reservation in Web Portal by reference
review_text: I miss the possibility to see my reservation, conditions and references to the reservation in web portal like in Booking.com or swiss just by using the reference.Except for the email I have nothing as confirmation or reference although I ordered a service.

name: PG tips - Home
review_title: No more buying PG Tips teabags for me!.
review_text: Purchased PG Tips standard teabags for myself and decaffeinated for my partner. Shocked to find the teabags are of that poor quality that the bags begin to disintegrate during stirring -surely this is not right? Then there's those that are unsealed to begin with! I understand Unilever's ethical impact to go biodegradable but in my opinion I strongly believe they have made a huge mistake by taking this route and sadly they will lose sales. If I wanted loose tea I'd stick to tealeaves! Sorry but I definitely won't be buying PG Tips teabags again.

name: PG tips - Home
review_title: Bought the big pack of 1100 tea bags.
review_text: Bought the big pack of 1100 tea bags.Every cup of my tea has tealeaf at the bottom.

name: PG tips - Home
review_text: Very poor quality now.Last 2 boxes have had teabags still joined in pairs. Unable to split without breaking. Also always finding tea leaves in cup as bags break. No quality control and no interest from customer service when you complain. Been a lifelong PGtips drinker. Maybe no longer.

name: PG tips - Home
review_title: PG Tips pyramid tea bags burst!…
review_text: PG Tips pyramid tea bags have now been pun so called biodegradable paper ( I thought paper was biodegradable anyway) now probably 75% of the bags burst. If I want tea leaves in my cup, I’ll buy loose tea thankyou. I’m off to Yorkshire Tea.

name: PG tips - Home
review_text: So disappointed in the biodegradable bags they split in the cup when stirring, a lot of them were already split in box !! Tasteless,  definitely be sticking to Tetley a lovely brew !

name: PG tips - Home
review_title: New Biodegradable packaging Biodegraded before use!! Producing more waste cos tea no good!
review_text: I am so fed up of pg now...New biodegradable boxes are always ripped & fifth of bags ripped since no plasticWas only tea i like but since they got rid of plastic packaging boxes are always ripped open so who knows when il find ants or someot worse crawl out.... every box at the seam opened and pack bought today... 40 out of 240 teabags were ripped in corner, open... no wonder so much loose tea in box. Absolute rubbish. Not eco friendly if ive just bought a load of unusable rubbish!! If i wanted loose tealeaves id buy them! Biodegradable before use! Since pg dont put plastic on boxes.. are always open, this one - when lifted flap found back completely open, lotsa open teabags, tealeaves everywhere! So checked every one. 40 out of 240 teabags are ripped open!!! Never buying pg again!! MORE waste since went eco!!Bottom of box no. L20645A13215:44 bbe date 8/2023

name: PG tips - Home
review_title: Quality gone downhill like the rest of this country.
review_text: They have definitely made cutbacks somewhere. Their tea has tasted lie pi$$ water for a few months now. I'm sticking to Yorkshire te from now on.

name: PG tips - Home
review_text: Tasteless and weak tea. Just metalic taste it has got. 3 years ago I like this tea but now I'm not going to buy it again. I bought 2 boxes of PG tips and had to throw them.

name: PG tips - Home
review_text: The customer service from PG Tips (Unilever) was excellent. Yes I had a problem with the new biodegradable bags (PG Tips are to be applauded for helping the environment) but this was very quickly resolved.  They sent a really nice letter and a voucher to cover the cost.  Even if a product or service is bad is usually how it handled that counts.  Sometimes things go wrong but it matters how they are put right.

name: PG tips - Home
review_text: Tea bags are so weak, tea bag splits in cup while you stir your tea, this is a second large box of 240 we bought & having the same problem. Not at all happy.

name: PG tips - Home
review_title: PG Tips taste has changed - No taste now!
review_text: I used to drink PG Tips tea until two years ago and its flavour was nice. I stopped it because its flavour changed to a vey bland tea with almost no or weak taste. I stopped buying it. Recently I bought 3 boxes of PG Tips tea bags to see if it has improved or not. To my disappointment I find that the tea has no taste at all, it is like drinking coloured water.I wrote to Unilever via it's PG Tips web site. The response I received was not very helpful at all.

name: PG tips - Home
review_text: The tea has changed and unfortunately it didn't agree with me. After having a few cups I actually felt sick. This happened a few times before I realised it was the tea! I don't like the new triangle shaped bags, maybe there's some kind of plastic in it, so I'll try loose tea instead.

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_title: Swift handling of Client Complaints and reviews
review_text: This company has not fulfilled any of its obligations and cost me £750. I was expecting a refund and an apology for the way I have been treated. Swift’s response is to inform the police and instruct solicitors for deformation for writing open honest reviews. Just to note swift have changed there original reply to my review to remove inaccuracies and false claims. I have informed Trustpilot of the situation.Update - I have asked Swift to inform police as I have done nothing other than request money owed to me and written a review on their Customer services. Yes I am Richard Martin from Biggleswade and I have given 3 reviews. This is what you can look forward to when instruct this company.

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_text: Beware of this Company and positive reviews. The same Person has provided 15 good reviews about this company 'strange' to say the least. Still not received a penny and company will not communicate in any way.Court action is the only way forwards and if you have been treated like me suggest you do the same ????

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_title: Swift Resolution has been a Game Changer
review_text: Swift Resolution has been a game-changer for our business. We have previously suffered clients who despite being given the service and deliverables did not pay on time,  and some did not at all. We have incurred significant costs by extended credit to companies that are uncredit-worthy and suffered the indignity of having to write off bad debts. A chance call with Swift Resolution changed all that.....Terms and Conditions have been tightened. Credit checks are carried out rapidly before we take on clients, and debts are chased relentlessly. The results have all had a positive impact on our cash flow and their fee is more than agreeable given their success in the recovery of debts. I cannot recommend Swift Resolution more highly.

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_title: Dealing with Marie who never returns my…
review_text: Dealing with Marie who never returns my phone calls or updates me on the portal! I have not received a penny even though part of the debt has been recovered!

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_title: After chasing a debt I was owed for the…
review_text: After chasing a debt I was owed for the best part of three years I got in contact with Swift Resolution. The team were extremely helpful and talked me through the best route to pursue. After six months they had managed to get the full sum recovered. I cannot recommend them enough, the team are polite and hard working and keep you upto date on what is happening behind the scenes. I spoke to Chelsea who is part of their Collections Team, and she was absolutely fantastic.If you are struggling to get back money that is owed to you, these guys are great!

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_title: From start to successfully getting the…
review_text: From start to successfully getting the owed monies was fast and effective, many thanks.

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_text: Being able to use swift resolution was a huge blessing from the minute of first contact to the end of getting my money back from a personal debtor.Very professional staff that put effort into their roles , good and prompt communication via phone / email   , and there is also portal access to view how the payments are going.  As someone with a mental health issue also , I just love how understanding and warm they have been and times they went an extra mile for my requests because it really does allow you to feel that sense of hope ! I know my money would be absolutely unrecoverable without them Im so so pleased

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_title: Eviction and partial debt collection of…
review_text: Eviction and partial debt collection of tenant who was non-rent paying and made a complete mess of our small property successfully achieved by Swift……. Just in time for the property to be refurbished ready for Ukrainian refugee family who arrive next week.

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_text: Used this company to collect a rent debt of over 4K from my ex tenant. They promised a no win no fee service so I gave them a go. They managed to collect part of the debt of 1k initially, then no more luck after a few months trying. So they contacted me to tell me the normal collection service does not seem to work, the next step would be legal procedure which they have to use a solicitor and I will have to pay fees. I then decided not to use their solicitors and I am happy to pay them the commission 15% of the amount they have collected. However to my shock, they came back stating I have to continue to use their legal procedure, otherwise they would charge 15% of the whole debt. I disputed and complained but they were so rude and did not bother to read my points but simply saying this is their terms. Please note that this company is not a legal firm , they are just a debt collector so if they fail to collect the debt without legal procedure , that is the end of their service. So they kept all my 1K money and sent me a bill to charge 15% of the 4k, and they did not return a penny to me to date, not even as per their bill. Another rouge trader, I have to take legal action to get my money back. Avoid, dont waste your time and money on them, use a proper solicitor or apply to small claim court yourself!

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_title: I’m really pleased to finally have my…
review_text: I’m really pleased to finally have my case settled and my money refunded after years of trying! Swift are really helpful, friendly and made every step very clear, I’ve had great communication from them and have finally been paid the money I was owed!Thank you.

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_text: Very happy with the service I received from Swift Resolution. Got me the money I was owed and saved me a lot of stress.Would be very happy to use them again (but hope I am never again in the situation where I need to).

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_text: My experience was not just positive but they really exceeded my expectations by going the extra mile. And been super flexible . Highly recommend.

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_text: First class service. I was owed money on professional fees from three or four years ago and I was clearly not going to receive anything from the debtor. Chelsea was superb in getting the matter resolved much more quickly than I had expected.

name: Swift Resolution
description: Commercial Debt Recovery Specialists with over 20yrs in house experience. Free Pre-action appraisal, same day instruction.     0808 145 1886
review_text: Marie was dealing with my evection case and told me they have sent the writ of possession to the court and the court is taking longer due to covid backlogs.After two months still no progress.Contacted them again and they told me the writ will be back in 14 days.A month after the 14 days I contacted them again and this time it was a new story and they wanted a further £500.So waited 6 months and got nothing done!!!And not refunded my original payment of £246.No writ was ever sent to the court.TOTAL SCAMMERS AVOID YOU WILL LOSE TIME AND MONEY!!!

name: Brass bee Ltd
description: https://www.brassbee.co.uk/ Brass bee's unique door knockers are all cast from either solid Brass or iron and then polished to give the door knocker the perfect finish to suit any style of house. Suitable for upvc, composite and wooden doors and available in over 10 finishes. Brass Bee is a family run business launched by husband and wife Jamie and Victoria Reid. The small side- line venture was started in 2019 which has now grown into a worldwide brand selling unique door knockers, designed by the couple, to happy customers around the world.  Their journey began with their first and most popular brass bee knocker. They designed the bee with Jamie’s Manchester roots in mind and knowing that bees were becoming ever more popular within home interiors. “We began with only two finishes - brass and nickel, today these are still our most popular items however after market research we found there to be need to expand our range which now includes bronze, heritage brass, black, rose gold, pewter and many more – they’ve all proven popular. Soon after this we launched our shells, hares, hearts, paws, dragonfly and the newest additions of a ring bee and honeycomb bee, created by the couple.” At the start of it all Jamie was juggling his full-time job as an IT technician in the Royal Air Force, alongside Brass Bee. He’d work late every night sorting, packing and making parcels dispatch ready. Soon it was apparent that they needed to employ staff to package and dispatch the items to provide a more efficient service. “This is when we took the big leap to hand this part of the business to our logistics team, who are also working round the clock to get our items delivered.” “Many of our customers uploaded images of their revamped doors to Instagram, which gave us lots of content to help grow our page to its current 31,000 followers, which helped spread the word of Brass Bee. This has led to both Victoria and me quitting our jobs to continue the growth of Brass Bee into an even bigger brand and global success.   Our copyrighted designs are unique to Brass bee so you can rest assured that your Brass bee door knocker will stand out from the rest. SHOP DOOR KNOCKERS SHOP DRAWER KNOBS SHOP DOOR NUMBERS SHOP HOMEWARE SHOP HARDWARE
review_text: Fantastic service, My Bee knocker arrived very quickly & is absolutely beautiful & I can’t wait to see it on our new front door !

description: https://www.brassbee.co.uk/ Brass bee's unique door knockers are all cast from either solid Brass or iron and then polished to give the door knocker the perfect finish to suit any style of house. Suitable for upvc, composite and wooden doors and available in over 10 finishes. Brass Bee is a family run business launched by husband and wife Jamie and Victoria Reid. The small side- line venture was started in 2019 which has now grown into a worldwide brand selling unique door knockers, designed by the couple, to happy customers around the world.  Their journey began with their first and most popular brass bee knocker. They designed the bee with Jamie’s Manchester roots in mind and knowing that bees were becoming ever more popular within home interiors. “We began with only two finishes - brass and nickel, today these are still our most popular items however after market research we found there to be need to expand our range which now includes bronze, heritage brass, black, rose gold, pewter and many more – they’ve all proven popular. Soon after this we launched our shells, hares, hearts, paws, dragonfly and the newest additions of a ring bee and honeycomb bee, created by the couple.” At the start of it all Jamie was juggling his full-time job as an IT technician in the Royal Air Force, alongside Brass Bee. He’d work late every night sorting, packing and making parcels dispatch ready. Soon it was apparent that they needed to employ staff to package and dispatch the items to provide a more efficient service. “This is when we took the big leap to hand this part of the business to our logistics team, who are also working round the clock to get our items delivered.” “Many of our customers uploaded images of their revamped doors to Instagram, which gave us lots of content to help grow our page to its current 31,000 followers, which helped spread the word of Brass Bee. This has led to both Victoria and me quitting our jobs to continue the growth of Brass Bee into an even bigger brand and global success.   Our copyrighted designs are unique to Brass bee so you can rest assured that your Brass bee door knocker will stand out from the rest. SHOP DOOR KNOCKERS SHOP DRAWER KNOBS SHOP DOOR NUMBERS SHOP HOMEWARE SHOP HARDWARE

Soon after this we launched our shells, hares, hearts, paws, dragonfly and the newest additions of a ring bee and honeycomb bee, created by the couple.” At the start of it all Jamie was juggling his full-time job as an IT technician in the Royal Air Force, alongside Brass Bee. He’d work late every night sorting, packing and making parcels dispatch ready. Soon it was apparent that they needed to employ staff to package and dispatch the items to provide a more efficient service. “This is when we took the big leap to hand this part of the business to our logistics team, who are also working round the clock to get our items delivered.” “Many of our customers uploaded images of their revamped doors to Instagram, which gave us lots of content to help grow our page to its current 31,000 followers, which helped spread the word of Brass Bee. This has led to both Victoria and me quitting our jobs to continue the growth of Brass Bee into an even bigger brand and global success.   Our copyrighted designs are unique to Brass bee so you can rest assured that your Brass bee door knocker will stand out from the rest. SHOP DOOR KNOCKERS SHOP DRAWER KNOBS SHOP DOOR NUMBERS SHOP HOMEWARE SHOP HARDWARE

The only thing is that it wold be so great to be able to get the emails in english and not dutch, as it is a lot of work to translate the emails and bills :)

name: Greenchoice
description: Greenchoice is de klantvriendelijkste energieleverancier van Nederland, helpt je met energie besparen en zelf groene stroom opwekken. Maak de aarde groener.
review_text: Dishonest, lying scam artists. Ex-pat from UK that moved to NL. Frequently overcharged on my consumption, 2 person household yet somehow my 'consumption' was equivalent to an 8 person. Took money without my authorisation via Direct Debit for a 'final bill' of €1500, despite already paying €2200 in cumulative costs. This is for 2 people, for 10 months in a rented apartment. Absolutely INSANE OVERCHARGING. "You only pay for what you consume". Absolute bull****. You pay for what the 'smart meter' says (read inbetween the lines here, EVERYTHING is ESTIMATED, NOT ACTUAL CONSUMPTION).Scam artists. Had to call ABN Amro to reverse the final bill. DO NOT USE GREENCHOICE.

name: Greenchoice
description: Greenchoice is de klantvriendelijkste energieleverancier van Nederland, helpt je met energie besparen en zelf groene stroom opwekken. Maak de aarde groener.
review_text: Quite a bad experience because they talked me into a 5 year contract with aggressive telemarketing in which they promised a lot of discounts. Totally missed the length of the contract because the sales guy does everything to divert your attention to the deal-length. Wouldn't recommend this company to anyone appreciating an honest service.

name: Greenchoice
description: Greenchoice is de klantvriendelijkste energieleverancier van Nederland, helpt je met energie besparen en zelf groene stroom opwekken. Maak de aarde groener.
review_title: Bad customer service and unreliable billing system
review_text: I used greenchoice for gas and energy for a year, I regularly updated my meter readings when they asked me to and still paid the same monthly fixed fee of 38€. At the end of my contract, I gave my meter readings the day I left the house. Yet, they sent me an email a day later asking me to resubmit my meter readings, as if a ghost had changed them since. Obviously I could not, and they likely "estimated" my consumption, as written in their mail if no new meter readings were submitted. About a week later, I receive the final bill of 147,81€! A very nice "estimation" from greenchoice. I contacted them through whatsapp, as indicated on their website, to seek explanation about the final bill. I received no response.

name: Greenchoice
description: Greenchoice is de klantvriendelijkste energieleverancier van Nederland, helpt je met energie besparen en zelf groene stroom opwekken. Maak de aarde groener.
review_text: What a terrible service!Asked me for my meter reading more than a week after I already moved out of the apartment because they couldn't read the smart meters from their end. They were informed about the ending of my contract a month in advance, but they had to wait till I no longer have access to the apartment to tell me that they can't get the reading from the smart meter. Why is that even my problem that they can't read the smart meter?In the email, I was ask to put the reading in Mijn Greenchoice. I logged in and they already blocked my rights to provide the meter reading. Their customer service asked me to send them the reading through email, which I did but received no response. I then got another email that was exactly the same as the first one.Terrible experience!

name: Greenchoice
description: Greenchoice is de klantvriendelijkste energieleverancier van Nederland, helpt je met energie besparen en zelf groene stroom opwekken. Maak de aarde groener.
review_text: OPLICHTERS!!!!Greenchoice took over Qurrent and Qurrent sent me an email that it stays all the same. I payed 5 euros a month for the garage where I used only light. Then greenchoice started sendng me invoices on 31 euro a month for the garage where ongebruikelijke kosten were 27 euros a month!!!More costs than I spend for elecy in my house!!!THIEVES.I CANCELLED THEM!

review_title: Alan Yates Music to the rescue.
review_text: I recently received a Ukulele Banjo from a friend of mine who is in his nineties and registered blind.He had a problem with one of his tuning pegs and due to his poor sight, he lost a couple of parts for re-assembly.I sent the tuner to Alan Yates Music, who took the trouble of finding a suitable replacement nut, who then promptly sent the tuner back to me so I could reinstate it on this chaps instrument. My thanks to Alyson and Alan Yates for taking the trouble to help this elderly man out, which in essence, saved him a lot of money as a complete set of new tuners would have been necessary.

name: Alan Yates Music
description: Online seller for Music gear, Instrument care service, Entertainers and Tuition
review_text: I can thoroughly recommend Alan Yates music for their helpfulness, speed of service and their range of top quality products. And if you need any advice on instruments or musical accessories, they really know their stuff. Thank you Alan Yates Music.

name: Alan Yates Music
description: Online seller for Music gear, Instrument care service, Entertainers and Tuition
review_text: When my recent ebay purchase, (a Gibson banjo uke) arrived I wasn’t surprised to find it needed a few adjustments to suit my personal preference and style of playing. To do this I ordered a part from Alan Yates music ebay shop, the part arrived quickly and it included a business card and website link. I was delighted to discover online that Alan had experience as a musician specifically banjo uke and was also a skilled instrument repair / restorer. I requested a quote and got a quick response with an estimate of cost and time for turnaround that was agreeable to me. It made sense to hand over my vintage instrument to someone with experience and knowledge than to bungle about with it myself.  I had a discussion with Alan who took the time to listen to me and who gave advice and shared his extensive knowledge on the matter. We agreed a schedule of work to be done and I felt reassured knowing my uke was in very capable hands. The turnaround was within the timeframe we agreed and the costs were within the initial estimate. I was given a discount for my ebay purchase that was deducted from my bill automatically.  At every step Alan and Alyson were available to answer any questions I might have.  I’m just the average joe, uke player , nothing special , but I feel that I got 5 star treatment from Alan Yates music.  I had checked out the reviews for AY Music and the positive feedback I read clinched the deal for me to hand over my uke and put my trust in them to do the work. If like me you are checking out the reviews, know that I have had exceptionally good customer care and communication, the work carried out was perfect and just what I asked for and the cost was itemised and very reasonable.Thank you Alan and Alyson at Alan Yates MusicMike

review_text: When you have a rare and fabulous instrument that needs attention, it's important that you leave it in a pair of more-than-capable hands. Alan Yates Music provide and outstanding level of musical meticulousness, knowledge, know-how and sage advice. I was over the moon with the results.

review_text: SAVE YOUR MONEY!A very unethical clinic,  Over priced and inappropriate advice given, the treatment was dreadful and my whole face was so badly bruised I couldn’t go anywhere for nearly two weeks, he completely over charges and is a sales person getting you to buy more and more that does absolutely nothing, I literally spent over £4k and I saw no change at all, he kept telling me to go for another treatment and spend more money but I was not happy.I made a compliant via email and phone to be ignored, they didn’t reply then blocked my telephone number, I’ve never been to anyone so unprofessional in my life!I have now forwarded my complaint to The Care Quality Commission and then plan to take them to trading standards, my advice stay away!!

review_title: Great results of Sculptra butt lift
review_text: Great results of Sculptra butt liftI'm so pleased with the Sculptra butt lift results. One year after hearing about the Sculptra butt lift, I decided to find a clinic that offer the treatment.and Dr Ayoubi came up as an expert in this treatment. I was a little nervous about the price of the procedure because I knew I might need a few sessions in the butt area to get the results I desire, especially that i cannot have BBL because I hardly any fat. I went ahead with the treatment, which was quick and easy. I noticed the improvement after the first session, but then gradually after the second session and over the next few weeks my butt got plumper. It looks more full and lifted.  I highly recommend Sculptra butt for people who dot want surgery or do not have much fat for a BBL. Dr Ayoubi and his team had really looked after me from start to finish.

review_text: I had the CO2 laser procedure done 3 weeks ago by Dr Ayoubi and I am so pleased with the results. To be honest, I was scared at the beginning because of what I saw and read on the internet about CO2 laser. In my case, the treatment went very smoothly and I had redness on my face only for 4 days. The procedure was pain free and now I have very smooth skin with no pigmentation and no sun damage spots any longer. For many years I have had damaged skin because I never used sun block before, but now it is all gone and thanks to Dr Ayoubi. I highly recommend his CO2 treatment.

review_text: I couldn’t be happier with my experience and results from Dr Ayoubi and all at The London Medical & Aesthetic Clinic. From the initial consultation and advice I felt fully confident I was in the right hands and all the staff are so friendly and helpful. Dr Ayoubi advised that a combination of filler and Botox would give me a better result to improve my frown lines, rather than just Botox alone, which was the first time anyone had suggested this to me and I’m over the moon with the result. The aftercare is also fantastic, you really feel looked after and confident your in safe hands. Couldn’t recommend highly enough!

review_text: I had Co2 Laser by Dr Ayoubi and I am so happy with the results my hyperpigmentation and wrinkles have gone fully. My whole experience from the first consultation has been more than pleasant. I have suffered with hyperpigmentation and dark spots for quite sometime now, and was concerned that I would never find anything to treat my skin or make it look less noticeable. However, I am seeing significant improvement with the skin texture, my hyperpigmentation is non existent. Never thought I’d have this level of improvement by one treatment. Very grateful to have found Dr Ayoubi. Highly recommend his team at LMA Clinic they were extremely helpful, friendly and professional.

review_text: Fantastic Smartlipo experience and results. Mr Ayoubi and his team at LMA Clinic are fantastic and extremely professional. I was supported by several members of the team and they made me feel that they knew how important this was to me. I went to work 2 days later and to the gym in 10 days. I like what I see now thanks to Mr Ayoubi and his team.

review_text: Ordered on the 18th and had to chase up on the 29th and the 30th, unfortunately didn't get a response until I stated I would raise a dispute for fraudulent activity and all of a sudden they got sent. The best bit about the order was how prompt Royal Mail were as for over £90 they are a far worse than the cheap temporary ones I got from Amazon. Not sure what would off been worse, not receiving anything or the fact this company has the audacity to call these luxury. To compare the ones from here were supposed to be 1500gsm and the Amazon ones were 550gsm yet you would argue this to be the other way round. Going straight in the bin as I refuse to pay out any more by sending these back and restock fees etc.. Purchase at your own risk but be prepared for an inferior product which is barely fit for purpose.

review_text: Thanks to PetsPyjamas, they have organised for me to enjoy a luxury holiday with my humans.  I'm a nosey, friendly cocker spaniel who hates to be left behind when my humans take a break away from home and so when my human spotted PetsPyjamas she thought she'd try it out.  My owner wasn't disappointed with the booking service (which she messed up) but my human's error was spotted quickly by the team and they patiently and efficiently sorted everything out so that we would get the well earned break we are hoping for.  I can't wait for the walks and the pub food - I'm particularly good at observing and guarding when there is food about!

We paid extortionate amount for one week £6,500 expecting very high end and now receiving £600 compensation which WILL NOT be budged.We are so so disappointed as this trip was paid for by our 83 year old mother for the family. Pets Pyjamas were who we booked through who used Sykes Cottages as a third party.

review_text: We booked through Pets Pyjamas about 4 years ago and had a good experience.  However, we booked a cottage through them for the Easter school holidays and were left very disappointed.  When we booked they were extremely helpful and we were very excited.  Unfortunately, we all came down with Covid 2 days before we were due to travel.  I contacted our Pet Concierge and informed them and was under the impression we would be able to rebook.  However, after numerous e-mails to the contact I had been given, I eventually received a reply several weeks later to say that we would could not rebook and would not receive any money back because we cancelled too late.  I was also told that our contract was with the accommodation provider and not them.  They were very unwilling to help.  Although it says in the terms and conditions that they explain that the contract is with the accommodation in your confirmation e-mail, there was no such explanation in the e-mail I received.  We were left very disappointed and upset by their lack of help.  It felt like they were happy to help us book, and take full payment but after this we didn't matter.  Beware!

Shop the best deals on 1000s of chic pet accessories and 100s of fabulous pet-friendly holidays.PetsPyjamas Shop:The PetsPyjamas shop is an online Marketplace for Pet Suppliers around the UK and Europe to sell their products directly to customers. PetsPyjamas do not own or physically hold all stock sold through our Accessories shop. Refunds, exchanges and order processing are all managed by the suppliers directly.PetsPyjamas Travel: PetsPyjamas Travel is an online travel agency (OTA). PetsPyjamas Travel has a Concierge Service that assists customers and their pets looking to travel to the most dog friendly destinations in the UK and Europe. PetsPyjamas research and book for customers but do not own or manage any of the properties listed on the site.Please note that reviews on Truspilot should reflect the PetsPyjamas service provided, rather than the product purchased or property booked.
review_text: The guys at pets in pjs have been great! Not only did Jodie respond prompted to my enquiry and follow up questions but she also took time out to talk me through it all before the booking which gave me extra peace of mind! I haven't booked anything for the last 4 years ( due to covid)  so the experience was a bit alien and made me a bit anxious. But she was very helpful and put me at ease!!! Saying that I am very excited about our upcoming break!!!

review_text: I received my Clear'N'Collect garden rake today, which is for a gift. It appears to be very sturdy, well designed and fit for purpose, and I am delighted with it, as I am sure the recipient will be also.  However, there were problems with the courier service.  The suppliers were very proactive in pursuing the courier, even to the extent of promptly issuing a second item when the first one could no longer be traced in the courier's depot.  I would have no hesitation in recommending this company, as their customer service is paramount and truly excellent.

name: Ultimateaddons
description: Motorcycle & bike waterproof Smartphone mount specialists based in the UK developing unique mounting solutions for Apple Samsung Smartphones.
review_text: Great phone mount!So this is the first phone mount I bought for my CB500X bike. Of course I found a lot of other good phone mount and I try to find one that could match my criteria, like:- Solid- Not too much sensitive to vibrations- Dust and water resistant, but still can use the screen- Can be used with my old Samsung S7 but could still be used with other phone if I change it in the future.My need is mostly using my phone as a GPS as my first use.So while I tryingf to find the best option for me, I found someone mentioning this phone mounts with a lot of good comments. I have check online and take the chance to buy the universal fit option (All samsung) with the accessory bar option.Once received, installing the accessery bar option was pretty easy.I got some issue with the casing, not because of the product buyt because of ny phone size with is smaller than the casing, which make it float inside the casing. No big deal, I use the foam that comes with the phone mount, did a beautiful shapre around my phone and put that inside the casing and voila! My phone no longer float and it works great! I have tested on the road and it works fine. I am really happy with this and it worth the money, the quality is really good.

name: Gumtree
review_text: I had some spare topsoil after making changes to my garden so advertised it free on Gumtree. Within a few days I had 3 enquiries and the soil went off to happy recipients.

name: Gumtree
review_title: Really useful and easy to use.
review_text: Really useful local market place which is easy to use and often results in a successful sale. The app is great too. You can post plenty of pictures and there is enough room for a thorough description. All,in all I am very pleased.Not really a Gumtree problem, but have had a few scammers trying their luck. I block them but cannot work out how to report them (their profiles) to Gumtree as possible fraudsters. Would really like a “report” option. The “I’m not local, can we do PayPal and the courier service” one and the “can you email outside Gumtree” type are really common at the moment.I would also like to see easily how people have rated me as a seller.

name: Gumtree
review_title: All Gumtree is interested in is getting…
review_text: All Gumtree is interested in is getting you, the customer, to pay to promote your item in the forlorn hope that Gumtree actually has “interested” customers. In all honesty, the market has better routes to gaining sales of unwanted items and rather than waste your time, use them and avoid Gumtree at all costs.

name: Gumtree
review_text: Very quick response and offer. Full asking price paid without any hassle and deal concluded within hours.

name: Gumtree
review_text: User friendly website. Easy and secure way to proceed with contacting a seller and arranging everything else. Will definitely use Gumtree again. Thanks.

name: Gumtree
review_text: Good service,  regular updates, just good around

name: Gumtree
review_text: It was a great experience.Lain is an absolutely great guy.He has given me free double bed and also delivered at home without any delivery charges.He has a very big heart.Thanks a lot

name: Gumtree
review_title: This website owned by ebay is a scam…
review_text: This website owned by ebay is a scam (in my opinion) 2 of my adverts have been removed that were apparently against their terms and conditions, so you're allowed to sell Budgies and Cockatiels but not Lovebirds which are pretty much the same, so don't allow us to post the advert and pay the fees, but no they gladly take your money then immediately after remove the advert, if you ask for a refund via chat they disconnect you, easy money, thank you very much gumtree for the bad service after years of me paying for featured adverts.

name: Gumtree
review_title: Positive resource for recycling unwanted items
review_text: Easy to post an ad, Messages makes it easy to communicate with potential buyers/sellers, and my experience has been very positive in selling items on the platform. More spam emails recently, but that’s inevitable and impossible to prevent, I guess. The opportunity to highlight ads through payment obviously assists the sustainability of Gumtree, and the costs seem to me very fair relative to other platforms of a similar type. All things considered, a very positive resource for recycling unwanted items.

review_text: When I installed your OSPW on my Sram Rival it could not get the smallest gear. I wrote to you and you said sometimes a spacer between the deallieur and the hanger are needen and you sent those to me.The thing with the spacer (2mm) in that place is that the bolts that secure the derrallieur no longer fix it tightly and my mechanic considers it very risky since with the usual vibrations the derralieur can easilly fall and cause a lot of damage or even an accident.I am still waiting of a feasable solution.

name: Nova Ride
description: French high-end carbon and titanium bike components designer since 2016. Thanks for your reviews!
review_text: The pulley wheels itself are nice but they are smaller in diameter and thicker than the SRAM Rival Etap ones.  During the installation, the replacement bolt for the bottom pulley does not flush to the reset housing and the upper pulley replacement bolt is to large.  Because of the difference in the size of the pulley wheels, I have to remove one link from the chain. Despite numerous fine tuning to the drive train, the derailleur is still having difficulty to shifting from 9 to 8 and 10 to 9 as well as slight rubbing feeling on the puddles upon installation.  Tech request has been made and waiting for the response.

review_text: I don't know how people can drive without taking a proper course (this one, for example). I've learned a lot with Aceable, and it unexpectedly felt like the cultural studies for me as an immigrant (the rules of the road, driving culture/habits, and even roads and cars are quite different from those in my country). I wasn't actually required to take it due to my age but I am very glad that I did. They make it very easy for you to prepare for the exams and driving. Thanks a lot, Aceable.

name: Din Bilpartner
description: Din Bilpartner er en landsdækkende kæde af frie værksteder, der servicerer og reparerer stort set alle biler, uanset alder og mærke. Kæden blev grundlagt i 1985 og er dermed Danmarks ældste frie værkstedskæde. Vi tager løbende kurser og efteruddannelser, rydder op på værkstedet og køber nyt udstyr, så vi kan tage hånd om din bil hurtigt og godt. Faktisk skal du gerne føle, at bilen allerede er lavet, når du har afleveret den hos os.Find dit lokale Din Bilpartner værksted på www.dinbilpartner.dk

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: Excellent company with excellent customer service. I hired a car for 4 days but took it back after 3 days not expecting or wanting a refund but was given one without even asking. The price you pay is all in with no hidden expenses like other well known companies.The car had a few “dings” in it but who cares! A newish car that ran very well and it was in group A. Use this company as they are the best in the Canaries 👍👍😁!

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_title: Best car rental company out there
review_text: Best car rental company I ever rented from! Great staff, great cars, easy and straight forward pick up and drop off process, no hassle no stress no annoying upsells or hidden fees. Thank you guys!

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: THE GOOD BITS:  Hired Fiat 500 EV at Fuerta airport on a Saturday afternoon (!!!)  Car was clean and working really well.  Excellent service from the overworked staff too.  Later in the week they helped to change the car when I'd made a mistake.  Easy to drop off.No spurious fees after the event.  Just a good, honest car hire company.RELATIVELY INEXPENSIVE TOO.THE TRICKY BITS:  Because this company is soooo popular, you may have to wait a few hours to collect your car as the queue may well be three hours long.But.....be kind to these workers, they're doing their best and  whining and complaining doesn't make things go any speedier.THANK YOU CICAR.

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: We did really appreciate everything: from our arrival to our departure at Tenerife Sur airport, everything was fine. Nice welcoming when arriving at the airport office for picking up the car, everything was prepared, it was quick and professional.Very glad to see the car: we did expect a 'normal' Opel car and we got a brand new Jeep Renegade!Nice car, easy driving and only 240 km when getting it!The location and the well-done parking for renting cars at the airport is also great: clean and easy with the Cicar office nearby (very professional).No extra charge, every is clear in the contract and general conditions, no matter if the car is clean or not (in our case only dust/sand on the black car because of the wind). Anyway we care on your car but were a bit afraid about traffic and driving conditions, with a so new and nice car.

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: Hire car on Lanzarote.Oil light and service lights flashing on way back from del Carmen.Had to wait from 1 to 4 to take back to office.Manager did not believe me.Asked for a refund on hire or another car. Was refused. Now waiting for compensation after being back in England for 3 weekd

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: Best experience everWe booked a Seat Leon ST in Gran Canaria.Price was very competitif, fast and kind check-in and check-out, nothing to pay in advance, full insurance included (so no extras, no -hard- selling talks, also second driver included, good and clean car. Next time Cicar again.

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_title: Wonderful company, great experience every time
review_text: I've used Cicar three times in the last 5 years, in La Gomera and La Palma. They are a fantastic company. Cars are sparkling clean and a good selection, and a really easy pick up / drop off. The best thing about them is the no-worry full comprehensive insurance. Means you don't need to check it over at the start and takes all the anxiety out of drop offs - other car hire firms will charge a fortune for the tiniest scratch. I wish Cicar was available everywhere!

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: Great renting experience. Fast and hassle free car pickup. Straightforward conditions. Easy return. Car was feshly cleaned, in good condition - safe to drive. I am satisfied - again.

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: doesn't deserve a star either even car was booked ages ago they took the car for cleaning the moment i went to pick it up which doesn't make sense try not to book with them

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: We have booked a Fiat 500 Cabrio in Tenerife. The car, almost as new, was handed over clean. Directly at the airport. Pleasant, without trying to sell you something else.After 14 days, the return went easily. Park in a free space and quickly return the papers.At home we found that the amount charged was a bit too high. By mail Cicar contacted, the amount was corrected without discussion. The rental price was favorable in comparison.We would book next time again with Cicar.

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: Fast, easy, cheap, trustable.No credit card required. Cheapest that I found + full insurance.No problems with the car.Recommend.

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: Impeccable service, booked inline, car exactly as ordered and with no hidden extras, nearly new car, 12,000 km, immaculately maintained. We got impounded by police, our stupid fault, Cicar ran us around to release the car, totally helpful.

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: As always a brilliant experience. Cars are new and spotless. Staff friendly and helpful.

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_title: The best, serious and professional car rental company in Spain.
review_text: By far the best car rental company in the Canary Islands and Spain.  No hidden costs, new car park, quality cars, well sanitized, and if the reserved car is not available, another superior class is offered at the same costs.

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_title: I rented Alfa Romeo and asked them to…
review_text: I rented Alfa Romeo and asked them to double check that I will get actually this car. They did. Great car. Great condition. All was smooth. I scratched the car a bit, but the insurance covered it. No hassle. No questions. Fair and good. Recommended.

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: Great hire, Bessy (Seat Leon Auto) was a great hire. Had a free upgrade from a Opel  Corsa auto, to Seat Leon auto nice touch thank you. Very easy pick up. Clocked up 500km in our 4 day hire. Bessy had a few battle scars on her but mechanically sound! Was clean and full tank of fuel. Staff were friendly and helpful.  My only wish now is that I paid for a week and not paid £70 transfer cost! Thank you cicar will be using you again.Bye Bye Bessy

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_title: Recently returned from a great trip to…
review_text: Recently returned from a great trip to the beautiful La Gomera. Cicar were great, easy collection just off ferry and simple return. Having rented from a lot of hire companies on the mainland I have to say Cicar were amazing. None of the nonsense of charging crazy sums for a full tank and asking you to return empty, no pressure to buy additional insurance as comes fully comp or any of the other ridiculous tricks less reputable companies use. I 100% recommend and will definitely only use Cicar, when possible, in the future.

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: Excellent service, couldn’t have been easier, car dropped of at Hotel & when finished leave key with reception. Highly recommended!

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_text: Absolut dissappointment!!! We made a reservation online and wanted to rent one of the most expensive cars they have for 7 days...but it was impossible. Their website seemed to have issues and we were able to finish a reservation after 4 tries. When we wanted to make any changes it ran into other issues, we only wanted to change our pick-up time... When we got to the office at the airport, we were waitting in a line for MORE THAN ONE AND A HALF HOUR!!! Unbelievable!!! After we finally got there, we showed our reservation number but there was a very rude man who told us that the reservation is cancelled because we are late! When we kindly explained him that it is because we spent almost 2 hours in line he said we are liars! After we asked what we can do and if the car is still there and available he said: "No, reservation is cancelled, no car for you, see you next year!". When we were about to leave he stopped us and said the car is still there and he can give it to us. Without any other explanation, he only gave us the car keys. When we got to the parking lot, we found out we got TOTALLY DIFFETENT CAR!!! Instead of Mercedes GLA we got JEEP!!! It needs more gas, it is very lazy car, it didn't suit us proportionally! If he would have said: "There is only Jeep available, do you want it?" We would have just came to another company and give our money to them!!! Terrible, terrible service!!! If it is possible, we want to cancel our reservation and to get our money back or to be able to change/upgrade our car at least!

name: www.cicar.com/en
review_title: I have now been waiting in the Line for…
review_text: I have now been waiting in the Line for more then 1 hour just to pick up my car and they really do nothing 🤬 so don’t spend your holiday on waiting for CicarFind another rental company
