name: Self Storage Tameside
review_title: Our house sold quicker than we thought…
review_text: Our house sold quicker than we thought and I had to find a local storage company. I did a diligent search and found Self Storage Tameside to have the best offer. They offer a fantastic price with great add ons such as free boxes and the use of their van for free. I took both of these offers and it was a great help. Once coming into the unit we also got help from some of the staff to unload which was another great experience to be mentioned. In fact all the staff we encountered from the first call to coming into the unit were all very helpful and professional. I cannot fault the company and would highly recommend them as the best storage company in Manchester.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_text: AVOID AVOID AVOID!!If I could give this place no stars I would! Caused over £1000 worth of damage transiting our furniture to their storage unit. Did not make us aware of it, only upon collection a year later were we horrified to find it was completely vandalised. Not interested in accepting blame or covering cost. Absolute criminals - use much more reputable storage companies in Manchester. This place is the pits too. No organisation for collection and terrible access. Not even cheap to store here. Honestly, awful company and ethics. Those that are already stored here, word of advice, go and check on your goods!

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_text: Absolutely amazing moving and storage service! From start to finish I was so impressed with this company, the quotes for both moving and storing were far more reasonable than anything else I got from 10 other companies and they were so helpful in advising on every aspect of what I wanted (and I wanted quite a lot!). I was talked through the moving process and the storage process ahead of time and had sizes and prices explained and the best way to the moving part to work logistically. At no point was a pressured into other services or a bigger unit that I didn’t need which was what I was experiencing with other companies, they just genuinely helped and advised me on the best solution for what I needed. The 2 guys that came to do my move were INCREDIBLE! There were so friendly and helpful and so efficient! I couldn’t believe how good they were. They took all the stuff I wanted to my new place and then took the rest of it to storage without me having to worry about overseeing it which meant I could just unpack and had 1 less thing to worry about. I will 100% be using this company again when I move out or need storage again in the future! Thanks so much!!

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_text: Excellent storage unit with great staff. Mark was very helpful and got me a very cheap deal. The security on site is great also. I would highly recommend them.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_text: Highly recommended storage unit in Manchester. I dealt with Mark and he was very supportive and helpful. He got me a very cheap deal. I was impressed with the amount I was charged and it was surprisingly very cheap. I was offered to use their van for free which I obliged, I found this very helpful as it is not a common facility provided by storage companies. All in all this was a very good experience for me and my family with the company. We are thankful to Mark and everyone at Self Storage Tameside.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_title: After downsizing my business I was on…
review_text: After downsizing my business I was on the lookout for a local and cheap storage unit. My search brought me to Self Storage Tameside and after discussion with the staff over the phone I was very happy to go ahead. I was explained expertly about the size of the unit that I would need and all the details required. I was actually surprised how cheap the quotation I got was, I asked about the free boxes and was allowed to come multiple times to pick some up. Whilst on the site I was helped by some of the staff loading my items into the unit, this was a very nice gesture. I noticed in the main office they have a good set of CCTV cameras across the site which reassured me further. Overall a great company to deal with.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_title: I was recommended Self Storage Tameside…
review_text: I was recommended Self Storage Tameside and am glad I chose them. They are the cheapest storage company in Manchester by far and I concluded that after extensive research. On top of that they have an amazing array of add-ons, the best being the use of their van for free. I just called them and processed this, it is a massive help when you have many items to take along. We found out they also offer free boxes but we had already purchased quite a few from other places. That also is a nice touch to offer them free for anyone who needs them. I dealt with Mark who was very helpful and an honest guy. Very happy all round and recommend them to anyone looking to store locally at a great place.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_text: Self Storage Tameside provides an outstanding service. I stored my furniture with them for 6 months and it came home in the same condition as when I stored it. The size of the individual units is adequate with safety and security good across the unit complex. The pricing on offer is very cheap and cheerful. I was able to get free boxes off them which I believe is standard for all customers. This is a very noice touch. The staff are super efficient and friendly. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_text: Best storage company in Manchester by a mile. I have used others in the past and no one can touch them for cheap prices. The value is great and location is ideal just off the motorway. Very good security and staff are all pleasant and welcoming. I do not hesitate to recommend Self Storage Tameside.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_text: Very helpful, got 5 weeks storage at a good rate. Opening times could be better but security is worth it.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_title: I write this review to thank Self…best storage company
review_text: I write this review to thank Self Storage Tameside for providing me with a helpful and great service. I am a landlord and have a couple of properties in Manchester not far from the storage unit. We always upgrade our properties and furnish them every year. The old items are donated to charity or sold on ebay and we use Self Storage Tameside to store these items. I am money conscious and the price I get from Mark and the team is the best on offer by a mile. The unit security and location off the motorway are great. I use the free boxes on offer most times and this is a nice added extra. Best storage company around in my view.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_title: Best storage company in Manchester by a…
review_text: Best storage company in Manchester by a far. I have used places in the past but they do not have as good customer service and price. Easily the cheapest in Manchester and the best add ons. The free boxes on offer and the use of their van for free is excellent. I was recommended by a friend and am glad I used them. Mark the main point of contact is a very pleasant and helpful chap. He worked out the perfect unit for us without any hassle. The units are good size and the security around the whole complex looks good. I would highly recommend them for storing at the best price and deal.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_title: Sorry seems to be the hardest word
review_text: I have reviewed them previously but this is a follow up and covers how they deal with issues. They don’t respond to calls, emails etc and have been unclear about their opening times. They aren’t clear about what has been agreed and impose charges without confirming them. This isn’t a company I would ever use again. Any business can be poorly managed due to unforeseen circumstances, but this business makes it the fault of the client and not them. Some of their staff need some serious customer services training.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_text: A horrible company, please stay away and don't fall victim like a lot of us did, and now we are stressed trying to find a resolution. All they care about is their money, claiming you've not paid and threatening  to get bailiffs involved straightaway, when it is a mistake on their end. Then the huge fire incident that occurred, where they don't bother getting back to you, promise a refund because all my belongings have been destroyed in the fire, then refund a far less amount than that owed, then can't be reached, I've rang several times and emailed too, no response. What a headache and so unprofessional.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_title: All my belongings lost in a fire
review_text: All my belongings lost in a fire. No one even bothered to contact me to let me know, I only found out when I called to make my monthly payments and told "at least I don't have to pay my monthly storage costs". They sent me a copy of my contract to make sure I knew that I wasn't insured. I've not heard from the since, yet to receive and apology, a refund for my storage costs, or even someone to tell me what happened. They've dealt with the situation so heartlessly. This year, I've lost my job, my house and now all my belongings.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_title: Heartbreak of losing are life's belongings. We are one of the unluckwho have…
review_text: We are one of the unlucky ones who have lost everything, all our belongings after 48 year of marriage, can you imagine the things we had collected, wedding photos, pictures of our family who are no longer with us.I have not sleep since I found out, our goods were in store until we moved into our new home, and were due to be delivered the week after the fire. We now have nothing left, all our beautiful furniture, and items we had collected over the years. Nothing could ever bring them back. But it would have been a little easier if we had been treated with a little respect, instead of absolute ( well what can we do attitude) I lie awake at night thinking about our loss and how stupid we were to trust this company with our most treasured possessions.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_text: After the fire all our stuff has been burnt to the ground. All our little boys photos, birth certificates, sentimental things we will never get back we are absolutely devastated beyond words. our whole lives were in that unit. I have constant anxiety thinking about all our things, all the things we have lost that we will never get back. I can learn to live with the furniture and other things we have lost over time but it’s all my special sentimental things I cannot get over. We waited for our son for 12 years and we finally were blessed with having him through IVF. All those memories we saved for him to see all his things from when he was born. His hospital band, this list goes on. We were made homeless 2.5 years ago and all our belongings we had built up over 19 years were in those units. We finally found a house. And were so excited to be getting our lives back together. we were due to clear both our units out and set up our new home after we had decorated it.  Everything we have built up over 19 years all up in smoke. We never got it insured as it states on the website  in other words that the unit is so secure that you don’t need insurance and the insurance is free. Apparently they have 24/7 cameras watching over the units... well if that’s true why did the fire get do out if control?  We had those units for 2.5 years all that money spent and burnt. Absolutely devastated we have no words. Money would not have brought back our things but it would have helped to try and rebuild what we had. Disgraceful!! Heartbroken.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_text: I highly recommend Self Storage Tameside. I stored with them during a house move and it was a very pleasant experience. The deal which I got was brilliant with it being the cheapest price I found in Manchester. The staff are very professional and friendly and go the extra mile to help. They have a very good package overall with some free extras which make it even more value for money such as free boxes. I used many and found it a great help.  Keep up the good work guys.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_text: Exceptional customer care and service by Self Storage Tameside. I was stressing with my house move and needed to store a full house worth of items as we waited for our closing. I searched and found Self Storage Tameside to be in a good location from us. I rang up and spoke to a Mark who was very helpful and professional. He set out the best option for me and to my pleasure the price was very good. I was reassured they are the cheapest in Manchester and this was good to hear. I was offered free boxes to help my packing and duly obliged and picked them up a couple of days before drop off. The security on the location is very good and the size of unit we required was adequate. I again was very impressed with the staff once on site with them being very helpful and polite.

name: Self Storage Tameside
review_text: Minimal communication but efficient and good value service which worked well for our needs.  Helpful response on a problem we faced.Very expensive insurance for storage and we felt pressured into accepting this offer on the day of collection. Unfortunately, on delivery to our new home, one of our appliances was badly damaged and although the company came out and tried to fix this for us it was unsuccessful and we needed to buy a replacement.  Not covered for insurance from storage to new home by either the company or our household insurance.   One to watch!

review_text: Very poor. I didn't consider the property to be in good condition when I moved in...the property manager didn't seem to understand that a fully smashed door panel, a leaking sink, carpet that has mould marks and dust/grease/dirt is not what someone expects when they move in and are paying a good deal of rent. Property manager changed with no communication, the second manager seemed to disappear too, at least I didn't get email responses and couldn't get through on the phone. Different people seemed to handle different things so I didn't know who to get in touch with for example when it had been over a week since assessment and no one had been in touch. Maintainence reported was sometimes not responded to or completed. Was told I wasn't allowed the access code to the keysafe in order to leave keys for contractors while at work, which made repairs difficult.Many examples of miscommunication with me or between Touchstone and contractors- for example my final deposit assessment time was changed and done without me present. Very glad to move on, all very hasslesome and unpleasant.

review_text: I have been living at my present premises for 5 years and have had problems with repairs since I first moved in.   I have several matters that need resolving and despite my protests to several maintenance managers, the work has not been done.  I had an email from a new maintenance manager Alex Paradise yesterday to advise that Integral were going to call to the property to inspect windows, heating etc.  As it was a new manager I asked about the various problems being encountered over several years that were still outstanding and sent Alex copies of all emails sent previously over the years.   I have to say that Alex immediately took action and things have started to happen already since yesterday!   Alex apologised for the lack of attention I received to my complaints and has full heartedly given my matters all of his attention.I want to say a big thank you to Alex for the work he has done on my behalf, for his understanding and his quick response to my problems.   In one day Alex has done what numerous others had not done over 5 years.   You are a credit to Touchstone and I am a very grateful tenant.

On reading these numerous poor reviews which go back a long time, they are going to provide an even worse service than the previous housing provider.  They have not even had the courtesy of explaining why this has been deemed necessary, how repairs will be managed, especially outstanding repairs etc and any change to my tenancy status.Unfortunately, as the bad reviews continue to be posted, little hope of improvement either.

name: Dhl Express
review_text: Shocking experience. They just don’t give a S@*t. Extremely unprofessional, take 30 days to ship a 2,3kg parcel from one customs agent to another customs agent. I still don’t even have the goods, but they have taken a month (this is not completing the delivery, it is just shipping between customs), delivery was supposed to be no more than 3 weeks. Pathetic orginisation,, no management, no control, no professionalism, no follow up, just plain USELESS!!!!

name: Dhl Express
review_title: You wont get your stuff on time.
review_text: I have lived in three different countries. In all of them, the DhL service is a complete joke. The worst one is DHL Spain and DHL Germany. I live in Palma de Mallorca and have a shipping point very near my house, however many times I have paid for packages to be delivered at my personal address. Well, all of those times the delivery guy passess my door with many more packages directly to the picking point not even attempting to knock. Shame on this service. Do not hire them.

name: Dhl Express
review_title: I’m not saying that because I’m angry…
review_text: I’m not saying that because I’m angry But waste of money and time never again Piece of GarbageI don’t recommend anyone if you want Your parcel to be lost or not delivered send it dhl express And I’ve already paid £50 What a scam I prefer to book a ticket and deliver it by myself And have A piece of mind and make sure my items are delivered People items Are not a joke if you can deliver it just say you can’t

name: Dhl Express
review_text: My $4000 parcel arrived damaged. Soaked in water and a large hole on one of the corners. The courier did not obtain my signature at the time of delivery even though a signature was required for this parcel. They just dropped it off at my door and ran.This is the second time it happened to me with DHL. Isn't this fraud???? Why on earth do businesses still ship with them?

name: Dhl Express
review_title: It’s been 2 weeks I sent an email to…
review_text: It’s been 2 weeks I sent an email to resolve the issue I had with having to pay tax more than expected. Since then I had to pay one more time for second delivery both for the healthcare products. One reply for the first mail saying they will get back to me as soon as they can. Second email ———— no Reply. What can I say more. Thanks for your service.

name: Dhl Express
review_text: Excellent service. Swift shipping, and fabulous communication. This has been my experience of DHL involving many deliveries  from abroad ; my most recent being today. Thankyou DHL.

name: Dhl Express
review_text: I have shipped a package including my work laptop and work phone from Sydney to Istanbul on 14-April. I have travelled to Iran for 3 weeks and flying to Istanbul on 6-May to collect the laptop and phone and continue to travel/work around Europe for about 3 months.My plan was to work from Europe. However, was informed by DHL Turkey that phones are not permitted to be shipped/delivered to Turkey at all. So, they do not release the whole parcel. This was not mentioned in Sydney at the time of shipment! So, causing company, me and the receiver in Turkey a big trouble. I have sent through email and also called both +61 37 0356818 and +61 737245700 to resolve the issue yesterday 26-April. This is very much frustrating that despite my calls and emails I have not heard back from DHL Australia yet and have to make more phone calls from overseas to follow up for their mistake :(

name: Dhl Express
review_title: DHL Express was neither Express nor was it handle with zero regards to fragility.I had a package containing a military…
review_text: I had a package containing a military grade, clearly marked signage showing FRAGILE, bubble wrapped and they charged me for Express Shipping but the item was received weeks later, damaged and they still charged me Extra fees for using my laptop to as a pinatta.

name: Dhl Express
review_text: My package was supposed to be be delivered today. I received a email saying they “attempted” to deliver but no one was home. That’s weird because I signed up for a no contact delivery and I’m off today I’ve been looking out my window all damn day no one “attempted” to do s hit. I contacted DHL with no help they basically told me it would be re delivered tomorrow. Tomorrow!?! I got in touch with them RIGHT after I got the email of lies that MF probably is still around the block…. After this I will not be using this service again.

name: Dhl Express
review_text: DHL Express - Unacceptable Service by DHL.I have sent express courier to india in Jan 22 but its not yet delivered. urgent medication for my family sent fron australua which is still stuck and they just keep on dragging with no outcome.Will definately gona take action and never Use them and this will be lodged to #ombudsmanMy DHL tracking number is 7530726464Spoke t o customer service every day .They keep on saying it will get deliver in 2 days.Really express post medication can take more than 2 months.??Charged me over $200 for postage and just ignoring the fact.#DHLExpress#horriblecustomerservice

name: Dhl Express
review_title: They delivered a Piece of Luggage from…
review_text: They delivered a Piece of Luggage from Portugal to the USA two days ahead of Schedule.FIRST RATE shipping company and their website is even easy to use to set up delivery alerts.  I will use them again!

name: Dhl Express
review_text: DHL delivery status after waiting for it all day long: Delivery not possible - new delivery attempt the next working day.

name: Dhl Express
review_text: Absolutely Ridiculous Service. Waiting for 3 packages over a 2 month period. Constantly told by Customer Services. Its stuck in customs at Liepzig and they have difficulty getting intouch with them. Going to lose a valuable client over their incompetence.

name: Dhl Express
review_text: Awful. Was told a total of five times that my package would be delivered “today”. It never was and no one let me know. Each time, I would get a notice a day or two later giving an excuse as to why it wasn’t delivered. Four times, it was that my address was incorrect or “didn’t exist” (I’ve lived here 14 years). Once, it said “delivery couldn’t be attempted because of traffic”. Huh? I would stay home to receive and sign for my package each time. There’s an option when you go into “manage delivery” of having them leave package without a signature. I didn’t dare choose that because it was an expensive item and I had zero faith in DHL at that point. I chose to have it delivered to a DHL “center” and pick it up myself. Several days after I chose that, the DHL driver actually called me to say she was looking for my house and couldn’t find it. What??? They are completely disorganized with little to no interest in customer service. I’m guessing it’s why they failed when they tried to expand to the US years ago. They cannot compete with other carriers. They don’t even come close. I much prefer when overseas sellers arrange for the post office to deliver once a package arrives in the states. It would be delivered much faster by the PO, which is saying something. I still don’t have my package. Just got a notice it’s at the center I choose, but based on the numerous false promises from DHL so far, I’m not feeling confident that it will actually be there when I arrive.

name: Dhl Express
review_title: What a shambles of a company.
review_text: I have recently ordered wine from Portugal and experienced a number of issues with delivery.Firstly I received a courtesy telephone call from DHL with the underlying intention to pay duty and vat owned. On requesting an invoice the caller took my email address and the invoice would be forwarded. This never arrived. After waiting a few days I tracked my parcel via the wine sellers original order receipt. It seems that DHL had tried to deliver but failed and this was the first I knew about it. No telephone, email or text message to inform me it would be delivered. No card left to say an attempt had been made so no time, date reference number, etc.Obviously I tried to arrange a re-delivery but found I had to trudge through a myriad of DHL companies blind to try and make some sort of contact. They dont appear to be connected to each other never mind the customer. I had great difficulty as I could not sign in as a guest, log in or register as a customer for various reasons. Telephone numbers not available. Finally entered the DHL Express site and registered but then found I could not organise a delivery because there was a problem with my address (there was not). Then used the designated telephone number, spoke to a pleasant female who could not see a problem with my address either so arranged a new delivery day for me. I then received a confirmation email with the details (Monday between 9.00 and 5.00). Received a text before the delivery day and thought things were looking up. Delivery successful but documentation on case showed that they had tried to deliver twice neither of which I knew about. This has occured before but thought this was an anomaly but obviously not. Not bothering again.

name: Dhl Express
review_text: I am absolutely disappointed. The express delivery took over 3 day from nueremberg to wiesbaden in germany (which is a 2.5 h drive), after calling customer service in the morning my first call was reassuring to get the delivery around 11 am since I had to take off two days for this somewhat urgent package. After calling again afternoon I was approached by an extremely unfriendly agent who said the driver has a route and others to deliver you cant expect an early delivery just for you. I was shocked by this statement and the way of handling things. I will certainly not use dhl by any means again. Thank you

name: Dhl Express
review_title: In the last 2 weeks the driver has made…
review_text: In the last 2 weeks the driver has made 2 mistakes in the delivery, DHL please educate your drivers... It is not that hard to give the right info in where the package is delivered. This costed me a lot of time and parking money..

name: Dhl Express
review_title: paid 10 euros to get package faster and…
review_text: paid 10 euros to get package faster and still have to wait 4 days same as i would have used standard shipping hahah peinlichhhhhh

name: Dhl Express
review_title: I have been waiting for a delivery…
review_text: I have been waiting for a delivery since Jan. 20. Today is February 19.My shipment has been in the US since at least January 20th but they just cannot manage to deliver it.Trying to reach someone is nearly impossible but the few times I did make contact to verify the address etc was no help and the last was an online chat with Stefano. I disconnected with the overwhelming thought that he'd lied saying it would be delivered that day and yes, still no delivery.

name: Dhl Express
review_title: "Express delivery AT HOME" they said... (spoiler: it is not at home)
review_text: Pov: you send a package from Sweden to Bulgaria- express delivery at home.The delivery was fast but it did not arrive at home as required, for a silly excuse such as "slippery road". This meant that a 70 year old woman was supposed to risk falling and having a severe injury on that "slippery road" even though I had ordered a fast delivery AT HOME. Additionally, before I confirmed my order, i called the Swedish DHL to ask if the package will actually arrive at home and I got the confirmation that it does. All words, no facts.Pov 2: You are supposed to get a package from Bulgaria.Again the delivery does not come at home. This time I could see the courier from my window. She was going back to the truck with several packages in her hand and she soon drove away. Not much late I receive a message that there was no response "when the currier tried to deliver". As far as I could see, the courier did not try particularly hard. The door to the building has a code that the courier clearly did not know. However, what the courier did know was my phone number and my email adress, where I have been receiving the information about the package. Despite that I am obliged to go to a Service Point and get my package there, even though it is paid for delivery AT HOME.Two different delieveries, two different countries, same problem. I do not recommend.
